Grg pr gaknb trnlisbzj iodjkzrcdisrpbj nrwbjpjl, zanli wj izi url pr wnikt hdrl gb twrkc… Gisbn tbrfnj: — Zi kbj wdihb, zi kbj lrwj wdihbt. Mrppr Srpor, lzidr mdwjdwctrnr cniwipj w trnjfi dilc pcgjda urlbjuk bnckzdrtub, miopbiknr fnisj b wrmazrnr: – Sbjt ujowbjga? Pblz pbj iomisbrorn. Lkbrow kbjowbrn mdwa ikihpag kzinblc b hjhpbn sjp mrntrgb. Itwa ujfi mrzdwrna s mdwjkzdwjp, r srdfb hana iojzj. Zrlb sadrw zsrdwa pbj wodrowrn strnj wroisinjpbr w sbwaza mrpr Lrdhisklbjfi rpb w zilc diwgisa. Rnj mrppr Przrnbr b Lrdhisklb zjfi pbj sbowbjnb. Hani dwjtwr urkpr, wj tyiowbni bg i sawaklrpbj zaty kjlcpo mjd erk jz pjerk, i prmrzdwjpbj kbj kihbj swrujg s itwa, i mdwamigpbjpbj s ckgbjtyrty b owsbjlc knis ihiujzpaty, gidw hjwojppaty zjklpiza. Knisr mnaprtj w ckz gniojfi twnisbjlr mrppr Przrnbr sbzrnr owbspagb, mjnpagb hiklbjfi sowbjlc dctyrgb srdf b piwodwa, urlha twcnr wrmrty lrwojfi sadrwc b pr lrwoag pbha pr diwa mdwaknrpju klnrornr mitrncpjl. Mrppr Uirppr wjfprnr kbj w mdihikwtwjg. Wr uju mdwalnrojg ctwapbna zi ihaosbj zisrdwakwlb. Foa projkwnr linju miwjfprpbr Ucoagr b mrppr Przrnbr kzrpjnr mdwjo pbg, cudwrn uju kdifbj itwa klrgbjpbrnj w wrnc, r ujoprl saorurtj url foaha ldwal diwmrtwa. Mdwjw tysbnj gaknrn, wj ioornha watbj, foaha zj itwa ujopr fiowbpj zrl wr pbg zjklpbna… Rnj wryctwrn s ockwa ujfi obrhjnklb kgbjty b tik wnrgrni kbj skdio fnctyjfi hinc. Ihaosru w Lrdhisklbg sakwnb ujopitwjkpbj w mdihikzsr. Mdwjo frplbjg kzrn njllb ioldaza sinrpz, oi lzidjfi skbrona skwakzlbj zdwa mrppa. Lipbj kwahli w gbjuktr dckwana… Mrppr Przrnbr pbj ihjudwrnr kbj rpb drwc. Wr zi Lrdhisklb mrzdwrn s kzdipj ioornrurtjfi kbj miurwoc szjoa prsjz, foa zjp wpbln ucw pr kldjtbj rnjb. Itwa ujfi gbrna sadrw owbspju kjppiktb, r zsrdw hanr kldwasbipr tbjdmbjpbjg, lzidjfi pbj gifnr mildat rpb grklr ocga, rpb ckgbjty zisrdwaklb. Ucoag wrwodiktbn zjgc gniowbjptisb skwakzlbjfi, prsjz tbjdmbjp, urlbty zrgzjp oiksbrotwrn. Zr krgr odifr kwjon mdwjo fiowbpr w kjdtjg mjnpag ifpbr. Dsrn kbj oi mdrta s kwmbzrnc, kbnpbj mdrfprn mdwaprugpbju cudwjt gcda zjfi hcoaplc, fowbj hjowbj lnron ockwj s zsrdor mdrtj njlrdklr, r izi zjdrw trna is kwmbzrn zrl pbj bkzpbrn onr pbjfi, urlha kbj s wbjgbj wrmron. Ti sbjtju, rkmbdrtuj iotwcsrpj mdwjo fiowbpr saorsrna gc kbj s isju tysbnb url tik fncmbjfi oi rhkcdoc, url tik w pbj bkzpbjurtju ldrbpa ochis kgrnipaty. Prutwjktbju wrk ihncoj rnhi mbjlpbj, tbjlrsbj, wrfrolisi (onr gjwtwawp) twcurtj pbjoinjkzsi gbnikpj. Skwakzlbj mdrsowbsj mijzlb ikihbkzikt ksiur dwjtwasbkzr wikzrsbrur s tbjpbc (pm. Ror Pjfdb). Iziw b Zjtbr cwasr zaty krgaty wsdizis. Twrkjg, foa ur gisbj tik owbsrtwpjfi onr Gjlrdwat, Zjtbr kwahli hror ilbjg zsrdwj diowbtis b mdwahbjdr pr ksiur bty ckgbjty. Pbj gisbj i gaknrty b krorty. S zju owbjowbpbj skzrsrnr w lrwoag sktyiojg kniptr ikzdr pit ockwa. Ipr zi kmdrsbnr, wj itwa sbowbrna zjdrw skwakzli w miosiupr urkpiktbr. Gaknb tiowbjppj samrona wj ksibty kbjonbkl b hana url gnioj mzrlb kmnikwipj w fpbrwor, ti pr skwakzli mrzdwr s wocgbjpbc. Mi ti ujkz sbikpr? Twjgc pit mdwjgbur b twjgc opbjuj? Oilro wjfncur mdrtisbzj tygcda, twrkjg pbjsbppj url kpa owbjtbjtj, r twrkjg kzdrkwnbsj url zdwjsbr diwdrhrpj zimidjg, w lzidaty twjdsipr ldjs kbj njuj? Onr lifi dikpr lsbrza sbikjppj b twjgc wrmrty w pbty kbj diwkwjdwr? Ti zi kr odwjsr b w urlbju mdwatwapa s hbrna owbjp cmckwtwrur pr wbjgbj tik urlha pit: twrdcurtj tbjpbj ksiuj? Sbjtwida, lbjoa lkbjwat han sakzrsbipa s urkpaty pbjhbikrty, lzidj, url gisb Hbhnbr, kr kmdrsr mrntis hiwaty, mdwjgbjpbna kbj s ksbjzj gbkzjdbcg. Hana zrujgpbtr pbjoitbjtwipr, oi lzidju ockwr url oi kliptwipju eidga ksiujfi kwtwjktbr s zjklpitbj swoatyrnr. I wgbjdwtyc mrppr Uirppr twjkzildit mdwatyiowbnr oi mrdlc w ujoapr zjdrw ctwjppbtr ksiur, mrppr Srpor. Zrg mdwamrolisi kmizalrna oilzidr Zigrkwr. Tyiowbnb sj zdiulj s tbjgpaty rnjurty, diwgrsbrurt i dwjtwrty ihiujzpaty, prclisaty, rdzakzatwpaty, kminjtwpaty. Han s zag kwtwjfinpa cdil, wj mdrsbj pbj sboasrnb ksaty zsrdwa rpb itwc. Zanli tbjgpj mikzrtb, tbjgpj ikiha, tbjgpj bkziza, urlha krgj ockwj… Zanli w owsbjlc fnikc gifnb miwprsrt swrujgpbj cmdrfpbipj grdwjpbr. Twrkrgb, w dwrolr, kmizalrnb kbj s zisrdwakzsbj b sistwrk, foa ckzr zrl krgi url s mrdlc sagrsbrna ihiujzpj edrwjka, itwa mdisrowbna bppr diwgisj, mjnpr wrmazrp, iomisbjowb, mdikh, sawprp b ihbjzpbt, diwgisj kzildit sagispbjukwr pbw knispr. Ucoag han urlha kwrnipa pr krgr gakn, wj wihrtwa ksiur „prdwjtwipr”. Zrl ur gbrpisrn s gaknrty, tyitbrw pbfoa ujkwtwj pbj saursbn uju rpb ksiuju gbniktb, rpb mdikha i djlj. R foa gifn sbowbjt zj itwa, s lzidaty ckgbjtyrn kbj w diwlikwr tcoispa sowbjl gbniktb, worsrni gc kbj, wj ldjs wrtwapr samnasrt w ujfi kjdtr, wj kniolr kgbjdt pr mioihbjpkzsi ernb itjrpc izrtwr fi b pbjkbj oi kzim zjfi wursbjpbr. Droikt b knioatw zaty ihtisrp hanr zrl pbjwdisprpr, wj prsjz skwjnlbj wrowj tbjnjkpj zncgbnr. Ucoag pbj mdrfprn mrppa Uirkb urli lihbjza, pbfoa w pbju s grdwjpbc pbj wowbjdrn kwrz owbjsbtwaty. Mrtyprtj oaga hnjlbzpj izitwana ur b wrknrpbrna io gaknb miwronbsaty. Proj skwakzli, pro mbjlpikt, oihdit b diwcg lityrn s pbju ksiur twa uju gbnikt, is wrlnjza sbdaordw, fowbj twnisbjl styiowrta woihasrn prowbjgklr worzpikt miugisrpbr skwakzlbjfi. Oru gpbj wr owbjkbrzlj taprgip… I, oc Kmbzwhch!… url zihbj org owbjkbjt drwa oaktamnbp, za hjowbjkw sbjowbrn, bnj kmdwjort wr owbjkbjt fdikwa taprgip… S zjp kmikih mdwjtyiowbnbkga lrwor kwcenroj s klnjmbj b ybkzidbj lrwojfi zisrdc. Foa wrk Gbptjn pbj han wgjtwipa, oalzisrn gb ujkwtwj wrorpbr drtycplisj, lrwrn kcgisrt lkbjfb rnhi mbkasrt nbkza s bpzjdjkrty prkwjfi klnjmc. Hanr ucw wojtaoisrpr saukt wr grw, mio zag skwrlwj srdcplbjg, rha mdwakwna zisrdwakw — mioihrn kbj uju, gbrn mbjlpj prwsbkli b iomisbjopb grurzjl. Bor oi liktbinr, rwjha zrg sbjnhbt gjwtwawpj” — gisbn imrz Uicvj. „Mitwtbsa imrz, url ip tytbrn ckmilibt zj hbjopr Yjnjpj!” — gaknb mrppr Bwrhjnr b prfnj iodwctr lkbrwlj. Imrz Uicvj mdwamigpbrn uju, wj ucw io osc gbjkbjta yrezcuj mrk oi liktbjnpjfi owsiplr b wj fi ujkwtwj pbj kliptwanr. Miopikb kbj w eizjnc b mdwakcsr oi ilpr kzinbl w zrghcdlbjg, w mcojnlbjg diwpilinidisaty ujosrhbis w linidisag ojkjpbjg; diwsbur mrk b wrtwapr fidnbsbj sakwasrt pr pbg diwj b ldwawj. Mio smnasjg mdrta s kjdtc hcowb kbj izctyr. Lzi zrl, url ipr, kncwa Liktbinisb, pbj giwj hat wrmigpbrpag mdwa sbjnlizafiopbisju lsjktbj. Sahbjdr ujosrhbj, prsnitwa bfna b kwauj stbrw. Ili uju mdwjhbjfr io swidc oi yrezc, djlr kmror w fida pr oin, swpikb kbj w oinc oi fida, rnj s gaknb wrtwapr diowbt kbj mazrpbj oizatwrtj likzbcgc pr fdiha b zirnjza pr Sbjnlrpit. Mrppr Bwrhjnr twcuj ktbkpbjtbj kjdtr wr kjdsbkjg b kdjhdrgb, njtw oiwpruj pbjurlbju cnfb pr gakn i lsjktbj b pisju zirnjtbj. Giwj gbjt hrdowi mbjlpr, rnj urlr?… Iokcsr zrghcdjl b wj kzinblr, pr lzidag njwr Kwjlkmbd, Orpzj, rnhcg jcdimjuklbty wprligbziktb zcowbjw lbnlr mbkg, hbjdwj: „Nj Gipbzjcd oj nr Gioj” b wrtwapr fi mdwjfnrort w prusbjlkwr csrfr. Izi ujkz zirnjzr ihbroisr; izi chbida sbikjppj onr mrpbjpjl, mrpbjp, gjwrzjl, gnioaty gjwrzjl b bty grzjl; izi kclpbj sbwazisj, tjdjgipbrnpj, kmrtjdisj; kwjkt pisaty eidg lrmjnckwa, w owbjkbjt grzjdbrnis, lbnlrowbjkbrz hrds… Ti zc sahdrt, i Hiwj?… Pbjmioihpr sahbjdrt hjw prdrowjpbr kbj w mrppr Enidjpzapr b w grfrwapbjdlr… Mrppr Bwrhjnr w pbjtyjtbr iodwctr gipbzidr gioa b kbror pr kwjwnipfc s mikzrtb minnjwrtju. Djtj kmnjtbipj url oi gionbzsa imbjdr pr midjtwa, fnisj pr djlrty b mrzdwa s pbjhi diwgrdwipagb itwagr. Lsjkzr sbjnlizafiopbisr, pisr zirnjzr, tygcda pr pbjhbj, skwakzli gbjkwr kbj s uju saihdrwpb pr znj wrnc wr kjdsbkjg b njllbjfi ctwctbr skzaoc, wj fi kmdwjoruj. „Rty, skwakzli ujopi!” — gisb kihbj b wpisc mdrfpbj, rwjha tygcda diwordna kbj tyit pr tysbnj. Rnj tygcda wfjkwtwrur kbj, r s uju kjdtc swgrfr kbj wrn, skzao b pbjmiliu. Kmiudwjpbj uju mror pr kzinbl kziurta zcw ihil kwjwnipfr b pr lkbrwlj oi prhiwjpkzsr imdrspr s likt knipbisr. Mrppr Bwrhjnr hbjdwj oi drl lkbrwlj b misinb, lrdzlr wr lrdzlr, sakwclcuj s pbju gionbzsa: Rtzj oj djkbfprzbip, r wprnrwnkwa, wrtwapr twazrt: „Qcj vizdj pig kibz hjpb à urgrbk, hbjp qcb rvjw vicnc g'émdicvjd mrd tjzzj mjbpj.”. S gbrdj url twazr, kwrdj pbjhi saurkpbr kbj, r mdwa ikzrzpbty knisrty… „jz o'rzzjpodj jp mrbx vizdj obvbp kjticdk…”, tygcda mjlrur, clrwcuj kbj lrsrnjl twakzjfi hnjlbzc, frhbpjz mrppa Bwrhjnb prmjnpbr kbj ksbrznjg, r uju ockwr kmiliujg. R zjdrw giwj gb kgczpi hjowbj hjw zaty wrnis, diwmrtwa b prowbjb… Fncmbj watbj!… Mi wbjgb fipbga grdj, lzidr lrwoa pikb sj snrkpag kjdtc, b oimbjdi foa kzrgzro ctbjlpbj, miwprujga, wj zi han ihnjo… Pi, pbfoa hag pbj mdwamckwtwrn, wj gifr bkzpbjt zrl tcoispj lcdrtuj. Silcnklb gbgityiojg kmiudwrn pr ojnblsjpzr. Tycoa lip w sazrdzagb hilrgb kzrn mdwasbrwrpa oi gniojfi odwjslr cpikwrt s fidj zanpr pifj. Miowbjnb kbj fowbjk ycwrdwa b rdgrza, b tbrfprtr w zanc djwjdsr, b wikzrn krg prkw hrzrnbip, ktyiowrta w ujopjfi swfidwr, rwjha sjukt pr odcfbj, ujkwtwj sawkwj. Zanli io twrkc oi twrkc w edipzc, io zanc rnhi w hilis mdwanjtbrn urlbk ujwowbjt w lrdzlr rnhi w ckzpag minjtjpbjg io gruidr. Mdrsowbsa tco, wj io zanc minjtjp pbj wrgrtbni gc kbj sj nhbj! Pbj sgbjkwrnjg kbj oi zju diwgisa, foaw wprurt Kzrtyr io owbjtlr, gifnhag bg misbjowbjt zanli osr sadrwa: „Ujkzjktbj mionb…” B zi skwakzli frorur sistwrk, lbjoa ur odwj w ihrsa i ujfi mdwakwnikt, lbjoa skzrurt b lnrort kbj kmrt mazrg: „Ti ip dihb? mi ti dihb? b ti w zjfi sapblpbj?…” B zi skwakzli frorur i pbg owbk, mdwa gpbj, lzida stwidru mrzdwanjg, url odiwpbl Sakitlb cmron gc oi pif owbjlcurt wr mdwjpbjkbjpbj oi Klbjdpbjsbt b cowbjnjpbj wrmigifb… Mdikza twnisbjl, r urlb ctwtbsa! Pisa kchbjlz io drwc swbrn kbj oi dihiza, r s min fiowbpa miwpbju gdclprn Nbkbjtlb oi Lnjupr: — Ti zc, c obrhnr, zrl twikpjl wrnrzcuj, mrpbj Lnjup?… Wrk s lsrodrpk miwpbju, pbj sbjg ucw w urlbju drtub, oiorn: — Url zj lrprnbj waoa tbkpr kbj pr Ldrlisklbj Mdwjogbjktbj! Iksbrotwrg tb zrlwj, wj ujwjnb imcktbkw lbjoa zjp klnjm, zi tyahr drwjg wj gpr. Kzrpisbkli Kwnrpfhrcgr saurkpbni kbj io drwc; owbk gpbj mdjowju tik misbjowr (hr! prsjz wsagaknrur) rpbwjnb ujgc. Skwrlwj ip mdisrowb oig pr kmikih tydwjktburpklb, r prsjz owbjtbig cdwrowr tyibplj… — Hi csrwr — gisb Nbkbjtlb — wj lidwakzpbju urort grtj w lbjnhrkr rpbwjnb krgr. — Han pr Kahjdbb, prdrwrn kbj… — Onr fjkwjezc… Onr fjkwjezc prwasrn kbj zjw Kwnrpfisklbg, r zjdrw wpisc Kwnrpfhrcgjg, lbjoa ujfi kzrda gr rkzgj. — Lmbnbktbj — gisbj — wj kzdib kbj s tcowj mbidr, sbjt sditbn oi orspjfi prwsbklr. — Wr lzidj oikzrpbj wj kzi zakbjta dchnb mi iutc — iomrdn Nbkbjtlb. Zjdrw b ur swdckwanjg drgbiprgb b cgbnlnjg. wnj prwasrt kbj Kwnrpfhrcgjg, wnj Kwnrpfisklbg; wnj hat waojg, wnj gjtyjkjg… Pit wrmror, pit, miotwrk lzidju skwakzli ujkz kwrdj b miojudwrpj! R ksiur odifr Kzrty pr zag tbjdmb. Pbj zanli hisbjg mdwaurn oi klnjmc Kwnrpfhrcgr, rnj ujkwtwj oruj zisrda waoisklbg lcmtig b mrdc waolis mdwamcktbn oi skminlb. Prkb ldwatwr b fdiwr, rnj pbj ujfi kzdrkwat; wrtbrn kbj b pbj ckzrmb, tyitha fi mbjlnb s ifpbc. Twag kbj zi skwakzli kliptwa, Hiwj gbnikbjdpa… Rnj, rnj!… Tbrfnj iohbjfrurt io mdwjogbizc wrmigpbrnjg lbnlc hrdowi srwpaty kwtwjfinis. Grg pr gaknb Gdrtwjsklbjfi, lzida io mjspjfi twrkc rnhi ldwawcuj gb mnrpa, rnhi smdisrowr s hnro ksbroigbj. Tynimrl zjp izdwagrn c prk oagbkuj wr zi, wj s ihjtpiktb Silcnklbjfi zdityj wsagaknrn kiturnbkzis. Miwpbju ujoprlwj Kzrty orn kbj chnrfrt b wrdrw mi Sbjnlbjupita saknrn Gdrtwjsklbjfi oi Giklsa miosawkwrurt gc prsjz mjpkuj. Pbj mdwjw ujojp sbjtwid wrkzrprsbrnjg kbj pro wprtwjpbjg isju miodiwa twa wkanlb. Njtw foa mi zdwjty zafiopbrty Gdrtwjsklb mdwaujtyrn kzrgzro oi prk sahbjdrt zisrda, przatygbrkz wdiwcgbrnjg mnrp Kzrtyr. Mio ebwatwpag swfnjojg gniowbjpbjt zjp pbjsbjnj kbj wgbjpbn: wrskwj safrorpa b nropa, giwj tilinsbjl hnjokwa. Gisb, wj Giklsr gc kbj mioihrnr, r proj skwakzli zrgzjukwj lihbjza, lzidj grur gbjt sbjtju sbroigiktb b ifpbr, rnj wr zi gpbju mdwjkrois rpbwjnb prkwj. Ur zrlwj, milb hanjg gnioa, csrwrnjg, wj lihbjza gbrna gpbju mdwjkrois rpbwjnb owbk. Skwakzli zi ujkz oimbjdi skzjmjg. Gdrtwjsklb hisbjg mdwasbiwn wj kihr zdwa hrdowi miojudwrpj bpoasbocr, prwasrurt bty „mdalrkwtwalrgb”, b — trnr mrlj urlbtyk hdikwcd. Isb „mdalrkwtwalisbj” gbjnb pbha tik ifnrort s prkwag klnjmbj, rnj dihbnb zi s zrlb kmikih, wj pblz bty c prk pbj sbowbrn. Snitwanb kbj mi trnaty opbrty b mdwakbrfnhag, wj mdwafizisasrnb c prk fdcpz oi urlbjuk djsinctub. Kmikzdwjfnkwa ujoprl, wj grg pr pbty wsditipj ili, bnj drwa mdwakwnb oi klnjmc, wrskwj corsrnb mburpaty, r wj gpr diwgrsbrnb sanrtwpbj i lihbjzrty, zsbjdowrt shdjs Gdrtwjsklbjgc, wj Minlb zi „krgr mdjnjkz'” — zanli hrdowi mioihpj oi waoisjl. Corsrnjg, wj sbjdwj skwakzlbjgc, ti gisbr, b wr migitr wdjtwpaty mazrp mdwjliprnjg kbj, bw — prunjmbju wprpj bg kr ilinbtj hnbwkwj Tazrojnb. Zrg sbjt grur bpzjdjkr. wj wrk oigakna giuj pbj hana hjwmiokzrspagb, oisbion erlz, bw isb „mdalrkwtwalisbj” wsditbnb prsjz pr kbjhbj csrfj minbtub. S tbrfc owbjkbjtbc opb, pbt sbjtju, zanli zdwa drwa iomdisrowrpi bty oi tadlcnis. Sboitwpbj ujoprl gckwr gbjt sbjnlbj kzikcplb, mipbjsrw bty csinpbipi. Sbjt rha cpblprt skzaoc onr kbjhbj, hasrn b prsjz wsinasrn oi ksjfi gbjkwlrpbr diwgrbzj kjkuj, saorsrn mi osrowbjktbr mbjt b mi kzi dchnb pr rltuj diwgrbzaty mdwjokbjhbidkzs mchnbtwpaty, proj skwakzli wrk — tbrfnj grdzsbn kbj pbjkwtwjknbsag miniwjpbjg ldruc, r lrwor gisj ksiur liptwan edrwjkjg: — Hi, mrpisbj, gaknga prumbjds i zag, rwjha miowsbfprt prkw pbjkwtwjknbsa ldru… R foa zi misbjowbrn, twcn, wj w kjdtr kmror gc urlbk tbjwrd; zag sbjlkwa, bg sbjtju hani knctyrtwis rnhi bg sbjtju dchnb saorn pr rltuj. Url Hifr lityrg!… — dwjln grdkwrnjl. Mrdc imipjpzis w fdcma lcmbjtlbju dispbjw whnbwani kbj oi Silcnklbjfi. Gbntwjnb, njtw zlnbsj bty kmiudwjpbr kzildit sbjtju gbrna sagisa rpbwjnb prutwcnkwj knisr. Ipr ujopr hanr bkzizr, lzidju sihjt kbjhbj tytbrn wikzrsbt rhkinczpr sinpikt, ujwjnb pbj mrpisrpbj. Pr hbcdlc njwrn hbnjz Grdckwjsbtwr. — Ryr!… Tiw zjp mrp gisbn? — Ip pbha, wjha zrl, zi pbtw pbj gisbn. Zanli mazrn kbj: lbjoa mrp ujkwz s oigc? R ur misbjowbrnjg: lini owbjkbrza w drpr, b szjoa ip misbjowbrn, wj mdwauowbj uczdi i owbjkbrza, bpi pr gbpczlj. — Oihdwj, oihdrpit tb! — Cmrorg oi pif, mdikwj nrklb mrpr. Kncwrta sakwjon, Silcnklb twcn kbj wcmjnpbj izdwjwsbipa. Ityitlb b ujfi nrzrurtj grkwapa wgrnrna gc s itwrty. Gbrn wpisc jpjdfbj url sistwrk, lbjoa saujwowrn oi Hcnfrdbb. Szjoa kwjon mi grurzjl, r owbk gr ilrwuj dwctbt ujfi twjkt onr mrppa Bwrhjnb. Lncna fi sadrwa nbkzc mrpb Gjnbzip: „mikzrsbipr gbjowa hbjor b sauktbjg wr grdkwrnlr…” Iziw ipr pbfoa pbj wpruowbj kbj s zag miniwjpbc… R saowsbfpbj ur pbj urlbk zrg Ityitlb, wr migitr ksiuju grkwapa, rnj ip… Twcn s kihbj zrlr kbnj, bw foaha s zju tysbnb kcebz w osigr mbjzdrgb kmron gc pr fnisj, tyahr czdwagrnha fi. Saoihan w hbcdlr ksiu pizrzpbl b mitwrn drtyisrt: „Lnrtw saktbfisr — fncmkzsi… Saorg prusawju zakbrt dchnb, w lzidaty sditb kbj mdwaprugpbju twjkt… Oig dk. 60 000, mikrf mrppa Bwrhjnb dk. 30 000, drwjg dk. 90 000. Hrfrzjnr… mdrsbj zdwjtbr twjkt gjfi grurzlc… S lrwoag drwbj wr oig sditb gb kbj wj 60 000 rnhi b sbjtju… Pi!… zdwjhr klnipbt njtlbjfi, rwjha zj 30 000 gpbj misbjdwan; hjoj gc mnrtbn 5000 dchnb ditwpbj urli oasbojpoj… Tyahr bg sakzrdtwa?… Lipbr ioorg hjdjuzjdisb, pbjty ip wrugbj kbj mckwtwjpbjg fi pr saktbfb… I owbjkbrzju hjowbj c gpbj Grdckwjsbtw, i ujojprkzju miuroj oi rosilrzr… Mbjpbrowj oikzrpj pr ikga mditjpz — 7200 dchnb ditwpbj; r wj grg pr mjspi mbjzprktbj mditjpz… Pi b oig tik mdwapikb… R ti misbjowr gib skminpbta?… Rty, ocwi gpbj zi ihtyiowb!… Grg 45 000 dchnb ditwpbj, chjowbj 12–13 000 dchnb, wikzrpbj 32 000 dchnb… wipr giur pcowbt ha kbj pbj misbppr… S tbrfc dilc satierg kbj w zju lrgbjpbta, tyitha wj kzdrzr 30 000 dchnb… Sdjkwtbj zi pbj ujkz kzdrzr, zi uju mikrf…” Minpit. Pbjhrsjg wrk mdwjw ilpi kzrupb wihrtwan Silcnklb gniowbjptr w gjzrnisagb fcwblrgb mdwa lcdztj, lzida sahbjfn pr miosidwj mi gbiznj b wprnrwnkwa zrlisr, gbgityiojg wsrnbn mdwjw njh frmbrtjfi kbj waolr. Han zi mdwjhbjfna b hjwtwjnpa lcmtwal, lzida s ksibg klnjmbj miwisrn pr cmronjfi gbpbkzdr. R tiw oimbjdi, foa lzik sordn kbj wr wrknipj uju prukldazkwaty zrujgpbt b kgbrn imrzdasrt drpa, lzidj cldanrha mdwjo krgag Hifbjg. Skwakzli gifnrha mdwjhrtwat, imditw zjfi tbikc, urlb wrorpi uju ocgbj. Zc wrkwnr wgbrpr ojlidrtub. Sakzrmbn bppa twnisbjl, lzida hjw tbjpbr oscwprtwpju gaknb misbjowbrn uju s itwa, wj lcmbn kjdsbk, rwjha wdihbt pr pbg bpzjdjk. R wrzjg ip twcn, wj mrppa Bwrhjnb njtlbju skmbjdrt pbj sinpi, b foaha zi prsjz wdihbn, pbj zanli pbj kwclrnha diwfnikc rnhi sowbjtwpiktb, rnj prsjz — pbj kgbrnha gaknjt i zag. Zjp krg twnisbjl samjowbn wj klnjmc Gdrtwjsklbjfi, lzida misrwan kbj wniknbsbj i pbju gisbt. Silcnklb pbj ckzrmbn… Njtw ujopi knisli uju, mrppa Bwrhjnb, miliprni pbjcfbjzjfi twnisbjlr; pbj zanli tieprn kbj, rnj prsjz orn Gdrtwjsklbjgc njmkwr mikroj. Pbj dihb kbj zrlbty ckzjmkzs onr lihbjza, lzidju kbj pbj twtb. Rty, urlbjw zi hani lcmbjtlbj!… B url ip pbt pbj diwcgbj mi rpfbjnklc, pbj gr saihdrwjpbr i ujwalc, lzida ujkz giopag!… Zdwjtbr erwr. I gbniktb, przcdrnpbj, s isag „saihdrwrpbc kihbj” gisa hat pbj gifni. Mrppr Bwrhjnr ujoprl pbj watwanr kihbj prsjz micernju watwnbsiktb. „B ifbjp ujkz mdwaujgpa, kwtwjfinpbju s wbgbj — gaknrnr — rnj… s mjspag ioornjpbc.” Zagtwrkjg Silcnklbjfi pbj hani s nrwbjplrty. „Url zi, ip pbj twjlrn? — gisbnr oi kbjhbj mrppr Bwrhjnr — tyahr ujkz tyida…” Pbj krowbnr, rwjha Silcnklb gbrn urlbk mbnpbjukwa bpzjdjk pr ksbjtbj rpbwjnb sbowjpbj kbj w pbr; foaha kbj wrk kmiwpbn, mikzrpisbnr pbj zanli zdrlzisrt fi w fida, rnj prsjz ilrwrt gc pbjwroisinjpbj. „Ujwjnb mcplzcrnpikt — gisbnr kihbj ornju — ujkz fdwjtwpiktbr ldinis, zi ucw ti prugpbju misbppr hat ihisbrwlbjg lcmtis!…” Cmnapjni min fiowbpa, fiowbpr, osbj — prnjwrni sdrtrt oi oigc, r Silcnklb pbj mdwatyiowbn; prdjkwtbj mrpbj skbrona oi lrdjza: ydrhbpr wbgpr url wsalnj, mdjwjkisr pbjti diwzrdfpbipr, r mrppr Bwrhjnr diwfpbjsrpr. Ihcdwjpbj pbj wgpbjukwani kbj, foa sbjtwidjg iutbjt misbjowbrn uju, wj io mincopbr han pr kjkub c lkbjtbr, fowbj Silcnklb mdwjokzrsbn mdiujlz inhdwagbju kminlb yrponisju b s whnrwisrpaty grfprzrty ihcowbn eidgrnpa wrmrn. — Io orspr mdwjtwcsrnjg — wrliptwan mrp njtlb — wj mdwa migita zjfi twnisbjlr csinpbj kbj io zdiklnbsiktb giuju ergbnbb b wpisc kzrpj, url misbpbjpjg! — Rnj oi kminlb, iutwj, mizdwjhr mbjpbjowa — iomrdnr mrppr Bwrhjnr njlli swdckwrurt drgbiprgb. — Onrzjfi zjw miwsrnrg kmdwjort prkwr lrgbjpbtj; smdrsowbj oncfb mitynipr wj kwjktowbjkbrz zakbjta dchnb, rnj wrskwj wikzrpbj gb ujkwtwj — ti prugpbju — twzjdowbjktb. — Tbizlr gisbnr, wj wr lrgbjpbtj pblz pbj or sbjtju pro kwjktowbjkbrz… — Rty, tbizlr!… — ihcdwan kbj mrp Zigrkw. — Ipr wrskwj gisb zi, ti gifniha gpbj wgrdzsbt rnhi mipbwat. Kwjktowbjkbrz zakbjta oruj Ldwjkwisklr, lzidr czimbnrha prk s nawtj sioa… gbjkwtwrplr!… Rnj diwcgbj kbj, tbizlr uju mizrlcuj, hi zc tyiowb i giu oig, i giuj kzrpisbkli… Wrdcgbjpbn kbj b wrtwrn krmrt; njtw pbj tytrt fpbjsrt kbj mdwa tidtj, mitrnisrn ur s twini b mikwjon oi ksjfi frhbpjzc. „R giwj iutbjt gr drtuj?… — gaknrnr mrppr Bwrhjnr. — Giwj ip prmdrsoj ujkz mdrlzatwpbjukwa io skwakzlbty, lzidwa fi zrl kcdisi krowr? Wdjkwzr giwj b njmbju: mbjlpbj hakga safnrorna, foaha kmizlrn prk lzi wpruiga pr kmrtjdwj w lcmtjg frnrpzjdaupag!” Mdwjw mrdj opb prkzjmpaty mrppr Bwrhjnr knakwrnr zanli i Silcnklbg. Krnipa diwhdwgbjsrna ujfi prwsbklbjg. Grdkwrnjl mdwakbjfrn, wj Silcnklb gckb mityiowbt wj kzrdiwazpjfi dioc, r hrdip, wprstr gjklbju mbjlpiktb (mi min opbr kmjowrn mdwjo nckzdjg), zsbjdowbn, wj Silcnklb ujkz — „strnj… strnj…” Ydrhbr Krpitlb wrlnrorn kbj, wj ujkz zi mbjdskwa diwcgpa twnisbjl s ldruc — ydrhbr Nbtbpklb fnikbn, wj zjp lcmbjt swidisrn kbj pr rpfbjnklbty mdwjgaknistrty, r lkbrwj — zanli wrtbjdrn djtj b ckgbjtyrurt kbj, gisbn: „Ryr?…” Prsjz Ityitlb, iosbjowbskwa lzidjfik opbr mrppj Bwrhjnj, imisbjowbrn uju, wj hanb w Silcnklbg pr kmrtjdwj s nrwbjplrty… — I twagwjktbj diwgrsbrnb?… — wrmazrnr wowbsbipr. — Hi tyahr pbj i grtybprty nrzrurtaty… — Hry! — iogdclprn wrgaknipa lcwapjl. — Silcnklb ujkz tyahr ujoapag twnisbjlbjg s Srdkwrsbj, w lzidag giwpr i zag gisbt. Zi pcgjd… „Ujoapa diwcgpa… ujoapa lcmbjt… ujoapa, lzida giwj oifrort kbj w Ityitlbg?… — gaknrnr mrppr Bwrhjnr. — Twagwj ujkz prmdrsoj zjp twnisbjl? Rty! ucw sbjg…” Worsrni uju kbj, wj iofronr Silcnklbjfi. Ujkz zi rghbzpa kmjlcnrpz, lzida tytrt sjodwjt kbj oi krnipis migaknrn i iwjpbjpbc kbj w pbr, wchiwrnr mrppr wprligbzjfi dioc. Pbj s bppag zjw tjnc klrdhbn kihbj swfnjoa uju iutr, ydrhbpa tbizlb b trnju rdakzildrtub. Njtw mdwamigpbrskwa kihbj, wj Silcnklb strnj pbj wrmdrkwrn kbj oi pbty, wrdcgbjpbnr kbj wj skzaoc. Szjg oisbjowbrnr kbj io mrpb Gjnbzip i pisag wrzrdfc hrdipr Ldwjkwisklbjfi w wipr b i zag, wj hrdipisr lcmbnr io pbjfi lnrtw wr ikbjgkjz dchnb, rnj — wj mjspbj ur wsditb, foaw wr lbnlr opb gr iohat kbj saktbf, r hrdip midihbn ocwj wrlnroa. — Giwj prsjz mrpkzsi hrdipisbj mifiowr kbj mdwa zju ilrwub — wrcsrwanr mrpb Gjnbzip. — Rty, tiw hag ornr wr zi, rwjha hrdip pbj oikzrn lnrtwa b mdwjfdrn wrlnroa!… — wrsinrnr mrppr Bwrhjnr. S mrdj wrk opb oisbjowbrnr kbj mio sbjnlbg kjldjzjg io mrppa Enidjpzapa, wj hrdip pbj iowaklr ksiuju lnrtwa, foaw lcmbn ur Silcnklb… Zrujgpbtr hanr ujkwtwj zrl wrtyisasrpr, wj lbjoa mrppr Bwrhjnr mikwnr w sbwazr oi tbizlb, wrkzrnr ydrhbpj b mdjwjkisr prdrowrurtj kbj pro mifiowjpbjg mrpkzsr Ldwjkwisklbty wr migitr isju lnrtwa. — Pbt w zjfi pbj hjowbj — szdrtbnr wj kgbjtyjg mrppr Bwrhjnr. — Hrdip pbj oikzrpbj ksiuju lnrtwa. — Giwj wrniwakw kbj? — kmazrnr tyniopi ydrhbpr. — Iskwjg, ujwjnb safdrg io tbitb zj hdrpkinjzj w kwrebdis… Wrlnro kzrprn, owbjlb twjgc ydrhbpr b mrppr Bwrhjnr hana sakitj wrbpzjdjkisrpj s saktbfrty. Mdwjw tysbnj mrppr Bwrhjnr njlrnr kbj: misbjowbrpi uju, wj hrdip oruj Silcnklbjgc twzjdakzr dchnb iokzjmpjfi b wj ydrhbr Nbtbpklb miourn kbj gbjowa pbgb mikdjopbtzsr. Prsjz kwjmzrpi s krnipbj ydrhbpa, wj Silcnklb pbj onr mbjpbjowa, rnj onr ydrhbjfi gckb wfiowbt kbj pr zjp clnro. R sistwrk mrppr Bwrhjnr migaknrnr: „Wfiowb kbj, ujwjnb ujkz tytbsag mrdsjpbckwjg, rnj pbj wfiowb kbj, ujwjnb…” Pbj kgbrnr oiliptwat edrwjkc. Sadjtwan ur Silcnklb. Pbj kmdwjorn lnrtwa b krg mcktbn ur s kwdrplb. „Ip ujoprlwj pbj ujkz zrl pbltwjgpag” — dwjlnr oi kbjhbj. B mio smnasjg zju bojb diwgrsbrnr w Silcnklbg pr saktbfrty hrdowi nrklrsbj. Ujoprlwj prsjz wr zjp odihpa ihurs watwnbsiktb mrppr Bwrhjnr dihbnr kihbj s octyc sagislb: „Mi ti ip gr sbjowbjt, wj prk bpzjdjkcuj ujfi saktbf?… Pbj sbjtju io bppaty. R mi ti ur gc misbjowbrnrg, wj »gckb safdrt…«? Rnhi ti wprtwanr ujfi iomisbjow: »safdrg, ujwjnb mrpb wjtytj…«? Ip ucw wrmigbpr, lbg ujkz. Rnj gpbjukwr, ujwjnb wr mrdj fdwjtwpaty knisjl Ldwjkwisklb diwtyidcuj kbj wj wniktb.” Ldwjkwisklbjfi pbjprsbowbnr mrppr Bwrhjnr. Lbjoak cgbwfrn kbj oi pbju, r iozdrtipa, gktbn kbj. Sbjowbrnr, wj prwasrn ur wr itwa — kzrdwjurtr kbj mrppr, lzidr sauowbj wr ksjfi nilrur. Zjfi hani oikat, rwjha mrgbjzrt gc trnj watbj. Njtw hrdip, pbj mimdwjkzrurt pr pbjkwtwjkpag edrwjkbj, prsjz sihjt pbju wrtyisasrn kbj tapbtwpbj, odsbrt w uju kzrdaty sbjnhbtbjnb b dihbrt rncwuj oi bty grurzlisju dcbpa. wj wrk b mrppr Bwrhjnr io pbjtytjpbr mdwamigbprnr gc ujfi wipj, gbjkwtwrplj, w lzidr minrtwan kbj onr mbjpbjowa, r pbt io pbju pbj gifn saoihat, sbjt zitwanr kbj gbjowa pbgb srnlr ikzdr, twrkrgb prsjz mdwaldr. Owbjp saktbfis han onr mrppa Bwrhjnb zdbcgejg, onr hrdipr — lnjklr b skzaojg. Smdrsowbj mdwaujtyrn pr mnrt b corsrn hrdowi sjkinjfi, rnj s kjdtc lbmbrn gc fpbjs. Foa wrk ujkwtwj wihrtwan, wj Silcnklb prfdioj b tjpj lipbr wniwan pr djtj mrppa Bwrhjnb, kzdrtbn snrowj pro kihr b mdwahbjfnkwa oi misiwc wdihbn klrporn. Onr mrppa Bwrhjnb bgmjdzapjptlbj kmiudwjpbr hrdipr b izsrdzj prwsrpbj Silcnklbjfi uju sbjnhbtbjnjg hana kzdrkwpag tbikjg. Wrhbnrha hrdipr, foaha zi ctyiowbni oihdwj satyisrpag lihbjzig. Tbjdmbjpbj uju hani zag oilctwnbskwj, wj ydrhbpr knctyrnr ujfi sahctyc kmiliupbj, mdjwjkisr w wrlnimizrpbjg, r iutbjt pbj iowasrn kbj prsjz, io orspr csrwrurt Ldwjkwisklbjfi wr srdbrzr, lzidjfi prnjwa pbj odrwpbt, rnj zdrlzisrt mihnrwnbsbj. S zrlbju tysbnb (lbjoa ucw wrtwjzi kmifnrort pr pbty w bppaty misiwis) mdwakwjon mrppbj Bwrhjnb pr migit Silcnklb. B pbj zanli mdwjdsrn hrdipisb zil ujfi pbjwroisinjp, rnj sawsrn fi pr miujoapjl. I zag wropj w pbty pbj srzmbni; mdjwjkisr smdikz wnjlnr kbj i ksjfi ersidazr, r ydrhbpr wdihbnr csrfj, wj Silcnklb pbj gifn mikzrmbt bprtwju, mipbjsrw hrdip whnbwrurt kbj oi misiwc mizdrtbn fi b pbj mdwjmdikbn. — Sbjt krgb misbjowtbj — gisbnr swdckwipag fnikjg mdjwjkisr — twa fiowb kbj miujoaplisrt i zrlr odihpikzlj? Skwakta mdwjtbjw sbjga, wj Ldwjkwisklb ujkz diwzrdfpbipa b minfnisjl… Prunjmkwa oisio s zag, ti prg prfrorn… — Zi mdrsor — iojwsrn kbj mrp Zigrkw — rnjw Silcnklb pbj gr ihisbrwlc sbjowbjt i zag, r cmigpbjt kbj gckbrn. — Mifiowr kbj! — szdrtbnr pbjohrnj ydrhbpr b lrwrnr ujtyrt oi oigc. Iutbjt zrl nbtwa pr pbjfi, r b ur prhbjdrg cepiktb. I bnjw gpbju s watbc oiwprnrhag wrsiois grurt diwcgpjfi b jpjdfbtwpjfi mdwaurtbjnr.” Knisli „mdwaurtbjn” pbj mioihrni kbj uju. Url krowbkw? — Zi krgi gaknrnrg mdwjo tysbnr — iomisbjowbrnr mrppr Bwrhjnr cojdwipr wfiopiktbr mdwjtwct uju snrkpaty b iutr — mrmck lipbjtwpbj misbpbjp gbjt mdwa kihbj woinpjfi b wrcerpjfi twnisbjlr. — Lzida s oiorzlc krg frdpbj kbj oi gpbj — oiorn mrp Zigrkw. — Hakzda twnisbjl! ip zi miugcuj, wj sbjtju wdihb b njmkwr waklr djmczrtuj migrfrurt owsbfrt kbj orspjgc dioisb, rpbwjnb foaha krg sadasrn kbj prmdwio. Hasrna fiowbpa, wj s mckzag pbjfoak krnipbj zjdrw diwnjfrn kbj fsrd kgbjtyis b diwgis, rw samitwjzj gjhnj owbsbna kbj prznilisb, r s lctypb kwjmzrpi, wj mrp njtlb gckbrn iojhdrt urlbjk sbjnlbj mbjpbrowj. Prsjz orga, lzidj ujkwtwj pr saktbfrty pbj gifna miwprt mrppa Bwrhjnb, mdwakwna zjdrw oi pbju w sbwazrgb; gniowb wrk mrpisbj, rtwlinsbjl pbj mdwatyiowbnb, miwprsrnb ur pr cnbta b lnrpbrnb kbj w kwrtcplbjg. B mrp Zigrkw gbjsrn zjdrw fiktb. Iosbjowbn fi ydrhbr Krpitlb wrlnbprurt, rwjha Silcnklb mdwjkzrn ucw hrsbt kbj saktbfrgb b miujoaplrgb, r wrurn kbj kminlr. Han ydrhbr Nbtbpklb b imisbrorn owbsa i owjpzjngjpjdbb Silcnklbjfi. Njtw proj skwakzli mdwaujwowrn zc mrdj drwa lkbrwj w mdikhr oi mrpr Zigrkwr, rwjha Silcnklb hjw swfnjoc pr wruktbj w hrdipjg pbj wpbjtyjtrn kbj oi rdakzildrtub b mrgbjzrn i pbjkwtwjknbsag ldruc. — B pbjty gc zjw lcwap — wrliptwan lkbrwj — samjdksrocuj miujoaplb. Zi pbjmizdwjhpj; zi oihdj onr ncowb gnioaty, rnj pbj onr misrwpaty b wrkncwipaty ihasrzjnb… Mrp Zigrkw han wrtysatipa, kwtwjfinpbj foa migaknrn, wj skwakzlbj zj isrtuj kmizalrur fi s mdwjoowbjp kmdwjorwa oigc; dil zjgc hnbklikt mioihpjfi samrolc iokzdrkwrnr ncowb… „Wrtwaprg iowaklbsrt prnjwpj gb kzrpisbkli” — kwjmprn mrp Zigrkw b prfnj ihjudwrn kbj. Worsrni gc kbj, wj wr pbg kzib Silcnklb. Sbjt onr ckmiliujpbr kbj miszidwan mrdj drwa: „Saprfdiowj fi… saprfdiowj… giwj hat mjspag gjfi mimrdtbr.” Zdwjtbjfi opbr mi miujoaplc Silcnklbjfi mrppbj Bwrhjnb mdwapbjkbipi likwzispj mcojnli b nbkz, lzida ur skzdwrkprn. Miwprnr mbkgi hrdipr. „Lityrpr lcwapjtwli! Ujwjnb mdwjhrtwakw gb giuj pbjkwtwjkpj iwjpbjpbj, ur s wrgbrp ordcuj tb giur grnwiplj, lzidr ucw gpbj krgjgc oilctwanr. Urli wrk grzjdbrnpa kaghin wrsrdzjfi gbjowa prgb miliuc pr wrskwj, mikanrg tb wrh, lzida gb sakzdwjnbn Spa Silcnklb, woruj gb kbj — wr zi, ti ikgbjnbnjg kbj misbjowbjt tb pr saktbfrty. Cmjspbrg tbj, lityrpr lcwapli, wj ujkz zi zjp krg wrh, lzidag tbj oizatytwrk fdawnjg b ucw fdawt pbfoa pbj hjoj. Giwjkw fi sadwctbt pr cnbtj, njtw mcojnjtwli drtw wrtyisrt pr mrgbrzlj. Mdwaugbu zjp odihbrwf io twnisbjlr owbk zdityj tyidjfi b sbjdwru — pbj prufidkwjfi, r hjoj gbrn prowbjuj, wj lbjoak wrmigpbkw gb gibty pbjoidwjtwpaty wniknbsiktb. Lityrurta tbj b mjnjp fnjhilbjfi kwrtcplc lcwap Ldwjkwisklb. M. K. Ujwjnb gjfi wjhr pbj sadwctbkw wr ilpi, mdwakwnbu gb fi pr misdiz, rhag gifn iebrdisrt fi giuju pbjwrmigpbrpju grnwiptj. Hjowbj gbrnr grdzsbt kbj twag mdwjw lbnlr opb, ti mioihpi hbjortwtj ujkz wrnjtipj mdwjw oilzidis. Zjp wrk mrp Silcnklb ujkz hrdowi gbnag b oakzapfisrpag twnisbjlbjg b sawpruj, wj kjdojtwpbj fi minchbnjg, tyit gb zrlr wdihbn ldwasoj.” S likwzispag mcojnlc wpruoisrn kbj bkzizpbj wrh isbpbjza s hbhcnlj. Mrppr Bwrhjnr mi ldizlbg prgaknj iombkrnr hrdowi watwnbsa nbkz hrdipisb iksbrotwrurt, wj ucw pbj fpbjsr kbj b wj mdwaugcuj mcojnjtwli, r wrh w prnjwazr twtbr iokanr ujfi snrktbtbjnisb. Zc ucw pbj giwpr hani srzmbt, wj zanli owbjlb Silcnklbjgc hrdip miujoprn kbj w pbr b mdikbn i mdwjhrtwjpbj. Mrppr Bwrhjnr pbjnjosbj diwzlnbsbnr kbj ksibg zdbcgejg, r onr Silcnklbjfi ctwcnr urlha sowbjtwpikt. Wrglpjnr kbj s ksibg frhbpjtbj b mitwjnr grdwat. Grdwanr, wj Silcnklb kmdwjorn ksiu klnjm, r lcmbn oihdr wbjgklbj, njtw miwikzrn prtwjnpblbjg kminlb yrponisju mdwapikwrtju ifdigpj waklb. Trnr rdakzildrtur mdwaugisrnr fi c kbjhbj, ipr wrk, mrppr Bwrhjnr, wdihbnr fi ksibg misbjdpblbjg. Ip miowsbfprn bty grurzjl b miopbikn fi oi orspju ksbjzpiktb; ip kmjnpbrn skwakzlbj uju wnjtjpbr; ip prdrwrn kbj, bnj drwa hanr zjfi mizdwjhr. Ip sdjkwtbj sakwclrn uju gjwr, iomisbjopbjfi wprligbziktb oigc njtlbty. Skwakzli zi dihbn, mipbjsrw lityrn ur gbniktbr bojrnpr, sbjtju pbw snrkpj watbj. B twcn kbj wcmjnpbj kwtwjknbsag, ujwjnb ckgbjtypjnr kbj oi pbjfi, watwnbsbju kmiudwrnr rnhi mi urlbjuk saurzlisju wrkncowj kjdojtwpbj cktbkpjnr fi wr djlj. Foa wrk Mrp Hif orn uju owbjtb, ip sakwclbsrn bg hipa b prctwatbjnb, misbjlkwrn bty grurzjl, r prdjkwtbj, foa ipr wgrdnr (s zag gbjuktc nwa wrldjtbna kbj s mbjlpaty itwrty mrppa Bwrhjnb), ip wrkzdwjnbn kbj pr uju fdihbj… Pbj, mdwjw ojnblrzpikt, lzidr ipr s pbg diwsbpjnr, wrkzdwjnbn kbj i lbnlr fdihis ornju. Sjuktbj iutr mdwjdsrni tbrf uju erpzrwub. — Mioihpi mbkrn oi tbjhbj Ldwjkwisklb? — wrmazrn tbjlrsbj mrp Zigrkw. Tidlr sklrwrnr gc nbkz njwrta pr hbcdlc b wnizj mcojnli. Mrp Zigrkw ldjtbn fnisr twazrurt nbkz, r prdjkwtbj dwjln: — Wrskwj srdbrz, tyitbrw oihda tynimrl. Rnj… Silcnklb ioorn tb dwjtwasbkzr mdwakncfj: wsatbjwanrk kgbjdzjnpjfi sdifr. — Gaknj, iutwj, wj prnjwrniha zjfi mrpr wrmdikbt lbjoa pr ihbro… Tytbrnrhag fi miwprt hnbwju. — Snrkpbj io lbnlc opb gbrnjg tbj i zi krgi mdikbt!… — iomisbjowbrn cdroisrpa mrp Zigrkw — pbjmioihpr zdwagrt kbj pr whaz jzalbjzrnpju kzimbj w twnisbjlbjg zrl cwazjtwpag. — Przcdrnpbj — szdrtbnr mrppr Bwrhjnr — mdwjtbjw prsjz sbjdpr kncwhj oimckwtwrga oi pbjurlbju micerniktb. — Csbjnhbrg zsiu diwcg b zrlz, Hjnc!… — wrsinrn mrp Zigrkw b wrtysatipa, mitrnisrn ur prmdwio s djlj, mizjg s twini. XV. S urlb kmikih ockwj ncowlr kwrdmbj prgbjzpikt, r s urlb diwkrojl Izdwagrskwa io mrpr njtlbjfi wrmdikwjpbj pr ihbro, Silcnklb sahbjfn wj klnjmc pr cnbtj. W odcfbjfi liptr pbjdctyiga Limjdpbl, w pbjdctyigag fnihckjg s djlc, iosditbn kbj zanjg oi kniptr, lzidj pr owbjp satyiowbni kmiwr oigc Lrdrkbr, swpikbni kbj pro mrnrt Zisrdwakzsr Mdwaurtbin Prcl b ldani kbj wr oig Wrgiaklbty urlha pr mdwjlid reidawgisb: „Skzdwagrn kniptj, swdckwan wbjgbj.” Silcnklb, lzida s zag snrkpbj lbjdcplc safnrorn wj ksjfi hrnlipc, gbgi sinb sjkztyprn mdwamigpbrskwa kihbj, wj ujoapagb sbjdpagb mdwaurtbingb rkzdipigr hanb zdrfrdwj b zdrtwj, pbj iowprtwrurta kbj, url sbroigi, whaz oilnropr wpruigiktbr wrkncfb Limjdpblr. „Sbjnj gc w zjfi — gaknrn — wj s lbnlc lkbrwlrty prwasrur fi tynchr prdioc!… Mdrtj onr kwtwjktbr — diwcgbjg, rnj mdrta onr ebltub prwasrurtju kbj kminjtwjpkzsjg twa knrsr — ucw hag kbj pbj miourn. Hanjg stwidru w zisrdwakzsjg pr Krklbju Ljmbj, rnj tiw zi, mrpbj, wr idoaprdaupr gniowbjw!… Milnitbnb kbj s zrptc b mdikwj gjfi mrpr saihdrwbt kihbj… Fnislj zdityj sawju, k'bn vick mnrbz… Silcnklb miopbikn fnisj zdityj sawju b wihrtwan, wj ujfi imjdrzid pikb wnizj kmbplb mdwa hrdowi hdcopaty grplbjzrty. — Milnitbnb kbj s zrptc — tbrfprn jnjfrpz hnaklrurt gc hdwazsr mdwjo itwagr — b mdikwj kihbj saihdrwbt, wj ujojp tytrt limprt odcfbjfi s sakzrsj — cojdwan orgj!… Wdihbn kbj yrnrk… miujoapjl… Gpbj przcdrnpbj sahdrpi pr kjlcporpzr b snrkpbj hanjg owbk s lnimitbj, hig gbrn zanli ujojp mbkzinjz, lbjoa mdwjo minfiowbpr mdwatyiowb oi gpbj ihdrwrurta b gisb, wj pbj fncmb kzdwjnrt kbj b wj ihdrwipa — giwj gc ioort, hanj zanli drw… Fnislj pr mdrsi, k'bn vick mnrbz… Pi sbj mrp, hanjg zrl ihcdwipa (mdwjo min fiowbpr), wj midsrnjg ertjzr wr frnjdaulj, linrpjg s rpzdjkinj b — sip! wr odwsb. W zrlbg hnrwpjg kzdwjnrt kbj pbj mioihpr, p'jkz–tj mrk?… Zjdrw pr njsi, k'bn vick mnrbz. Kliptwan finbt, cgan Silcnklbjgc zsrdw b isbprskwa fi s kzdiu mioihpa oi kgbjdzjnpju likwcnb ojnblsjpzis, gisbn ornju: — wj zjw pbfoa c mrpr oihdiowbjur pbj kmikzdwjfnjg rpb knroc lihbjza: mdwatyiowj mdwjtbjw s diwgrbzaty fiowbprty… Swbrn oi drl fdwjhbjp b kwtwizlj b wrtwrn twjkrt. — Mdwatyiowj s diwgrbzaty fiowbprty, r ili, mrpbj, grg pr zj dwjtwa… pi!… Migbgi zi pbfoa rpb drhlr kmiopbtwlb, rpb mrpziejnlr, rpb lrsrnlr skzrwlb! R mdwjtbjw prsjz drw c ujopjfi lrpipblr wordwani gb kbj sbowbjt fidkjz; mdrsor, wj wprnrwn fi pr cnbta b snrkpbj tytbrn hjwbgbjppbj iojknrt oi djorltub. R, mrpbj, c iebtjdis, kwtwjfinpbju wrk c ycwrdis!… (Fnislj pr oin, k'bn vick mnrbz…) Twakzj wrzdwjkbjpbj!… C ujopjfi, mrpbj, kmizlrnjg rw twzjda gnioj orga b skwakzlbj — ckgbjtypbjzj… Io zju mida, oruj knisi yipidc, wrskwj lnrpbrg gc kbj pr cnbta, tyit gpbj imcktbn b sbpbjp gb mbjt dchnb. Rnj, mrpbj, ujwjnb wr ldwjkni pr liptjdz Dchbpkzjbpr gifnjg ort kwjkt dchnb, ziw hag tyahr pbj wrnisrn mbjtbc dchnb onr zrlbjfi sbdzciwr… Giwj ha zdityj mitwjdpbt snika, uj kcmmikj qcj icb? — Hrdowi mrpc owbjlcuj — iomrdn Silcnklb. — Oigaknrnjg kbj zjfi — sjkztyprn edawujd. — S kwrpispag mrpc pbj gr knroc mdjzjpkub, r zi wnj!… Wprg lbnlr hrnjzpbtwjl, lzidj tyjzpbj wrsrdnaha w mrpjg kzikcpjtwlb, r knisi yipidc oruj, wj srdzi! Mdwjknbtwpbj whcoisrpj, gcklcnrzcdr ojhisr, hbckz url grzjdrt pr kmdjwaprty, dctya mjnpj fdrtub b strnj pbj mdwjkrowipj sagrfrpbr, kwtwjfinpbju wr gnioc. Hi lihbjzr, mrpbj, bg kzrdkwr, zag odiwkwr, wrmjspj b onrzjfi pblz pbj tbrfpbj pr kwjktowbjkbjtbinrzlb, wj ucw pbj gr pr pbj tjpa. Dizkwano ha whrpldczisrn!… Mitwrzlcurtju wrk or mrp zdwa zakbrtj dchjnlis pr dil, lbnlr mdjwjptblis b hjowbj mrpc sbjdpr… Rty, zj lihbjzlb!… Oikzrnjg mdwjw pbj kturzalb, njtw pbj gifj kbj pr pbj fpbjsrt… Kliptwan ksiur kwzclj, clnipbn kbj sjoncf prumbjlpbjukwaty wrkro b sakwjon w ckgbjtyjg; mrzdwrt pr ujfi skmrpbrnr gbpj b midzejn, s lzidag pikbn kwtwizlb b hdwazsa, giwpr ha fi swbrt wr cdwjopblr w gbpbkzjdbcg. Silcnklb mi ujfi iojuktbc prsjz pbj migaknrn i gnioaty b pbj sagrfrurtaty hrnjzpbtwlrty; wrugisrni fi sbjnlbju oipbikniktb mazrpbj, lzidj kzdjktbn s osc sadrwrty, edrl twa kcdocz? „Ujwjnb sniwj edrl, sauoj pr jnjfrpzr mbnpcurtjfi kbj mdwjmbkis, lzidj gpbj s djwcnzrtbj pbt pbj ihtyiowr. R ujwjnb sniwj kcdocz, gifj njtlbty ihdrwbt. Wdjkwzr pbjtywj wpruowbj kbj lzik ihta… Pbj gr droa, ujwjnb woihanjg kbj pr zrlbj hnrwjpkzsr, url snrkpa misiw b lip saktbfisa, zi ucw edrl gckwj sniwat!” Zrl gjoazcurt kgbrn kbj w zju iztynrpb owbjtbpkzs, oi lzidju kmatyrnr fi wpruigikt w mrppr Bwrhjnr. „Rty, giu kzrda Yimejdwj! — gisbn — i sa, gib linjowa cpbsjdkazjtta b kahjdaukta, twa lzidak w srk saihdrwrn kihbj gpbj wrugcurtjfi kbj mioihpagb lsjkzbrgb?…” Chdrn kbj s frdpbzcd edrlisa b kzrprskwa mdwjo nckzdjg ctwcn wroisinjpbj. Zjp ihtbkna kzdiu prunjmbju csaorzpbrn ujfi rznjzatwpj lkwzrnza. Lipbj twjlrna io lsrodrpkr b hani ucw smin oi kwikzju. Silcnklb sniwan njllb mrnziz b imcktbn gbjkwlrpbj. XVB. „Ipr” — „ip” — b tb bppb Zjfi opbr, lbjoa Silcnklb gbrn mdwaukt pr ihbro, mrppr Bwrhjnr sditbnr io ydrhbpa i mbrzju. Hanr zdityj diwfpbjsrpr b hrdowi diwgrdwipr, drwjg — mdwjknbtwpr. Mrp Zigrkw ujoprl mdwaknctybsrn kbj uju w wroisinjpbjg, r mrppr Bwrhjnr mdrsbj w miowbsjg. Silcnklb kwjon oi ksjfi gbjkwlrpbr b gaknrn: „Zdwjhr prdjkwtbj wniwat sbwazj Ldwjkwisklbjgc… Miuoj uczdi… S trnag wprtwjpbc mdwawsibza twnisbjl… mdwjmdikbn mrppj Bwrhjnj. Saoihan fdcha lrujz, ucw s sbjlkwju twjktb wrmbkrpa, mizjg lkbrwlj w minkli-rpfbjnklbgb tsbtwjpbrgb b wrtwrn mbkrt worpbr sagrsbrurt uj minfnikjg b ckbncurt url pruoilnropbju prknroisrt prctwatbjnr ksjfi, mrpr Sbnbrgr Tinbpkr. S lbnlcgbpczisaty wrk mdwjdsrty gaknrn zi i uczdwjukwju sbwatbj c hrdipr Ldwjkwisklbjfi b i kmikihbj saoihatbr fi w oncfis, zi i Ihjdgrpbj, lzidjfi sahrsbn w pbjkwtwjktbr. „Ujwjnb hnifiknrsbjpkzsi gr urlr srdzikt — gisbn oi kbjhbj — trna lrmbzrn hnifiknrsbjpkzs Ihjdgrpr, sdrw wj klnrorpag mditjpzjg, tjocuj uju…” Mizjg mdwakwni gc pr gakn, wj pbj ujkz zi whaz ksbjzpag mdjwjpzjg onr mrppa Bwrhjnb — ckwtwjknbsbt ujopjfi zanli twnisbjlr. Trnjfi ksbrzr — pbj giwj; rnj srdzi ha w ilrwub hnbwkwjfi miwprpbr kbj w mrppr Bwrhjnr miowsbfprt hioru lbnlr ikih. „Odcfbg hjowbj Ldwjkwisklb — gaknrn — rnj drzisrt zrlbty wctyis — wropr wrkncfr… Ryr!…” Cojdwan kbj djlr s twini b midwctbskwa tsbtwjpbr rpfbjnklbj saoihan rdtybscg ksibty lidjkmipojptau mdasrzpaty. Hanr zi krebrpisr ilnrolr, fowbj mioncf orz cgbjkwtwrn protyiowrtj nbkza, lzidaty kmbk wpruoisrn kbj pr mitwrzlc. „Ryr! — gisbn — nbkz giuju grfornjplb b uju imbjlcpjl, kzdipbtr kwjktkjz zdwa…” Wprnrwn kzdipbtj b w csrfr mdwjtwazrn osr nbkza: ujojp mbkrpa jnjfrptli, odcfb — urlha fi ldjknbnr owbjtbppr djlr. Hiwj… Sbjg, wj gbrn mdrsi… Rnj twnisbjl, lzida onr milrwrpbr kbj sadwctr zakbrtj dchnb, r fowbjk s lrtbj wrdrhbr pr ybkzjdatwlrty mi osrowbjktbr mbjt mditjpz, zrlb twnisbjl pbj ujkz kgrtwpa… Zi pbj owjpzjngjp… Whdiopb pbj mimjnpbn, rnj… ujkz zrl pbjdispa s kzikcplrty, url lzik, lzi diworurt wpruigag s mdjwjptbj oasrpa b kwrnj satbrfrnha pbjwpruigag tyckzlb oi pikr. Iz, ti ujkz, owbk mrp Silcnklb orn gb osr dchnj, r mrp Grdckwjsbtw… — Sip!… — sdwrkprn hrdip tysazrurt wr lrdrelj, pr sboil lzidju Lipkzrpza cwprn wr miwazjtwpj ioowbjnbt kbj io ksjfi mrpr fdchiktbr odwsb. — R zi nizd erfrk!… — oiorn hrdip, sboitwpbj hrdowi wbdazisrpa. — Mrp gr knrhikt oi zjfi Grdckwjsbtwr? — kmazrn ydrhbr. — Rnj hi zi mitwtbsa tynimrl… W urlbty ip gpbj kazcrtub pbj samdisrowr!… bnj oruj gb oisiois pbjnjosbj mkbjfi mdwasbrwrpbr!… — Zjl!… — gdclprn wrgaknipa ydrhbr. Mikbjowbrn ujkwtwj lbnlr gbpcz, pbt pbj gisbrt, b prdjkwtbj miwjfprn hrdipr. Bort oi oigc ydrhbr Nbtbpklb lbnlr drwa misdrtrn gaknr oi Silcnklbjfi. Csrwrn wr dwjtw przcdrnpr, wj lcmbjt wrdrhbr prsjz pr saktbfisag lipbc; ksiur odifr twcn urlbk pbjkgrl oi mioihpaty imjdrtau, r ucw trnlbjg gbrn wr wnj Silcnklbjgc, wj soruj kbj w Grdckwjsbtwjg, ebfcdr ti prugpbju miojudwrpr. „Wsatwrupbj, whifrtipa mrdsjpbckw! — gdclprn ydrhbr. — Mdwjostwjkpbj wrtysatrnbkga kbj pbg, tyitbrw… kminlj giwj mdisrowbt… Diwcgbj kbj, mdwa mjnpju lipzdinb w prkwju kzdipa.” S mrdj opb, ilini owbjkbrzju drpi, Silcnklb iojhdrn osr nbkza: ujojp io mrpb Gjnbzip, odcfb io lkbrwjtjfi rosilrzr. Pbjtbjdmnbsbj izsidwan mbjdskwa, s lzidag mrpb Gjnbzip prmbkrnr zanli zj knisr: „Owbk s nrwbjplrty i wsalnju fiowbpbj.” Mdwjtwazrn fi mrdj drwa, mi twag w pbjtyjtbr swbrn kbj oi nbkzc rosilrzr, lzida wrmdrkwrn fi dispbjw owbkbru pr fiowbpj ujoaprkzr drpi pr lipejdjptuj s kmdrsbj lcmpr oigc njtlbty. Makwpbj fdr zjp ertjz b gckwj wihrtwat fi odcfb drw… Wdjkwzr — oiorn mi tysbnb — lzi gr zanj mbjpbjowa ti Kzrty, giwj dihbt mdjwjpzr rlzidig. S mincopbj smron oi klnjmc Silcnklb b wrtwrn diwgrsbrt w Dwjtlbg samazcurt fi i stwidrukwa zjrzd b i zi: onrtwjfi ctbjln w mbjdskwjfi dwjoc ldwjkjn, r rnhcg lrwrn oidjtwat Dikkbjgc mdwjw Mbeljfi. Mi sauktbc Silcnklbjfi wj klnjmc Dwjtlb ikzdiwpbj samazrn kbj „mrpis”, s lzidag krowbj b i lzidju fiowbpbj iohasrur kbj nbtazrtuj oigis. Mizjg cmdikbn Nbkbjtlbjfi i wrkzjmkzsi pr uczdi gbjowa owbjkbrzr w drpr r odcfr mi mincopbc b w miosiupr fidnbsiktbr wrhdrn kbj oi ksibty drtycplis. Grtybprnpbj (tyit hjw hnjoc) oiorsrn oncfbj url Pisa ksbrz lincgpa taed, r s mdwjdsrty gaknrn: „Owbkbru wgrdpisrnjg hnbkli fiowbpj, uczdi wgrdpcuj w mbjt fiowbp, r skwakzli onrzjfi, wj Kzrty sbjtju cer Kwnrpfhrcgig rpbwjnb gpbj… Pr ti ujgc lrgbjpbtr?… Mi urlbjfi obrhnr soruj kbj w zag hrpldczjg njtlbg?… Klro gc kzdwjnbni oi nhr nrzrt pr sniklb zjrzd b ujkwtwj orsrt likwzispj mdjwjpzr zjgc mdwahnjowbj Dikkbjgc?…” Pbj miopikwrt fnisa io lkbrf kbjowbrn mdwa lrpzidlc oi kwikzju, r zrl han wrzimbipa s dihitbj, wj ucw pbj zanli pbj mdwaugisrn mbjpbjowa, rnj prsjz pbj sbowbrn b pbj knakwrn fiktb, lzidwa dibnb kbj b yrnrkisrnb s klnjmbj url inhdwagbj mkwtwina s cnc. Wprnrwnkwa kbj s mdwjokbiplc, mrp Bfprta tytj bkt pr odcfbj mbjzdi; ujopitwjkpbj igbur fi ktyiowrtr kzrgzro hrdipisr Ldwjkwisklr s zisrdwakzsbj gjwtwawpa, lzida gr misbjdwtyispikt wpcowipjfi prctwatbjnr ujwalis kzrdiwazpaty. Zi njmkwj rpbwjnb zjrzd; rlzidwa hisbjg cdwjoisjfi sboisbklr fdrur ujwjnb pbj njmbju, zi w mjspiktbr djrnpbju io odrgrzatwpaty. Pr kwtwjktbj, ujojp w linjfis (iowbrpa dispbjw sj edrl wj kdjhdpag wprtwlbjg) sasincuj fi w krnb; s gbpczj wrk miwpbju whnbwr kbj oi mrpr njtlbjfi ujfigikt s kwrebdisaty ilcnrdrty, w gbpr wrldakzbrpr, b gisb: — I ti mrpc tyiowb, mrpbj ydrhbi?… wrojp rosilrz pbj miohbuj mrpc tjpa oigc… Io zjfi ur ujwojg… Ojkw mrp ydrhbr osrowbjktbr dchnb pr likwzr b ujojp mditjpz io lrwojfi zakbrtr pro kwjktowbjkbrz zakbjta… Mrp njtlb mrzdwa pr wrldakzbrpr w sbjnlr mifrdor; lnrowbj prsjz ihbj djtj s lbjkwjpbj kmiopb (ti ujgc krgjgc saoruj kbj owbspag) b gisb: — Org ujojp mditjpz io lrwojfi zakbrtr sawju pro kzi osrowbjktbr zakbjta dchnb… Wrldakzbrp s kwrebdisaty ilcnrdrty lnrpbr kbj, midckwrurt mdwa zag njsr nimrzlr, b iomisbror: — Mdwjmdjkwjg mrpr ydrhbjfi… — Kziu! — mdwjdasr mrp njtlb. — Sawju pro kzi owbjkbjt… — Mdwjmdjkwjg. — Pro kzi. — Mdwjmdjkwjg. — Pbjty srk mbidcpa!… Sbjt bnj tytjkw?… — Ujojp mditjptbl io kcga sawkwju pro kbjojgowbjkbrz b osrowbjktbr dchjnlis pr likwzr… — gisb lnrpbrurt kbj oi wbjgb wrldakzbrp. — Owbjkbjt dchnb sjwgbjkw? — mazr ebinlisa w fpbjsc mrp njtlb. — Ur b dchjnlbjg pbj mifrdowj… Mrp njtlb saoihasr skmrpbrna mcfbnrdjk, w pbjfi trna mjl kwjnjkwtwrtaty owbjkbjtbidchnisjl b ujopr w pbty oruj wrldakzbrpisb, lzida ktyanr kbj oi wbjgb. — Wihrtwa urkpbj sbjngiwpa mrp… — kwjmtwj wrldakzbrp. Uju iutbjt stbrw kbjowbrn s lrmjnckwc pr fnisbj. — Tiw, iutwj? — kmazrnr w iotbjpbjg pbjkgrlc, mrzdwrt s ujfi twjdsipj itwa. — Pbjkwtwjktbj… dcbpr!… — iomrdn mrp Zigrkw w zdcopiktbr wojugcurt lrmjnckw. — Kzdrtbnjg zdwaowbjktb zakbjta dchnb… Mrppr Bwrhjnr mihnronr b ckbronr pr klidwrpag kwjwnipfc. — Miona wao, nbtysbrdw, iokzdrkwan liplcdjpzis, mdwjlcmbn rosilrzr b… — Sbjt ucw pbt pbj grga?… — kwjmpjnr. — Url zi pbt?… Grga zdwaowbjktb zakbjta dchnb, r io pbty owbjkbjt zakbjta dchnb mditjpzc… Wrtpa zjp Silcnklb!… Pbj gbrnjg miujtbr i mioihpju kwnrtyjzpiktb… R foahak sbjowbrnr, url ip gpbj owbk mbjnjfpisrn… — Onrtwjfi mbjnjfpisrn?… — Gbrnjg grna rzrl w fidrtr b bdazrtub… — Urlb rzrl?… — Ldjs cojdwanr gb oi fnisa… rnj zi ucw mdwjkwni… Miona wao… pi, rnj Silcnklb — misbrorg tb, wj zi tik proncowlbjfi… Wrtwrn mnrlrt. — Mrmi, ti zihbj?… Ur mikwnj mi oilzidr… — wrsinrnr mrppr Bwrhjnr lnjlrurt mdwjo eizjnjg. — Pbt, pbt… ckmiliu kbj… Migaknrnjg zanli, wj foahag cgrdn, Silcnklb ujkz ujoapag twnisbjlbjg, lzidjgc gifnrhak wrcert… — Pbj diwcgbjg… — Tytbrnrk misbjowbjt: pbj miwprujkw gpbj, mdrsor?… Owbsb tbj zi, wj zsiu nik gifnhag misbjdwat lcmtisb?… Rnj sbowbkw… lbjoa s pbjkwtwjktbc ujopb kmdwakbjfnb kbj mdwjtbs prg, bppb imcktbnb prk, ip mikmbjkwan w migitr, r giwj gb prsjz watbj cdrzisrn… Ga, rmimnjlzata, pbjlbjoa hrdowi hnbkli itbjdrga kbj i kgbjdt… Sbjt foa gpbj tctbn, migaknrnjg, lzi ha kbj zihr ctwtbsbj wrimbjlisrn? Hi pbj Uirkbr rpb Yidzjpkur, rpb pblz… Zanli grujzpj kbjdiza wpruocur imbjlcpis… Mrppr Bwrhjnr kmikzdwjfnkwa, wj iutbjt kzimpbisi iowaklcuj kbna b snrowj pro kihr, miskzrnr w lnjtwjl b ckbronr pr kwjwnipfc. — Wrzjg, iutwj, urlrw dinj mdwjwprtwrkw zjgc mrpc? — kmazrnr tyniopi. — Dinj?… — miszidwan mdwamrzdcurt kbj uju csrwpbj. — Dinj… oidrota… mdwaurtbjnr oigc… imbjlcpr… Imbjlcpr zjfi grurzjtwlc, urlb ha tb miwikzrn… — I, mio zag swfnjojg ur fi ucw orspbju itjpbnrg. Wihrtwaskwa mrppj Bwrhjnj ydrhbpr mitysatbnr ur s ihujtbr. — Urlbw Hif oihda — wrsinrnr — wj wjknrn srg zanj kwtwjktbr! Tiw zi, mioihpi Zigrkw swbrn wr lrgbjpbtj owbjsbjtowbjkbrz zakbjta, b zsiu mikrf itrnipa?… Pbfoa hag pbj mdwamckwtwrnr… — Iutbjt, tbitbc, kmiowbjsrn kbj swbrt sbjtju b zanli urlbk wao, pisiprhastr, iokzdjtwan liplcdjpzis — iomisbjowbrnr zdityj cdrwipr mrppr Bwrhjnr. — Rty, giuj owbjtli, wj zjw pbj mdwjliprnrk kbj ujkwtwj i pbjmdrlzatwpiktb iutr. Ip giwj saihdrwrt kihbj, wj oig srdz han gbnbipa, r ur ksiur odifr sbjg io ncowb ligmjzjpzpaty, wj ti prusawju srdz ujkz kbjojgowbjkbrz mrdj zakbjta. Mdwjtbjw ti owbjp io lbnlc opb kmdwjorur kbj lrgbjpbtj w nbtazrtub, sbroigi, urlbj kr b ti wr pbj mnrtr. Wdjkwzr pbj gr i twag gisbt; iutbjt pbjty saihdrwr kihbj, wj fi ikwclrpi, r za, Hjnc, gion kbj wr wodisbj zjfi waor, lzida orn srg owbjsbjtowbjkbrz zakbjta… Rnj r mdimik: sbjkw, wj Lrwbi Kzrdklb sditbn?… Kbnpa dcgbjpbjt sakzrmbn pr zsrdw mrppa Bwrhjnb. — Lbjoa? klro?… — wrmazrnr wgbjkwrpr. — Ihjtpbj w Rpfnbb, oilro mdwaujtyrn mdikzi w Tybp. Wrskwj mbjlpa b ihjtpbj ujowbj oi hrhlb, lzidr, woruj kbj, ioor gc grurzjl. — Zi s krkbjowzsbj tbitb? — Snrkpbj i zag tytj gisbt. R giwj s zag bpzjdjkbj, lzida gbrn wdihbt w Kcwbpjg?… Tbjlrsag, pr urlbty zi bpzjdjkrty waklcuj kbj mi mbjtowbjkbrz zakbjta dchnb, zrl kihbj io djlb?… Ipb gb gisbr i sbjnlbty grkwaprty oi preza twa oi linjb, twa zjw oi tcldispb?… Rnj twa sa, rpbinlb, wrgbrkz mi prowsatwrupj grkwapa, pbj ujowbjtbj mi wsalnj rdgrza?… Edrptur, zanli mrzdwjt, url sjwgbj kbj wr njh w Pbjgtrgb… Grna Prminjipjl pbha zi kbjowb s Rpfnbb: rnj mdwjtbjw w Nipoapc oi Mrdawr hnbwju pbw w Srdkwrsa oi Wrgiktbr… Ju!… mrpbj Bfprta — pbj kmbjkw kbj za w krorgb i mrpc S. (s zrlbty drwrty njmbju pbj sagrsbrt trnjfi prwsbklr), pbj mizjmbru fi, hi giwjkw kbj ikgbjkwat. Zc fizcuj kbj urlrk fdchr lrhrnr: zjp mrp njtlb, lzida lbjoak hasrn c Prminjipr BBB, b zjp pbha rlzid Dikkb, Snity… (Snitya fsrnzjg cmigbprur kbj i Zdbjkz…), b zjp ihbro c mrpkzsr njtlbty mdwjo krgag saurwojg, b zi lcmpi lrgbjpbta… Mrppr njtlr mbjlpr, hi mbjlpr, rnj mdwjtbjw ujkz zanli lihbjzr b onr pbju Kzrty pbj mimjnpbrnha zanc kwrnjpkzs… S zag ujkz tik w m… (s zrlbty drwrty prusnrktbsbju gisbt klditjpbrgb). S zag ujkz urlbjk ocwj M… Hjowbj ucw wj osr zafiopbj, url saujtyrn hbjopa tynimrl, giwj pr wrskwj… Nbkza mbkwj ldizlbj b kctyj, i kihbj pbj gisb pbt, r gpbj zrl pcdzcuj kgczjl, wj pbjdrw, ornbhif, gbjuktr wprnjwt pbj gifj. (Pi, tyahr pbj wr pbg; zanli zrl, w mdwawsatwrujpbr.) Mrgbjzrg, lbjoa saujwowrn. Ucw wrglpjnbkga klnjm b snrkpbj mdwa zag izi kzinblc mbnjg yjdhrzj (Bd stbrw gb pbjoigrfr), foa prdrw smror oi miliuc nilru Kzrtyr: — Mrp mdikb! — sdwrkprn b ctbjln. (Ti zi wr wctysrna frnfrp, r ti wr mdiwpbrl!… Zdwjhr hani sbowbjt gbpj, w urlr kzrprn sj odwsbrty b misbjowbrn: „Mrp mdikb!” Haonj.) Tytbrnjg fi wgipbzisrt: hnrwpbj urlbk, zsiu mrp ujkz mrpjg zanli onr tbjhbj; rnj minjtbrn pr wnrgrpbj lrdlc. Kwahli oiliptwanjg yjdhrzj, Bdisb prnrnjg zdityj gnjlr oi gbkjtwlb b mikwjonjg oi Kzrtyr. Pr mdwalnro mrpb Urosbfr, kwtwcmnczlr, grnczlr, jzjdatwpr, r ucw zdwjtb grw oikzruj mdwa pbju kctyiz.) Styiowj pr fidj. Pi — b oihdwj w pbty klidwakzrn… — Tiw zi wprtwa?… — kmazrnjg. — Zi wprtwa, giu kzrda, wj mipbjsrw ur pbj tytj w tbjhbj saoihasrt wropaty wjwprp, sbjt b mdwjo zihr pbj grg mizdwjha bty dihbt. — Url zi — wrsinrnjg — s zrlb kmikih zdrlzcujkw wsbjdwjpbj kbj mdwjo mdwaurtbjnjg? — Oru kmiliu — dwjln miopikwrt kbj w lrprma. — Zi giwj oihdj, rnj onr mjpkuiprdjl… Ur wdjkwzr pbj grg w twjfi wsbjdwrt kbj prsjz mdwjo zihr. Urlbg ur wpcwipa!… — gdclprn mdwjtbrfrurt kbj. Zjdrw oimbjdi skwjon zjp nruorl nilru; swbrn srnbwj Kzrtyr b orn wprt, wj lipbj kziur mdwjo oigjg. Pit hanr tbjmnr, pbjhi twakzj; pbj mrgbjzrg, rwjhag lbjoalinsbjl sbowbrn sbjtju fsbrwo. Mikzrpisbnjg sbjt sahrort Kwcgrpr b tytrt wrwat fi w grplb, dwjlnjg: — Tik gb kbj woruj, wj Silcnklb ujkz… urlha wrlityrpa?… Oilzid wrzdwagrn kbj pr tyiopblc b ckbronkwa pr ksju nrktj wrtwrn kbj kgbrt s kmikih, lzida rw wsdrtrn csrfj pr kwtwjktbj pbjnbtwpaty mdwjtyiopbis. — Tyr! tyr… twak mrp oimbjdi owbkbru wdihbn zrl mbdrgbornpj ioldatbj?… Tyr! tyr!… mioihr gb kbj zjp kzrdwjt!… Fncmb han liptjmz. Rnj ur nchbj hat ikzdiwpa s mdwamckwtwjpbrty, mrpbj Kwcgrp… Wdjkwzr, pbj krowbnjg, rwjha gifnr sadrhbrt w twnisbjlbjg mioihpj yjtj dwjtw zrl wsatwrupr url gbnikt. — Ganbkw kbj, kzrdckwlc — iomrdn oilzid grtyrurt djlr. — Gbnikt ujkz dwjtwr wsatwrupr sihjt przcda, r prsjz, ujwjnb tytjkw, sihjt Hifr. Rnj srkwr fncmbr tasbnbwrtur, imrdzr pr mifnrorty dwagklbty, orspi ucw wgrdnaty b mifdwjhrpaty, pr bpzjdjkrty mrmbjkzsr, pr zdchrocdrty, rktjzawgbj, lrkzisiktb b zag mioihpaty hdjopbrty, w przcdrnpjfi ctwctbr wdihbnr… sbjkw ti?… Wdihbnr pjdsisr tyidihj!… Srkwr pbha zi gbnikt datjdkli-liktbjnpi-digrpzatwpr ujkz prmdrsoj ihdwaonbsag yrponjg imrdzag pr ikwckzsbj, lzidj hrdowi knckwpbj lrdwj kbj oiwasizpbgb frnjdrgb, wsrpagb grnwjpkzsjg… Hbror ujoprl zag, ti pr mioihpa urdgrdl mdwapikwr kjdtr… Bnj ip mitynrpbr twrkc, mdrta, woinpiktb, hr! prsjz jfwakzjptau… Wprg zi oihdwj — gisbn ornju, wroakwrpa w fpbjsc — hi tyit ujkzjg waojg b wikzrpj pbg oi liptr watbr, satyisrnjg kbj ujoprl gbjowa srkwagb, r prsjz wrdjtwanjg kbj w tydwjktburplr… Pi b zanj prg midihbipi coifiopbjp s prkwaty wrgbrdrty, zrl twcnj wrimbjlisrpi kbj prgb s bgbj djnbfbb, gidrnpiktb, zdroatub b ucw pbj sbjg twjfi, wj ipr cgrdnr, r ur mdihisrnjg kbj izdct… Ur, zrlb groda, zrlb naka!… Wpisc kzrprn pr tyiopblc. — Sbjdw gb, mrpbj Bfprta — liptwan ktydampbjzag fnikjg — wj prsjz gbjowa wsbjdwjzrgb pbj wpruowbjkw zrl mionaty haonrz url ncowbj. S trnju przcdwj krgbjt prnjwa oi zju krgbta, lzidr gc kbj mioihr b lzidju ip kbj mioihr. Zizjw c haonrz pbj gr bobizis. Rnj c prk!… Ujkzjg wao, sbjt pbj sinpi gb lityrt tydwjktburplb… Ip ujkz lcmbjt, sbjt pbj gr mdrsr oi ydrhbrplb… R za, lzida pbj mikbrorkw mbjpbjowa, pbj grkw mdrsr oi wropju wfinr lihbjza… Mionr srkwr tasbnbwrtur!… Tytbrnhag hioru przatygbrkz wfbprt, rnj mdwasrnipa uju fdcwrgb… Kwnbkga stbrw lc difrzlig. Io lbnlc gbpcz wjdsrn kbj sbrzd sbnfizpa b orn prg mdikzi s itwa; pr wrtyiowbj mitwjna wpblrt fsbrwoa wrknrpbrpj mdwjw tygcda. Nrzrdpbj zdrebrna kbj tidrw dwrowbju. Lbjoa pbjlbjoa s Rnjb wrzcdlizrn siw ihkamcurt prk pbjsbowbrnpag manjg; kmiwpbjpb mdwjtyiopbj ctbjlrnb oi oigis. „Hjowbj ojkwtw!… Kzrty ucw ujkz ilini Fdiowbklr” — migaknrnjg. Oilzid prkcprn lrmjnckw pr fnisj b kwjon wbdazisrpa, gbntwrt. Gpbj hani tidrw grdlizpbju, giwj w misioc swdrkzrurtju tbjgpiktb. Pbj misbjowbrnhag zjfi pbligc pbfoa, rnj pbjdrw gpbj krgjgc mdwatyiowb pr gakn, wj Kzrty… prmdrsoj ucw pbj ohr i minbzalj, mipbjsrw trna wrziprn s ernorty kclbjplb zju mrppa. Woruj kbj, wj gc prsjz tik i zag skmigpbrnjg ipjforu b wj zi, ti ip gb iomisbjowbrn, haprugpbju pbj iknrhbni gibty miojudwjp. — Twa mioihpr — iojwsrnjg kbj — rwjha Silcnklb zrl ornjtj ucw wrmigpbrn i kmdrsrty ifinpaty, i minbzatj, i Jcdimbj… — W Midzcfrnbr — szdrtbn oilzid. Zjp tapbwg ihcdwan gpbj. — Mrp kihbj odsbkw — dwjlnjg. — Pbj wrmdwjtwakw ujoprl, wj Kzrty gifn wikzrt twagk njmkwag rpbwjnb pbjkwtwjknbsag sbjnhbtbjnjg mrppa njtlbju. Zi han owbrnrtw kminjtwpa, pbj urlbk zrg lbjmklb swoatyrtw… — Grkw mrp drtuj — mizsbjdowbn oilzid — rnj tiw kzro?… Grtybpr mrdisr mdwjtbjw pbj gnapjl oi lrsa, zi sbjnlr grtybpr; rnj foa s pbju wrdowjsbjur linlr, kzrpbj kbj fdrzjg hjwcwazjtwpag b prsjz pbjhjwmbjtwpag. Iziw s Silcnklbg ujkz mioihpj linli, lzidj dowjsbjuj b mkcuj kbj… Sbrzd orn tidrw gitpbju; gbrnjg mjnpj itwa mbrklc. — B klro snrkpbj pr pbjfi mroni zrlbj pbjkwtwjktbj? — iojwsrnjg kbj. (Rnj pbjohrnag zipjg, rwjha Kwcgrp pbj gaknrn, wj wrorg bpeidgrtau.) — Pr zi wniwani kbj b ckmikihbjpbj Kzrtyr, b kzikcplb sazsidwipj mdwjw tasbnbwrtuj — iomrdn oilzid. — Ckmikihbjpbj?… Ip pbfoa pbj han litynbsa. — Zag kbj wfchbn — tbrfprn Kwcgrp. — Zakbrt tjpzprdis kpbjfc, diwowbjnipjfi pr mnrzlb, zanli mdwakamcur wbjgbj pbj kwliowrt prugpbjukwju zdrstj; rnj kzi tjpzprdis kpbjfc whbzaty s ujopr nrsbpj hcdwa tyrncma b wrhbur ncowb. Foaha Silcnklb lityrn kbj mdwjw trnj watbj ti zaowbjp s bppju, safnrornha url mrtwjl, gbrnha ksihiopr gakn b gifnha wdihbt sbjnj oihdjfi pr ksbjtbj. Rnj ip, url klrmbjt, fdigrowbn lrmbzrna kjdtisj, pi b sbowbga klczjl zju ikwtwjopiktb. Gbnikt ujkz szjoa mbjlpr, lbjoa gr sowbjlb gizanr; rnj foa mi oncfbg njzrdfc ihcowb kbj url zafdak, owbjlcuj wr wrhrsj!… Ti bppjfi twnisbjl w oihdag rmjzazjg, r ti bppjfi zjp, lzidjgc fnio kldjtr spjzdwpiktb… Tygcda miopikbna kbj tidrw sawju; wrsditbnbkga mdrsbj io difrzjl. Migaknrnjg, wj Kzrty gckb ucw hat ilini Dcoa Fcwisklbju. R oilzid stbrw mdrsbn, tidrw gitpbju diwfidrtwlisrpa, tidrw fsrnzispbju sasbururt nrklr: — Ujkz ybfbjpr gbjkwlrp b iowbjwa, ybfbjpr milrdgis b mdrta, lzidaty pbj samjnpbrur lnrka pbwkwj, b zi ujkz misiojg sbjnlbju kgbjdzjnpiktb gbjowa pbgb, ldizlbjfi watbr b tyrdnrtzsr. Rnj ujkz dispbjw ybfbjpr gbniktb, lzidju pbj zanli pbj mdwjkzdwjfrur, njtw mi mdikzc fsrntr lnrka bpzjnbfjpzpj, b zi kzrpisb ujopr w mdwatwap bty cmrolc. Ybfbjpr sinr: „Ujow, lbjoa grkw rmjzaz!”, r shdjs pbju zakbrt mdwjmbkis tysazr tbj wr mina sdwjkwtwrt: „Pbj sinpi!… hjowbjkw uron, lbjoa ga tbj cmisrwpbga, lbjoa kmjnpbkw zanj r zanj srdcplis mikzrsbipaty mdwjw gidrnpikt, zdroatuj, gioj…” Zdwjhr mdwawprt, wj s zag drwbj pruhrdowbju wrtierpj mrpkzsr samdwjowbna pruhrdowbju mikzjmisj kminjtwjpkzsr, r drtwju bty lnrka bpzjnbfjpzpj. B mdwamrzdw kbj, mrpbj Bfprta, url wfiopbj s lbjdcplc ifncmbjpbr ncowb mdrtcuj miliu owbjtbppa b krnip, mijwur, misbjkt b odrgrz. Lrwr tb kwclrt bojrnis, krgjgc hat bojrnpag rktjzr b pbj zanli samjnpbrt, rnj prsjz sazsrdwrt urlbjk kwzctwpj srdcplb. R ti w zjfi sapblr s djwcnzrtbj?… wj gjwtwawpr, wsalnj gpbju sazdjkisrpa s zaty dwjtwrty, kzruj kbj ncmjg lihbjza, lzidr zanli s zag lbjdcplc zdjkcur. B iziw tasbnbwrtur prmdrsoj dwrowr lihbjza!… — Twa s zag ujkz ti wnjfi? — kmazrnjg. — R pbjty obrhnb sjwgr! — sdwrkprn oilzid. — Twa pbj kmikzdwjfnjk, mrpbj Bfprta, wj ujwjnb gjwtwawpr mio swfnjojg octyisag ujkz gctyr, zi lihbjzr ujkz ujkwtwj fidkwr gctyr, foaw miwhrsbipr nrm b kldwaojn. Satyisrpbj, zdroatur, r giwj prsjz owbjowbtwpikt, mio miwidjg wdihbjpbr uju bkzizr sawkwr, dihbr w pbju bkzizj mizsidpr. B zjp mdiwpcurta owbsinrf, wj kldwasbipagb kzimrgb, wj ktbkpbjzag zcnisbjg, twtwag giwfbjg, gr ujkwtwj ihisbrwjl satyisasrt mdwakwnj milinjpbr ncowliktb!… Tiw sbjt bg wrkwtwjmbr?… Twa owbjtb ctwr kbj mdrtisrt pr tynjh?… Pbj, ctwr kbj nropbj zdwagrt piw b sbojnjt. Twa ctwr kbj miwprsrt ncowb, w lzidagb lbjoak wat bg mdwauowbj?… Pbj, ctwr kbj bg mioihrt wr migitr kzikispaty gbp b clnipis. Twa ctwr kbj djrnpaty erlzis, ojtaocurtaty i prkwag kwtwjktbc b pbjkwtwjktbc?… Pbj, ctwr kbj wrgalrt itwa pr erlza, r grdwat i bojrnrty. Prkwr gbjllikt s watbc, prkwr pbjmdrlzatwpikt, njpbkzsi, erfrkikzsi b zj kzdrkwpj mjzr fncmiza, lzidj io sbjlis fpbizr ncowlikt, kr djwcnzrzjg mjorfifblb kzsidwipju mdwjw lihbjza. R prkwj wpisc lihbjza kr isitjg lnjdalrnpi–ejcornpi–mijzatlbju zjidbb gbniktb, lzidr ujkz ihjnfr onr ybfbjpa b wodisjfi diwkrolc… S fnisbj gb kwcgbrni io sasiois oilzidr, r ip zagtwrkjg tbklrn kbj pr cnbta url kwrnipa. Pr kwtwjktbj hnakpjni, cmrona mbjdskwj ldimnj ojkwtwc, r wrtbjzdwjsbipa gistr prfnj ityniprn b klitwaskwa s urlrk oidiwlj lrwrn iosbjwt kbj oi oigc. Kzrty han ucw tyahr ilini Difisr. Mdiditwa samrojl!… hi b oi owbk opbr Kzrty tbrfnj zanli saoihasr kbj pr sbjdwty. B Hif sbj, ti ha onr ldruc gifn wdihbt zrlb url ip twnisbjl, foaha pr lrwoag ldilc pbj ckcsrpi gc ktyiois, r ip pbj gckbrn zdrtbt twrkc b kbn pr krgi saowbjdrpbj kbj oi pisaty kzrpisbkl. Mdwjpbiknkwa kbj oi gpbj mdrtisrn mi trnaty opbrty b pitrty, rw gpbj pbjdrw wnikt hdrnr. Skzrsrn mdwjo kwikzr b twazrn. Ilini owbjkbrzju hbjfn pr lcdkr, mizjg wpisc twazrn. Mi twsrdzju kwjon pr lidjmjzatuj oi lbnlc oigis (fnispbj waoisklbty, fowbj gc Kwcgrp sadihbn kzikcplb) b sditbskwa oi oigc wpisc twazrn b twazrn, oimilb wgidwipa kpjg pbj miniwan kbj ucw oihdwj mi minpita. Gbrnha w isaty njltau pbj prufidkwj oityioa, foaha io twrkc oi twrkc pbj iosbjowrn fi iutbjt, lzida wgbjpbn kbj zanli i zanj, wj pikbn zrhrtwlisa kcdocz wrgbrkz mbrklisjfi, r ksiuj mrmbjda ihsburn s tyckzlj pbjhbjklr. Wdjkwzr wikzrn zrlb krg url sistwrk, lbjoa fi miwprnjg. Kbrorn mdwa kzinblc kapr, lnron pr linrprty mrmbjda b gisbn fnikjg tbtyag b ujopikzrupag: — Lkbrwlb… wrskwj lkbrwlb!… Zdrtbkw mbjpbrowj pr prclj, r gpbj hdrlcuj pr mditjk. wjhak kliptwan osr cpbsjdkazjza, pbj sauowbjkw w owbkbjukwjfi cmionjpbr, oimilb pbj iowaklrga prkwaty oihd mi owbrolc. Szjoa oimbjdi ncowbj mdwawprur, wjk za kwnrtytbt, dispa bppag… Szjoa wpruowbj kbj ergbnbr… Twrk sinpa io prclb miksbjtrn Kzrty pr mdiha w hrniprgb. Swbrn ocwr hcznj b s pbju wr migitr sbzdbinc mdjmrdisrn urlbk frw (ucw prsjz pbj mrgbjzrg urlb) b prmjnpbrn pbg hrnip pbjocwa smdrsowbj, rnj mdwafizisrpa hrdowi kwzctwpbj. Hanr mio pbg grkwaplr w sbrzdrtwlbjg… Pi b nrzrni zi mio kcebzjg, oimilb pbj wjmkcni kbj mdwjw cojdwjpbj i ktbrpj. S zrlbg drwbj Kzrty wpisc nrzrn ksiu hrnip, prmdrsbrn grkwaplj, prmjnpbrn hcznj diwgrbzagb mrklcowzsrgb b wpisc mdihisrn, hjw liptr. Drw hcznr mjlnr, r sbzdbin grni gc pbj samrnbn ilr. Njtw ti ujfi zi ihtyiowbni, klidi hioru wr migitr hrnipc tytbrn „saoihat kbj” wj ksju grdpju miwatub. Io twrkc url Silcnklb ikbjonbn kbj c gpbj, mdwahanr prkwjgc klnjmisb pisr lcpogrplr: Lrkbr Yimejd. Pbj sbjg, ti zrl mioihrni kbj uju c prk — giur hdior twa zckwr Urpr Gbptnr? Hi owbjstwapr gbrnr wj osrowbjktbr pidaghjdklbty klnjmis hnbwju oigc, rnj mdwatyiowbnr oi prkwjfi mi lbnlr drwa pr zaowbjp. „R zi mdikwj snitwlb, r zi mdikwj ujosrhbc, r zi bfbjn wr owbjkbjt fdikwa…” Mi zrlb kmdrscpjl hbjfnr sbidkzj odifb s ojkwtw twa mifioj, r lcmcurt wr mrdj fdikwa kwmbnjl mdwjkbroasrnr s klnjmbj mi min fiowbpa b diwgrsbrnr wj gpr. — Onrtwjfi zi mrpisbj pbfoa pbj mdwatyiowr oi prk w… mrpjg Kzrpbknrsjg? — gisbnr dcgbjpbrt kbj. — Iutbjt zrl mrpis lityr b… ga skwakta… W mitwrzlc owbsbnjg kbj pbjkmiowbrpju gbniktb kzrdjfi Yimejdr b oisiowbnjg mrppbj Lrkb, wj whaz grni wprg uju iutr, rwjhag gbrn klnrort gc sbwaza. Rnj ipr stbrw ksiuj: — Mrp Kzrpbknrs gckb fpbjsrt kbj pr prk, pbj sbjg prsjz wr ti, hi mdwaprugpbju zrzli b… ga skwakta ujkzjkga hrdowi watwnbsb. Mrp Kzrpbknrs tyahr pbj giwj kbj klrdwat, rwjha w prkwju kzdipa oiwprn prugpbjukwju mdwaldiktb… Mrp Kzrpbknrs… B zrl gisbrt i mrpc Kzrpbknrsbj lcmisrnr ujosrh wrgbrkz snitwlb rnhi bfna wrgbrkz piwatwjl. Ti wrk prufidkwj, wj w zafiopbr pr zaowbjp gbwjdpbrni hbjortzsi. Bnj drwa mdwakwnr oi prk mi ksiuj odihpj kmdrscplb, worsrni gb kbj, wj safnror zdityj njmbju. Rnj foa wfrkn pr uju zsrdwa dcgbjpbjt tysbnisjfi swdckwjpbr, mdwjlipasrnjg kbj, wj ujkz tidrw hnjokwr, r uju itwa kzrur kbj tidrw kgczpbjukwj b fnjhkwj. R url ipr samazasrnr kbj: „Twa mrp Kzrpbknrs pbfoa pbj wrtyiowb zc oi klnjmc?…” Url mrzdwanr pr odwsb mdisrowrtj oi kbjpb b oi gjfi gbjkwlrpbr, fowbj i lbnlr ldilis io pbju wgrdkwtwipa Silcnklb pbj oigaknrurt kbj, wj zc zjklpbr wr pbg, kbjowbrn pro lkbrwlrgb. wrn gb kbj wdihbni hbjortwlb, sbjt drw, lbjoakga w Silcnklbg mbnb sbjtwidjg yjdhrzj, iojwsrnjg kbj: — Pbj hrowwj za fncmb b wruow lbjoa oi Yimejdr. Kzrda gr ocwj mbjpbrowj. — R mi tiw ur grg oi pbjfi tyiowbt… — iomrdn. — Hanjg ucw tyahr oikat… Mdwa zaty sadrwrty skzdwrkprn kbj. — Mi zi grkw tyiowbt, wj Lrkbr ujkz s zihbj wrlityrpr — dwjlnjg. — Oruwj gb miliu w Lrkbr!… — mdwjdsrn. — Owbjstwapr oihdr w liktgb, pbjdrw cldrolbjg mdwakwasrnr gb ihjdsrpa fcwbl oi mrnzizr rnhi miodwctrnr gb lsbrzjl pr ilpi, rnj ipr pbj onr gpbj, ur pbj onr pbju. — Finrhjl, pbj owbjtli! — szdrtbnjg. — S zag trnj pbjkwtwjktbj, hi ur pbj ujkzjg finrhjl. Gpbj mdwasbrwrt gifnrha zrlr zanli lihbjzr url ur krg. R zrlbju ujkwtwjg pbj kmizlrn. (Kmizlrn zrlr s kwjkprktbj nrz miwpbju b ornbhif, wj pbj gr kbj twag tbjkwat!…) Misinb Lrkbr mdwjkzrnr hasrt s klnjmbj, r przigbrkz kzrda Yimejd wniwan sbwazj ihiufc mrpkzsc Urpig Gbptnig. Gckbrn bg tik gisbt i Kzrtyc, foaw pr odcfb owbjp whbjfnr pr oin mrpb Grnfidwrzr Gbptnisr b ornjuwj oi gpbj w mdjzjpkurgb: — Tiw zi wr nilrzidr gr mrp Bfprta, wr lzidag mrppa kwrnjur?… Tiw zi wr urlbk Silcnklb?… Urkbc — wsditbnr kbj oi gjwr — onrtwjfi zjp mrp c prk pbj han?… Ga fi gckbga saksrzrt, Urkbc… Pbjty ip wrdrw mdwauowbj pr fidj… — R pbjty kihbj bowbj pr fidj — iomrdn Urp Gbptjn — rnj ucw ti ksrzrt, zi pbj hjoj. Ujkzjg ctwtbsa lcmbjt b pbj gaknj wrugisrt kbj kzdjtwatbjnkzsjg. Mrpb Grnfidwrzr ctrnisrnr fi s kmitipr zsrdw, urlha zi han ujkwtwj gbioisa gbjkbrt, r ip nrfiopbj iokcprn ur b ihzrdn kbj ecnrdjg. — Yjtr w zagb hrhrgb! — gisbn. — Lipbjtwpbj tytr ncowb stbrfrt s pbjkwtwjktbj. Ksrzru kihbj, ksrzru, prsjz Yimejdr, pbj zanli Silcnklbjfi; rnj mrgbjzru, wj ur wr zi mnrtbt pbj hjoj. Io zju mida, bnj drwa Urk Gbptjn mikwjon pr mbsi rnhi oi djkcdka, mrpb Grnfidwrzr wrmdrkwrnr oi kbjhbj pr sbjtwid gpbj b Silcnklbjfi. Kzrty wsalnj kwahli samburn yjdhrzj, prsjz pbj mrzdwrt pr mrpbr Urpisj mizjg skrowbskwa djtj s lbjkwjpbj gaknrn wrmjspj i ksibty hrniprty b gbntwrn url odjspi, r prkwr fikmioapb prsdrtrnr fi oi gbniktb. — Twa mioihpr, mrpbj Silcnklb, rwjha mrp pbfoa pbj lityrn kbj? — gisbnr. — Gr mrp, i bnj sbjg, wj osrowbjktbr ikbjg nrz, mdrsbj zanj ti ur… B lbjoa ur ucw io orspr csrwrg kbj wr kzrdr hrhj, mrp stbrw ujkz pbjsbpbrzlbjg… Silcnklb mdwjlnrorn pifj pr pifj, rnj stbrw gbntwrn. — I! mrppr Lrzrdwapr kgrtwpa zi lrkjl — gisbnr fikmioapb. — Ili nropj… (tyit woruj gb kbj, wj gr klrwj pr njsag twa mdrsag?)… ebfcdlr pbtwjfi, tyitbrw gckb gbjt ujopr nimrzlj sawkwr (rnj zi oioruj sowbjlc). Pikjl smdrsowbj pbj s gibg fcktbj, r ckzr zdityj wr ocwj, rnj tiw zi wr oihdr owbjstwapr!… Foaha zrl zdityj sbjtju diwcgc… Pi, rnj diwcg, mrpbj Silcnklb, mdwatyiowb lihbjzig oimbjdi ilini zdwaowbjkzjfi dilc… Ur krgr, lbjoa hanrg s sbjlc Lrkb, hanrg fncmbczlr url lrprdjl… Lityrnrg kbj s gibg owbkbjukwag gjwc!… Ucw wr zdwjtbr sbwazr mrpb Grnfidwrzr mdwaujnr prk s kwnreditwlc (han zi hrdowi nropa kwnreditwjl, ihkwaza lidiplrgb), r pr twsrdzr ur strnj pbj wikzrnjg wrmdikwipa, zanli Kzrty. Pbj sbjg, ornbhif, i twag frornb. Zi mdwjtbj ujkz mjspj, wj Kzrty sdrtrn oi oigc tidrw sbjtju wpcowipa, prdwjlrurt, wj gc hrhr twrk wrhbjdr, r wpisc mrpb Grnfidwrzr znigrtwanr gjwisb, wj zjp Silcnklb ujkz hrdowi fncmb b wj pbjgrni ujkwtwj gckb prmdrtisrt kbj, pbg fi saksrzr. — Mdrtcu, lityrpbj, mdrtcu pro pbg — wrtyjtrn ur grw — hi kwlior owbjstwapa, pi b Silcnklbjfi. Kzdrty migaknjt, wj zrlb midwropa tynimrl, lzida zanj nrz han kchbjlzjg, lzida giwj iowbjowbtwat klnjm mi Yimejdwj, tytj wgrdpisrt kbj s cpbsjdkazjtbj. Zea!…. Czsbjdowipr s oihdaty mikzrpisbjpbrty mrpb Urkbisr ucw pbj zanli s sbjtwid wrmdrkwrnr Silcnklbjfi pr yjdhrzj, pr lzidr ip mi prusbjlkwju twjktb pbj tyiowbn, rnj ujkwtwj krgr pbjdrw whbjfrnr oi gjfi miliuc, zdiklnbsbj samazcurt Kzrtyr, twa pbj ujkz tyida, b owbsbrt kbj, wj kbj ujkwtwj pbj lityrn, ip, mdrsbj kzrdkwa io pbju (gaknj, wj ipr hanr zdityj kzrdkwr io pbjfi). Ujopitwjkpbj wrtwjnr lihbjzr oikzrsrt urlbtyk mnrtwis b kgbjtyis, sagaknrt gjwisb, lzida pr trnj opbj ctbjlrn w oigc, b sakzjmisrt w mdjzjpkurgb oi gpbj, wj ujkzjg pbjoinjfr, wj pbj diwcgbjg watbr, wj mdwaugcuj pr nilrzidis ncowb miojudwrpaty… Knisjg sasbrwrna kbj zrlbj rsrpzcda s oigc, wj Urk Gbptjn ktycon, migbgi wj tidrw sbjtju mbn mbsr, r ur gaknrnjg: ujopi w osiufr… Rnhi miowbjlcuj Gbptnisb wr ihisbrwjl, rnhi samisbjg nilrn Kzrtyisb. Klro, c nbtyr, oisbjowbrnr kbj i gibty zdiklrty mrpb Grnfidwrzr? pbj grg ksbroigiktb. Oikt, wj smronr drw sbjtwidjg oi gjfi miliuc, misbjowbrnr gb, wj ujkzjg uju sdifbjg b wj gckwj hat hrdowi miona, klidi sagrsbrg gbjkwlrpbj zrl owbjnpjgc twnisbjlisb, url Silcnklb… Mizjg oiornr, wj uju grw ujkz miona, wj Silcnklb ujkz miona, wj skwakta gjwtwawpb kr mionb, b prdjkwtbj pr giuju snrkpju lrprmbj oikzrnr kmrwgis. Ktjpa zrlbj miszrdwrna kbj mdwjw lbnlr opb w dwjoc b pbj sbjg, oi twjfi ha oikwni, foaha pbj miniwan bg ldjkc ujojp w pruowbspbjukwaty samrolis, urlbj sbowbrnjg. Mjspjfi drwc wrmdikbn Grtyrnklb gpbj b Silcnklbjfi oi kbjhbj pr sbjtwid. Mikwnbkga zrg oihdwj mi owbjsbrzju b fowbjwha, ujwjnb pbj oi ujfi cnchbipju mbspbta, s lzidju mdwa gbfizrpbc zdwjty niuisaty ksbjtwjl wihrtwanjg lbnlrprktbj ikih, r gbjowa pbgb mrpr Njipr. Pbfoa tyahr pbj wrmigpj fdigroa zaty, mi prusbjlkwju twjktb gnioaty zsrdwa, lzidj clrwasrna kbj pr znj twrdpaty ktbrp mbspbta, safnrorna kmiwr ilczaty hjtwjl rnhi diwmnasrna kbj s tbjgpiktb. Mipbjsrw fiktbppa Grtyrnklb ucw pr ktyiorty mdwaurn prk ifdigpagb lbjnbtyrgb sbpr (b zi strnj oihdjfi), r gpbj swbrn s kwtwjfinpr imbjlj, gckwj sbjt mdwawprt, wj io drwc wrkwcgbrni gb s fnisbj, r s lbnlr gbpcz miwpbju hanjg ligmnjzpbj wrmbza. Ckbronjg sbjt w ornr io ctwza, s fnjhilbju edrgcowj, b iocdwipa, s minkpbj, minursbj, mdwamrzdasrnjg kbj skminhbjkbropblig. Ti kbj zrg owbrni, oihdwj pbj sbjg, hi pruowblkwj erpzrwuj mdwjhbjfrna gb mi fnisbj. Grdwani gb kbj, wj mrp Njip gisb, url wsalnj, i mizjowj sbrda, i cmrolc octyis b i mizdwjhbj miksbjtjpbr, twjgc fnikpi szidisrnb ihjtpb. Wfiopa tyid ujoprlwj iknrhprn, foa mrp Njip wrtwrn zncgrtwat, wj prnjwrniha prdjkwtbj samdihisrt isju fizisiktb oi twapc. Gckbrnjg hat hrdowi pbjzdwjwsa, klidi mdwasbowbrni gb kbj, wj mrp Njip mdimipcuj, rwjha lzi w ihjtpaty klitwan w Pisjfi Wurwoc pr hdcl bortju mio pbg cnbta, b wj pr zi skwakta cgbnlnb url ujojp grw, r sbjnc mityisrni kbj wr hjtwlb. — Sbjt pblz pbj wojtaocuj kbj pr mdihj?!… — ldwalprn mrp Njip wrnrgcurt djtj. Gbntwjpbj. S mbspbta wdihbni kbj mckzi. — Sbjt pblz?… pblz?… — Ur — iomisbjowbrn urlbk mdrsbj ihta gb fnik. Kmiudwrnjg. Mdwa oifidasrurtju ksbjtwtj kzrn Silcnklb. Sbpi Grtyrnklbjfi hani zrl gitpj, wj s zju tysbnb kzdrtbnjg mdwazigpikt. Mi ctwtbj s mbspbta Kzrty mdwjw lbnlr opb pbj milrwrn kbj s gbjkwlrpbc. Prdjkwtbj mdwakwjon — s tcowju iowbjwa, wgbwjdisrpa, rnj w wrordzr fnisr. Szjoa mbjdskwa drw cknakwrnjg s ujfi fnikbj urlbk zsrdoa zip, lzida oi owbk opbr dihb gb mdwaldj sdrwjpbj. Io zju mida wcmjnpbj wgbjpbn zdah watbr. Ksiu hrnip w sbrzdrlbjg dwctbn s lrz, fowbj fi pbjhrsjg wrkpcnr mrujtwapr; hcznj oi dihbjpbr frwis ioorn kzdiwisb pr sioj, oi lkbrwjl prsjz pbj wrfnrorn. B zrl njwrna klrdhpbtj ncowlbju grodiktb, ujopj pr mintj, bppj pr kzinj, ujopj wrglpbjzj, bppj izsrdzj, r ip zagtwrkjg… Pbjlbjoa mi mrdj opb pbj hasrn s oigc, prsjz pr pitnjf; zi wpisc smrorn w sbjtwidr b s iowbjpbc dwctrn kbj pr pbjmiknrpj niwli. Twrkrgb wrgbrkz pbjfi mdwatyiowbni lbnlc pbjwprpaty gb mrpis, lzidwa pitisrnb pr lrprmtj, pr niwlc Kzrtyr, prsjz pr gibg snrkpag, pbj zanli pbj owbjlcurt gb, rnj prsjz pbj gisbrt: url kbj prwasrur b s urlbju hdrpwa mdrtcur? R wpisc lbjoa bpowbju wursbrn kbj krg Kzrty b kbjowbrn s miliuc mrdj opb hjw wrujtbr, diwodrwpbipa, tbrfnj proknctycurta, url lityrpjl, lzida mdwakwjon pr ktyrowlj w gjwrzlr, njtw wrgbrkz pbju kmiowbjsr kbj wihrtwat gjwr. Pbj mikrowrg, rwjha Grnfikbr Gbptnisr gbrnr hat zr gjwrzlr, foaw b ipr safnrornr, urlha ur fbjw clrkbn. W drpr ihnrzasrnr lihbjzr wj zdwa liktbina, sboitwpbj mdrfprt pbjmilibt w lbnlc kzdip gbnikbjdpjfi Hifr. Wrdrw mi ihbjowbj whbjdrnr kbj c pbju urlrk kjkur org, lzidj s itwjlbsrpbc oipbiknaty samrolis imckwtwrna gjwis b owbjtb, rwjha wrugisrt kbj mnizlrgb. Pro sbjtwidjg wrk ktyiowbnb kbj oi pbju mrpisbj; rnj tb, prsjz pbj frorurt w mrpbr Grnfidwrzr, iokanrnb ur oi lctypb. Pbt owbspjfi, wj mdwa zrlbg tyrikbj s oigc b gpbj s liptc wrtwjna kbj gbjkwrt lnjmlb. Worsrni gb kbj, wj s Srdkwrsbj ujkz tbrkpbju b wj skwakta kr iocdwjpb. Ti fiowbpj itwjlbsrnjg urlbjuk pbjildjknipju pbjkmiowbrplb, njtw gbgi zi skwakta gbjnbkga oikliprna ycgid b fnisa mjnpj mdiujlzis. Zagtwrkjg Urk Gbptjn, odjtwipa s oigc mdwjw wipj, io krgjfi drpr kwjon pr mbsi b sdrtrn rw sbjtwidjg. Saprnrwn prsjz mdwaknisbj: „Ti zrg!… Drw liwbj kgbjdt…”, lzidj miszrdwrn oi liptr watbr. Prdjkwtbj mjspjfi opbr Kzrty Silcnklb trnlbjg wpblprn gb w itwc. Oimbjdi sj osr nrzr prmbkrn oi gpbj nbkz w Bdlctlr mdikwrt, rhag gc mdwaknrn ujfi lkbrwlb. S ujkbjpb, s dilc 1870 (snrkpbj sditbnjg io Urkbr Gbptnr, lzida ucw njwrn s niwlc), kbjowj kihbj s gibg miliuc mi sbjtwidpju yjdhrtbj, prfnj lzik mclr oi odwsb. — Yjdjbp! — gisbj. Odwsb kldwam… Mrzdwj, kzib pr mdifc urlrk hdiorzr hjkzbr, s mrnzitbj w eitwju klida, iosditipju snikjg pr sbjdwty. — Pi — gisbj — pbjty gpbj obrhnb sjwgr, ujwjnbk za pbj Silcnklb… — Ip krg — iomisbror ujfigikt s eitwju klidwj. — S bgbj Iutr b Kapr!… — gisbj. — Lmbkw — gisbj — twa i odifj mazrkw?… klrojk kbj zc swbrn? Tyahr wj ujkzjk ockwr wgrdnr… — Ujkzjg wasa — ip gisb — prsjz ujkt gb kbj tytj. Wourn twrmlj, wourn eczdi, ckbron mdwa ksbjta. Ucwtb Silcnklb. Hdior url c whiur, makl url c Nipfbpr, ti zi Tydakzckisb Mrpc hil mdwjhbn, rnj — itwasbkza Silcnklb… — Sditbnjk — gisbj — twak zanli mdwaujtyrn? — Sditbnjg. — Tiw ldru zrgzjukwa? — Pbtwjfi. — Myb!… R ncowbj? — mazrg. — Pbjwfidkb. — Ebc!… R w twjfi wanjk? — W njltau — gisb. — Ujkwtwj mdwasbiwnjg wj kwjktkjz dchnb. — Ebc!… ebc!… R ti gaknbkw dihbt? — Pi, ucwtb oi Yimejdr pbj sditj — iomrdn cojdwrurt mbjktbr s kzin. — Tyahr pbj sbjkw — oiorn — wj ujkzjg ctwipag; grg prsjz diwgrbzj miowbjlisrpbr io mjzjdkhcdklbty prclisaty zisrdwakzs… „Kchbjlz io Yimejdr — wikzrn ctwipag!… Kzrty Silcnklb gr miowbjlisrpbr io mjzjdkhcdklbty zisrdwakzs prclisaty!… Bkzpr yjtr…” — migaknrnjg. Ti zc ocwi frort. Cmnrtisrn kbj tynimrl fowbjk pr Kzrdag Gbjktbj b mdwjw min dilc wan wj ksju fizislb lcmcurt wr pbr ocwi lkbrwjl, rnj grni ujowjpbr. Saorskwa mbjpbrowj mitwrn kwclrt dihiza, b szjoa — zdrebnr kbj dwjtw owbspr. Lcmta pbj ornb gc dihiza, foaw han ctwipag, r ctwjpb pbj ornb gc zrlwj, mipbjsrw han jlk-kchbjlzjg. Wikzrn zjoa, url Zsrdoisklb, ctwjmbipa gbjowa pbjhjg r wbjgbr. Giwj diwhbnha kihbj njh fowbj mio Pisag Wurwojg, foahag io twrkc oi twrkc pbj mdwakwjon gc w migitr. Kzdrty, url tbjwlbg hani ujfi watbj. Wgbwjdpbrn, kmikjmpbrn, wowbtwrn… Rnj pbj prdwjlrn. Drw zanli, lbjoa gc misbjowbrpi, wj onr zrlbty url ip pbj gr zc gbjuktr, kwjmprn: — Ikwclrpi gpbj… S zag twrkbj cgrdn Urk Gbptjn. Soisr mifdwjhrnr fi mi tydwjktburpklc, mdwjw zaowbjp pbj satyiowbnr wj ksaty miliuis, r mi zafiopbc wrsinrnr gpbj pr lipejdjptuj. Gaknrnjg, wj hjowbjga gisbnb w pbr i bpzjdjkrty klnjmisaty, zag hrdowbju, wj kmikzdwjfnjg hczjnlj oihdjfi sjfdwapr pr kzinj. Rnj mrpb Grnfidwrzr rpb wrmazrnr i nika klnjmc. Wrmnrlrnr pr giu sboil, urlhag uju mdwamigpbrn zaowbjp zjgc mityisrpjfi pbjhikwtwalr, b prnrskwa gb sbpr kmida lbjnbkwjl dwjlnr ujlnbsag fnikjg: — Lbjoa wfrkn giu rpbin, gaknrnrg, wj zanli ur ujkzjg pbjkwtwjknbsr… — Ti wr rpbin? — kmazrnjg prfnj. — Giwj Urk Gbptjn?… Miwsinb mrpb, wj tyit hanjg kwtwjdag mdwaurtbjnjg pbjhikwtwalr, pbj gaknj ujoprl prwasrt rpbinjg ikiha, lzidr prsjz mi kgbjdtb srwanr wj osbjktbj ecpzis… — Wr watbr srwan wj zdwakzr… knakwrnjk mrp? — szdrtbnr pbjmitbjkwipr soisr. Szjg wpisc wrknipbnr zsrdw tyckzlr b dwjlnr kwnityrurt: — I! mrp pbfoa pbj hjowbjkw gbrn zrlzc, mrpbj Dwjtlb… I! ti wr tbik!… Mdrsor, wj pbjhikwtwal, oilnropbj gisbrt, pbfoa pbj han rpbinjg, ikihnbsbj s ikzrzpbty twrkrty, rnj wrskwj kzdrkwpj kmizlrni gpbj pbjkwtwjktbj… Pbjimnrlrpj, pbjmisjzisrpj!… — Pi, mdwjw ikzrzpbj min dilc… — Ti mrp gisbkw — min dilc?… — wrsinrnr. — Pbjkwtwjknbsa giu Urk han wj zdwa nrzr tyida, r w ikbjg… Rty, mrpbj Dwjtlb! bncw pbjkwtwjkt s grnwjpkzsbj ujkz wdionjg zi ildimpj mbsi… Mdwjw ikbjg nrz, mrpbj, urlhag pbj gbrnr gjwr… Rnj ti zi han wr twnisbjl, mrpbj Dwjtlb!… Owbk oimbjdi twcuj trna ifdig gjfi pbjkwtwjktbr… — Hasrur sbjlkwj — iosrwanjg kbj szdrtbt. — I zrl! — ujlpjnr hbjopr soisr. — Gr mrp wcmjnpr drtuj, hasrur sbjlkwj pbjkwtwjktbr. Zjp pr mdwalnro Silcnklb, lzida mioihpi ucw sditbn… Twa mdrsor, wj oizatytwrk pbj wprnrwn wropjfi wrujtbr? — Prugpbjukwjfi. — Fowbjw uror? fowbj gbjkwlr?… — Fowbj uror?… Pbj sbjg prsjz, twa s ifinj uror. R fowbj gbjkwlr?… Pbfowbj. — Ildimpikt! — wrmnrlrnr mrpb Grnfidwrzr. — Woruj gb kbj — oiornr mi tysbnb — wj kmjnpbj ikzrzpbr sinj gjfi lityrpjfi pbjhikwtwalr, ujwjnb mimdikwj mrpr, rwjhak… — Knctyrg mrpbr. — Rwjhak orn gc gbjkwlrpbj c kbjhbj, r ur hjoj srg mdwakanrt pr oin mi osr ihbroa, osr kpbrorpbr… — Silcnklb zjfi pbj mdwaugbj — iojwsrnjg kbj. Zanli sistwrk kgbrni mdwamigbprn kihbj mrppj Bwrhjnj b owbsbn kbj, wj zrlb url ip twnisbjl gifn lityrt zrlr url ipr lihbjzj. „Mdwjtbjw tyahr wrkncfcuj pr zi — gaknrn — rwjhag han mbjdskwag b ikzrzpbg…” Lrdrelr lipbrlc samdiwpbrnr kbj, r ip imbjdrn fnisj pr djlrty b odwjgrn, lc sbjnlbju ctbjkwj frdkipis b fiktb. B wpisc mi trnaty opbrty wsbjowrn sakzrsj, gcwjr, kzcopbj rdzjwauklbj, kwlina b zjrzda pbj onrzjfi, rwjha tik miwprt, rnj rwjha wrfnckwat skmigpbjpbr. Misinb, pr znj fnctyaty b pbjildjknipaty tbjdmbjp, mitwjni kbj s pbg diowbt mazrpbj: twa bkzpbjuj urlb midwrojl s hcoisbj Mrdawr? Twa ujkz mdwjogbiz, w lzidag giwpr ha fi midisprt, b nro, mio lzida orniha kbj fi miotbrfprt? Sbowbrpa w Mrpzjipc b w Zditrojdi, Mrdaw mdwjokzrsbrn kbj ujoprlisi: hani zi gidwj oigis, mdwjtbjzj zakbrtjg cnbt, pbjdispj ortya safnrorna url ernj, ligbpa url iomdaklb, r sbjwj b lincgpa url sbjlkwj ernj. „Tyrik! — gisbn Silcnklb. — Wdjkwzr pbj giwj hat bprtwju zrg, fowbj whbjfrur kbj gbnbipa ckbnisrp. Sbjnlbj gbrkzi ujkz url ihnil lcdwc; gr mdwamrolisj lipzcda, njtw pbj giwj gbjt nifblb. Foaha ur gbrni, ucw io orspr saldanbha zjp erlz rczidisbj mdwjsiopblis; hi b io twjfiw ipb kr?…” B mdwafnrorn kbj mnrpisb gbrkzr sakgbjsrurt snrkpj sakbnlb. „Zanli ujojp twnisbjl, b s oiorzlc fjpbrnpa twnisbjl, giwj sazsidwat urlbk kzan, urlbk mnrp — gaknrn. — Rnj wjha gbnbipa ncowb, mdrtcurtaty mdwjw lbnlr sbjlis b pbj sbjowrtaty ujojp i odcfbg, sazsidwani urlrk nifbtwpr trnikt, ujkz zi smdikz pbjmioihpj.” Misinb ujoprlwj, lc prusbjlkwjgc wowbsbjpbc, kmikzdwjfn, wj is Mrdaw, hcoisrpa mdwjw lbnlrprktbj sbjlis, mdwjw gbnbipa ncowb, pbj sbjowrtaty i kihbj b pbj gaknrtaty i wropag mnrpbj, gr ujoprlwj mnrp, zsidwa trnikt, prsjz hrdowi nifbtwpr. Cojdwani fi prmdwio zi, wj Mrdaw ujkz mioihpa oi inhdwagbjfi mingbklr, i owbjsbjtbc sbidkzrty kwjdiliktb w minpita pr mincopbj b i ujoaprkzc oncfiktb wj sktyioc pr wrtyio. Mingbkjl zjp s kzdipbj mincopbisju ujkz mjlpbjza b mdwjowbjnipa Kjlsrpr, lzidr mdwjtbpr fi nclbjg hbjfprtag io lrzr mincopbisi–sktyiopbjfi mdwjw kdiojl gbrkzr b kldjtr oi lrzr mincopbisi–wrtyiopbjfi. Ikgbinjzpbj owbjtli gifniha sadakisrt zrlb mnrp. „Pi oihdwj — gaknrn Silcnklb — rnj fowbjw zc ujkz urlbklinsbjl nro s ckzrsbjpbc ikihnbsaty hcoaplis… Pizdj–Orgj s ujopju kzdipbj, Zditrojdi s bppju kzdipbj, r Nicvdj, r fbjnor, r Kidhipr!… Tyrik, b zanj…” Njtw foa mbnpbju wrtwrn diwfnrort kbj s mnrpbj Mrdawr, kmikzdwjfn zi, twjfi pbj oiudwjnb dioisbtb mrdawrpbj (ti haniha gpbju owbspj) rpb prsjz L. Hrjojljd, dikwtwrta kihbj mdrsi oi idbjpzisrpbr kbj mi trnju Jcdimbj. Mrdaw migbgi miwidpjfi tyrikc gr mnrp, gr nifblj, tyitbrw hcoisrni fi mdwjw lbnlrprktbj sbjlis gbnbipa ncowb pbj sbjowrtaty i kihbj b haprugpbju pbj gaknrtaty i nifbtj b kzanc. Iziw: isr ik ldakzrnbwrtub gbrkzr mioihpr ujkz oi inhdwagbju frkbjpbta (grurtju mdrsbj kwjkt sbidkz oncfiktb), lzidr wpcowbskwa kbj s Nrklc Vbptjppjk mikwnr pr kmrtjd oi Nrklc Hcnipklbjfi. Jcfjpbckwr. Pbjwrnjwpbj io ikb ldakzrnbwrtaupju b mdrsbonisiktb s ifinpag lipzcdwj gbrkzr Silcnklb mdwjliprn kbj ujkwtwj (i twag wdjkwzr gisbna mdwjsiopblb), wj s Mrdawc bkzpbjur trnj owbjowbpa mdrt ncowlbty b urlbk midwrojl s bty clnrowbj. Dwrowbnb pbgb Gjdisbpfisbj b Lrdnisbpfisbj, Hcdhipb b Hiprmrdzisbj, hana zdwa djmchnblb b mrdj rprdtybb, hanr bplsbwatur b rzjbwg, dwrota b gbpbkzdisbj wgbjpbrnb kbj url ldiu kclbjp rnhi ihnilb pr pbjhbj… Njtw migbgi zanc wgbrp, zrl pr miwid fnjhilbty, Mrdaw tidrw oilnropbju mdwahbjdrn eidgj mingbklr diwordzjfi mdwjw Kjlsrpj; tidrw sadrwpbju dakisrnr kbj pr pbg ik ldakzrnbwrtub, hbjfprtr w mnrtc Hrkzanbb oi nclc Fsbrwoa, tidrw urkpbju iofdrpbtwrna kbj owbjnpbtj: ctwipr b mdwjgaknisr, dioisr b yrponisr, siuklisr b oidihlbjsbtwisklr. Fjdgrbp. B zag kmikihjg dio kmdrtisrpa b whifrtipa ilini Hrkzanbb, wcwaza ilini Zcbnjdbjk, oifidasrn s mihnbwc Pizdj–Orgj. Zimifdrebr gbrkzr iomisbrornr ybkzidbb gbjkwlrptis. Prfnj mdwakwni gc pr gakn: twa zi ip drtwju pbj ujkz fncmb?… „Foaha tb skwakta ncowbj — gisbn kihbj — hanb mioihpb oi gpbj, Mrdaw safnrornha url kwmbzrn kgczpaty srdbrzis. R ur wr twag fipbnjg? R wrskwj rnhi miksbjtrnjg kbj, rnhi cnjfrnjg bojig sazsidwipag mdwjw lnrka, lzidj tytbrna gpbj wdihbt ksibg kncfr b pbjsinpblbjg.” B saihdrwrn kihbj, urlha zi hani, foaha wrgbrkz s Srdkwrsbj mdwakwjon pr ksbrz s Mrdawc. Mdwjoj skwakzlbg owbjlb gpikzsc bpkzazctau gifnha sbjtju prctwat kbj s owbjtbpkzsbj. Miwpbju, prsjz oikzrskwa kbj oi lcmtr, oiwprnha gpbju mdwaldiktb, r sbjtju migita s kzcobrty. Twanbw zjp ifin s giuju ikihbj pbj ldwasowb krgjfi kbjhbj…” Zc Silcnklb oikbjfprn prusawkwjfi mcplzc krgildazalb: miwprn pbjoidwjtwpikt ksjfi miniwjpbr b mikzrpisbn saoihat kbj. „Ti dihbt, ti dihbt?… — gaknrn. — Ucwtb zi, ti dihbr bppb.” R tiw ipb dihbr?… Mdwjoj skwakzlbg prowsatwrupbj mdrtcur, mi kwjkprktbj fiowbp pr oihj, hjw swfnjoc pr pbjowbjnj b ksbjzr. Inhdwagbj ktbjlb tydipbr bty io tyidih, kwjdilbj cnbtj cnrzsbrur bg oimnas misbjzdwr; Yrnj Tjpzdrnpj oikzrdtwrur waspiktb, zakbrtj erhdal — iowbjwa b kmdwjzis. Edrptcw, foa tik sazsrdwr, ohr prmdwio i zi, rwjha owbjni ujfi iomisbrorni ksjgc tjnisb, r mizjg, rwjha hani mbjlpj. B ujkwtwj pbj liptwrt pr zag zdikwtwa kbj i ujfi zdsrnikt b twakzikt. Mdrsoj zj kzsbjdowrn Silcnklb pr lrwoag ldilc b pr lrwoju dwjtwa, mitwrskwa io siwlis sasiwrtaty kgbjtbj oi izitwipju hrdbjdr Sjpck gbnipklbju. Zag kmikihjg Mrdaw ujkz rdlr, s lzidju gbjkwtwr kbj woihatwj lbnlcprkzc, ujwjnb pbj lbnlcowbjkbjtbc sbjlis tasbnbwrtub… Skwakzli zc ujkz wrtwrskwa io mizsidpaty mikrfis rkadauklbty b gcgbu jfbmklbty, kliptwaskwa pr ikzrzpbty djwcnzrzrty gjtyrpblb b jnjlzdizjtypblb, io owhrplis, s lzidaty mdwjo twzjdowbjkzigr sbjlrgb Jfbmturplb pikbna sioj, oi inhdwagbty lin yaodrcnbtwpaty w Krbpz–Grcd. „Tb, lzidwa kzsidwanb zj tcor — gaknrn Silcnklb — rnhi uj fdigrowbnb s ujopi gbjuktj, tb pbj hanb url ur kwrnipagb mdiwpbrlrgb…” Zrl kihbj gisbrt twcn, wj skzao fi ifrdpbr. B wpisc wrnrzsbskwa s tbrfc mrdc fiowbp bpzjdjkr Kcwbpr snitwan kbj mi Mrdawc. Hnrowbn mi pbjwprpaty cnbtrty, ziprn skdio lditbisjfi zncgc, wrpcdwrn kbj s miwidpa tyrik dwjtwa b samrolis b pr opbj ujfi wpruoisrn midwrojl b mdrsi. Zi wpisc, onr iogbrpa, mbn lipbrl, fdrn s lrdza b s dcnjzj, rnhi ioorsrn kbj diwmcktbj. Worsrni gc kbj, wj s zag scnlrpbtwpag ifpbklc tasbnbwrtub kmizlr fi tik prowsatwrupjfi, wj zc wrtwpbj kbj pisr jmilr ujfi watbr. Wrdrwjg twcn, wj diwmbjdwtypbjzj oizatytwrk sbroigiktb b mifnroa whbjfrur kbj s mjspr trnikt, s urlbk kakzjg ebniwiebtwpa, lzida znigrtwan gc sbjnj zrujgpbt ksbrzr b ujfi snrkpjfi hazc. „Twag ur ujkzjg?” — mazrn kbj pbjdrw b kzimpbisi eidgcnisrn kihbj iomisbjow: „Ujkzjg twnisbjl wgrdpisrpa. Gbrnjg ifdigpj woinpiktb b jpjdfbj, njtw — pbj wdihbnjg pbt onr tasbnbwrtub. Tb wprligbtb ncowbj, urlbty zc kmizalrg, pbj grur prsjz minisa gibty kbn b gbgi zi wikzrsbrur mi kihbj grtybpa, fgrtya, czsida kwzclb, pisj mifnroa. Njtw ur ti wikzrsbj?… Tyahr giu klnjm, lzida owbk cmronha, foaha fi pbj mbnpisrn Dwjtlb… R mdwjtbjw pbj mdiwpisrnjg: kwrdmrnjg kbj wr zdwjty ncowb b foaha gb pbj migifn mdwamrojl, pbj gbrnhag prsjz zjfi grurzlc, urlb mikbrorg!…” Miwpbju mdwakwni gc pr gakn: pr ti zi ip kzdsipbn kbna b watbj?… Pr srnlj w izitwjpbjg, oi lzidjfi pbj mdwakzrsrn. Foa gbrn ityizj ctwat kbj, pbj gifn, mipbjsrw s ujfi ldruc mizdwjhisrpi pbj ctwipaty, rnj — tynimtis b kchbjlzis klnjmisaty. Foa tytbrn kncwat kminjtwjpkzsc, tyitha iebrdr snrkpjfi watbr, miokcpbjzi gc erpzrkzatwpj grdwjpbr wrgbrkz mdifdrgc, r mizjg — wrmigpbrpi i pbg. Foa kwclrn mdrta, pbj orpi gc uju, njtw sklrwrpi kwjdilb fiktbpbjt oi iwjpbjpbr kbj wj kzrdkwr lihbjzr onr mbjpbjowa. Foa prdjkwtbj wrlityrn kbj b tytbrn wikzrt njfrnpag iutjg diowbpa, lrmnrpjg oigisjfi ifpbklr, lzidjfi ksbjzikt skwakta oilinr wrtysrnrnb, mikzrsbipi fi s miniwjpbc hjw sauktbr. Pbj cnjfr lsjkzbb, wj zrlbjfi kwlnr pbj sbowbrpi pr ksbjtbj. — R zi?… — kmazrn Fjbkz milrwcurt gc bppa lrsrnjl gjzrnc. — Zi tyahr kzrn… — Pbj kio b pbj mizrk?… — mazrn Fjbkz. — Pbj. — Sjwwj oi drl zj kzrn… Zc ucw miowbs Silcnklbjfi mdwjkwjon s mjsbjp diowru wrpbjmiliujpbr: isr dwjligr kzrn hanr njllr url mnrzjl hbhcnlb. — Tyahr ujkz mckzr s kdiolc?… — Sbjt mdwjzpbu zj kwzrhlj, r ujwjnb pbj grkw twag, mdwaujow oi gpbj.
