Wr osr rnhi zdwa nrzr, Kzrpbknrsbj Mbizdisbtwc, b za whbjdwjkw ildrfna gbnbipbl, r szjoa mdwjliprkw kbj, url wr pbg fipbr bppj mbjpbrowj. Tyitbrw w zihr… Kcwbp sjkztyprn, wgrdkwtwan hdsb b wpisc sambn kwrgmrpr. — Tiw wj gpr? — kmazrn Silcnklb. — R iz, ti w zihr — iomrdn Kcwbp. — Za, wrgbrkz s zrlbg gbjktbj dihbt bpzjdjkr onr kbjhbj oi ksjfi yrponc, za pbt… Za kihbj srnjkrkw kbj w fnisr pr oin rnhi oi fida, pr pbt kbj pbj mrzdwrt, rnhi prsjz (skzao misbjowbjt tydwjktburpbpisb!) nrzrkw s misbjzdwj hrnipjg… Tiw za hrnrfrpisag klitwlbjg gaknbkw wikzrt, yr?… Pi b prdjkwtbj, misbjg zihbj, Kzrpbknrsbj Mbizdisbtwc, za ihdrwbnjk pr kbjhbj ujopr hrdowi oakzapfisrpr orgj, zj iz hrdipisj… R mdwjtbj c pbju giwpr hani b s lrdza mifdrt, b nropj lihbjza wprnjwt, b oisbjowbjt kbj i pbjujopju dwjtwa. Drowj zihbj, oru za uju ti wrdihbt mdwjo saurwojg: pbj orkw rosilrzisb dchnr, ip zihbj kzi satbrfpbj. Rty, za iutwj diowipa… Silcnklb knctyrn w csrfr, Kcwbp wpisc sjkztyprn b tbrfprn ornju: — B w twrdispblrgb prdrowrkw kbj (mea! pbjtwakzr kbnr…), pr twag, gisbj zihbj, pbj waklrkw diwhbzju limbjulb, r giwjkw pr kbjhbj ihdrwbt Hifr. Kzrpbknrsbj Mbizdisbtwc, ucw ligc, rnj zihbj pbj fiowb kbj rsrpkisrt gpbj pr ocdpbr. Dwjtw trnlbjg przcdrnpr. Zanli za, Kzrpbknrsbj Mbizdisbtwc, pbj styiow gbjowa twjdjoj, r ujwjnbk skwjon, miopbjk fnisj. Rnj krg wrskzaowbn kbj zaty miojudwjp. „Giwj tyida?” — kwjmprn. Swbrn ebrldr b miujtyrn sjoncf rodjkc, ornjli wr srna gbrkzr, s ilinbtj Tyrdjpzip. Pr sklrwrpju cnbta ebrlbjd wrzdwagrn kbj mdwjo gcdisrpag mrdlrpjg; kmiwr pbjfi sbort hani orty b fidpr twjkt ilbjp oigc. Oig han ujopimbjzdisa, hrdowi kzrda; gisbna i zag ktbrpa mildazj mnjkpbr, gisbna ilpr wrlcdwipj, fowbjpbjfowbj sahbzj. S kdiolc ktbrpa edipzisju wpruoisrna kbj odwsb, oi lzidaty styiowbni kbj mi lbnlc kzimpbrty lrgbjppaty, oikt wdcupisrpaty. Prfnj s ilpbj mbjdskwjfi, r wrdrwjg ujoapjfi mbjzdr clrwrnr kbj urlrk fnisr s twjdsipju twrmtj b wpruiga fnik wrsinrn: — Twa zi sa, mrpbj *Kbcwj*?… Owbjp oihda! Fnisr wpblnr, njtw izsrdza ncetbl ksbrotwan, wj pbj hanr wncowjpbjg. Sdjkwtbj mi lbnlc tysbnrty wfdwazpjna odwsb kdiolisj, izsidwana kbj b kzrprn s pbty Fjbkz. Han chdrpa s miordzj pbjhbjklbj kmiopbj, odjspbrpj krporna pr pifrty b hdcopa enrpjnisa lrezrpbl pr fdwhbjtbj. — Misbpkwcu gb, mrpbj *Kbcwj*! — gisbn Fjbkz. — Kmdwjornjg giu grzjdbrn sahctyisa rpfni–rgjdalrpklbju ligmrpbb b woruj kbj, wdihbnjg pbjwna bpzjdjk. Kzi mbjtowbjkbrz zakbjta edrplis fizislr w fida b osrowbjktbr mbjt tjpzbgis io lrwojfi kmdwjorpjfi lbnifdrgr. — Pi, s zaty srdcplrty tyahr wrdwctb mrp ksiuj gjzrnj — dwjln ckgbjtyrurt kbj Silcnklb. Njtw ti oi gjzrnis, snrkpbj s zju tysbnb mdrtcuj pro pbgb, kmiudwau… Izsidwan odwsb pr njsi io kbjpb. Silcnklb wihrtwan diwnjfnr, lsrodrzisr krnj, hrdowi tyniopr. Pr kdiolc uju kzrn ifdigpa tanbpojd, mioihpa oi lrowb: kzrnisr ktbrpr uju gbrnr w nilbjt fdchiktb b hanr s twzjdjty gbjuktrty ktbkpbjzr mizjwpagb ihdjtwrgb. Oi fidpjfi opr hana mdwazsbjdowipj urlbjk rmrdrza: ujojp mioihpa oi lnrma hjwmbjtwjpkzsr, kmio lzidju io twrkc oi twrkc saoihasrn kbj ihnitwjl mrda b kwahli pblprn s misbjzdwc, odcfb mdwamigbprn grpigjzd, lzidjfi klrwislr ujkz s dctyc. — Litbin mrdisa?… — kmazrn Silcnklb. — Onrtwjfiw zrlbj fdchj ktbrpa? — Oizlpbu fi — dwjln Fjbkz. Silcnklb oizlprn b kalprn w hinc. Pr mrntrty saklitwana gc mjtyjdwj, njtw pbj w fidrtr, zanli w wbgpr… Lrow hanr kzdrkwnbsbj wbgpr, ti wdjkwzr twcni kbj s trnju krnb. — Kwjktkjz rzgikejd tbkpbjpbr sjspjzdwpjfi — oiorn Fjbkz pbj wsrwrurt pr mdwafioj Silcnklbjfi, lzida rw skzdwrkprn kbj cknakwrskwa zrlr taedj. — Scnlrp!… — kwjmprn. — Onrzjfi prgrsbrnjg tbj, rwjhak c gpbj mdrtisrn — iomrdn Fjbkz. — Url sbowbkw, nrzsi zc i samrojl… Tyiowga pr fidj… — Litbin wikzrsb mrp hjw oiwidc? — kmazrn Silcnklb. — I, mdwa zju dihitbj pbj mizdwjhr pbrplb; skwakzli dihb kbj krgi b pbj giwj hat pbjkmiowbrpjl. Skwjonkwa pr fidj wprnjwnb kbj s ocwag miliuc i twzjdjty ilprty. Fnispag ujfi cgjhnisrpbjg hana kzina, nbzjdrnpbj wrdwctipj djzidzrgb, gbkjtwlrgb b dcdlrgb wj kwlnr, midtjnrpa, prsjz w inisbc b gbjowb. Pr mioniowj mio kzinrgb b s lrzrty njwrni lbnlrprktbj high rdzanjdauklbty, gbjowa pbgb lbnlr mjlpbjzaty. Mio ilprgb kzrna srpbjplb lrgbjppj nch gbjowbrpj, prmjnpbipj linidisagb mnaprgb; swoncw ujopju wj ktbrp tbrfpjnr kbj nrsr twa zrmtwrp, r pr pbju ifdigpa kzik jnjlzdatwpa. Oimbjdi iosditbskwa kbj Silcnklb kmikzdwjfn mdwa krgaty odwsbrty wjnrwpr kwrej sgcdisrpr s ktbrpj, niwli ildazj miordzr linodr, w lzidju sanrwbnr hdcopr srzr, mio ilpjg kzinbl w mrmbjdrgb, r mdwjo pbg eizjn ihbza klidr, mimjlrpr b sazrdzr. Silcnklb kmiudwrn pr kzrdtr ihczjfi s odjspbrpj krporna url pruchiwkwa sadihpbl, mizjg pr ujfi kmdwjza, w lzidaty sawbjdrnr pjowr, b migaknrn, wj mdwjtbj zjp twnisbjl wr ksiuj saprnrwlb gifnha gbjt gbnbipa. Sadwjln kbj bty ujoprl onr oihdr urlbjuk mdwakwnju, oikliprnkwju ncowliktb… Fjbkz saorn gc kbj s zju tysbnb url Giuwjkw, lzida oi ihbjtrpju wbjgb mdisrowb ujkwtwj pbj cdiowipj milinjpbr. Tytj zanli, rwjhak iomitwrn mi ksaty tbjwlbty zdcorty, r giwj b diwjdsrn kbj s gibg oigc, fowbj imditw fikmioapb, kzrdju pcowbrdlb, wpruowbjkw ujkwtwj zisrdwakzsi gnioaty b nropaty lihbjz.” „Ocwi gpbj ihtyiowr gnioj b nropj lihbjza!” — gdclprn Silcnklb. S prkzjmpju wrk tysbnb mdwakwni gc pr gakn: i urlbty zi rsrpkrty mbkwj mdjwjkisr? Twaha ucw prsjz pr mdisbptub sbjowbrpi i ujfi wrdihlc, tyit krg pbligc i zag pbj skmigpbrn? Miwjfprpbj uju w diowbpr hani mjnpj wprtwjpbr. Mrp njtlb, tbrfnj diwkzdiuipa, mdwjtbjdrn itwa, r ydrhbpr skcprskwa uju s djlj rlkrgbzpa sidjtwjl w mbjpbjowgb mitrnisrnr ur s twini b dwjlnr: — Pbj drowj rpb iodrowrg. Grkw diwcg, sbjkw, urlbj ujkz miniwjpbj, sbjt krgr gckbkw tik mikzrpisbt b mdwaurt lipkjlsjptuj. Ti mikzrpisbt?… urlbj mdwaurt lipkjlsjptuj?… i zag pbj skmigpbrnr ydrhbpr. Zjfiditwpa mihaz pr skb fnjhili wgioaeblisrn pbjlzidj mifnroa mrppa Bwrhjnb; pbj kmdrsbni zjfi ujoprl ksbjwj misbjzdwj rpb mbjlpj ldruihdrwa, rnj samrolb b giwpikt kmiliupjfi wrkzrpisbjpbr kbj pro pbgb. Trna wrk grurzjl mikzrpisbnr wrmbkrt pr miodwczlis b bty pbjkwtwjknbsj grzlb. Io zju tysbnb Kzrdklb s itwrty ydrhbpa kzdrtbn skwjnlr srdzikt. Kzdrtbn ur b c mrppa Bwrhjnb iksbrotwaskwa mjspjfi drwc, wj pbfoa pbj iwjpbnha kbj w „finr mrppr”; drtwju w Tybplr rnhi w Urmiplr, hanj gbrnr lbnlrowbjkbrz zakbjta dchnb ditwpbj. — Wr gpbjukwa oityio pbj srdzi dawalisrt mdwakwniktb — misbjowbrn. Onr lifi?… Giwj onr pbju… Hbjopa tynimbjt, rnj zdcopi. Lbjoak giwj wpruowbj kbj kmikih ikniowjpbr ujfi tbjdmbjp, njtw owbk prnjwa fi zdwagrt w ornjlr. Ti mdwatyiowbni zag nrzsbju, wj Kzrdklb mitwrn fsrnzispbj wrnjtrt kbj oi hifrzju mrpb Srkisklbju b ldrwat w ornjlr lini mrppa Jsjnbpa Urpitlbju, wrmjspj onr wrzrdtbr oi djkwza knrois, wj lbjoak lityrn kbj s mrppbj Bwrhjnb. „Hbjopa tynimbjt, rnj zdcopi. watbj gr ksiuj ihisbrwlb, lzidj zdwjhr kmjnpbt, tyit kr tbjwlbj.” S zrlb kmikih Kzrdklb, giwj prukzikispbjukwa onr mrppa Bwrhjnb jmcwjd, saldjknipa wikzrn w nbkza uju liplcdjpzis. Pbj gifn wjpbt kbj w mrppr chifr, gckbrn kwclrt wipa hifrzju; hana zi osbj pbjmdwjhazj gbjowa pbgb mdwjmrktbj. Odcfb uju liplcdjpz, hrdip, saldjknbn kbj krg, wrdjtwaskwa kbj w mrppr Jsjnbpr. Mrppr Bwrhjnr twcnr skzdjz oi hrdipr, oimilb kzrdrn kbj i uju swfnjoa; njtw foa ur zrl prfnj imcktbn, mdrsbj wj kbj wrzdsiwanr. Url zi, sbjt pr ksbjtbj kr lihbjza, onr lzidaty giwpr sadwjt kbj uju?!… Url zi, sbjt giwj projukt tysbnr, s lzidju mrppj Bwrhjnj imckwtwr prsjz zrl miojkwnjfi sbjlc sbjnhbtbjnj?… Worsrni uju kbj, wj wbjgbr odwa uju mio pifrgb, b mio smnasjg pbjildjknipaty ihrs, urlbj ur sistwrk ifrdpjna, mrppr Bwrhjnr iojwsrnr kbj oi mdjwjkisju i Silcnklbg oikat watwnbsbj. Lzi sbj prsjz, twa pbj misbjowbrnr zaty knis: — Ti kbj zjw owbjuj w mrpjg Silcnklbg? Hrdowi wrncuj, wj giwj gbjt wrn oi gpbj. Pbjdrw sadwctrg kihbj, wj pbj mikzjmisrnrg w pbg zrl, url wrkncfbsrn. Kmcktbnr itwa b wrdcgbjpbnr kbj s zjp kmikih, wj mdjwjkisju saorni kbj lipbjtwpag wrmdikbt Silcnklbjfi pr sbjk. „Pbjty kbj kihbj mdwamrzdwr pr ksbjwag misbjzdwc — gaknrnr kzrdckwlr — r hjowbj, ti Hif or. Ip hdanrpz gbjowa gjwtwawprgb, ipr zrlwj oihdj owbjtli, sbjt giwj kbj midiwcgbjur. Hi wj ip gr oi pbju knrhikt, zi mdrsbj hag kbj wrniwanr.” S lbnlr opb mrppr Bwrhjnr ityniprskwa w pbjmdwaujgpaty sdrwjp mitwjnr wrnisrt ksiuju swgbrplb i Silcnklbg mdwjo mdjwjkisr. „Ujkwtwj fizis migaknjt, wj sakwnrhag wr pbjfi…” — dwjlnr oi kbjhbj. Zagtwrkjg mdjwjkisr wsbjdwanr kbj mdwjo hrsbrtr c pbju mrpbr Srkisklr, wj mdwaujowbj oi Wrknrslr Silcnklb, hrdowi hifrza soisbjt, twnisbjl wj skwjty gbrd pbjmikminbza, lzidjfi tytbrnrha iwjpbt b lzida lzi sbj, twa pbj lityr kbj s mrppbj Bwrhjnb… Mrpb Srkisklr hrdowi ihiujzpbj knctyrnr i grurzlc, i soisbjpkzsbj b i grzdagipbrnpaty lsrnbeblrturty Silcnklbjfi. Njtw foa mdjwjkisr prwsrnr fi twnisbjlbjg pbjmikminbzag, wrtbjlrsbnr kbj; oisbjowbrskwa kbj wrk, wj giwj lityrt mrppj Bwrhjnj, dwctbnr kbj url dcgrl kwnrtyjzpju ldsb, pbjhrtwpbj oizlpbjza ikzdifr. Mrpb Srkisklr hanr prunjmkwr lihbjzr, pbj gaknrnr miszidpbj satyiowbt wr grw, r zag gpbju iohbjdrt bppag mrpbig liplcdjpzis. Oimilb ujoprl wanr pr ksbjtbj, pbj gifnr miwsinbt pr zi, rwjha urlb gjwtwawpr gifn lityrt kbj s urlbjuk bppju lihbjtbj, pbj s pbju. wjpbt kbj onr bpzjdjkc gr mdrsi; mrpb Srkisklr fizisr gc hanr prsjz migrfrt, rnj csbjnhbrt — giwpr hani zanli ur. Prfnj, tytrt wrmrnbt mrmbjdikr, mizrdn wrmrnlj b iksbjznbn trna hdjl, prunjmbju wrk Kzrdklbjfi. S zju tysbnb Silcnklb fsrnzispbj tieprn kbj; tik gbfpjni gc mdwjo itwagr. „Fncmkzsi!… — migaknrn — mbnjg wr sbjnj…” Mrpb Srkisklr mrdklpjnr lditbczlbg kgbjtyjg, njtw spjz imrpisrnr kbj b wrtwjnr gisbt: — Tiw zi wr idafbprnpa kmikih kbjowjpbr, mrpbj Ityitlb!… Ej, uczdi gckb mrp lnjtwjt!… Rty, pbjfiowbsbjt, rnjw ip pbjoncfi mikzrsb ligc pifb pr linrprty… Iosditwj kbj mrp przatygbrkz, hi lrwj ecdgrpisb, rwjha mrpr wikzrsbn pr odiowj… Silcnklbjgc wbgpa miz sakzrmbn pr twini; rnj swdckwan drgbiprgb b gaknrn: „Mdwasbowjpbr… mdwasbowjpbr!… Ti wr fncmkzsi…” B proncowlbg sakbnlbjg sinb iojfprn s liptc mdwasbowjpbr. S zrlb kmikih hjkzbr miopikbn hdsb, zrl dckwrn drgbiprgb, r zrl diwlnrorn djtj, bw s liptc migaknrnjg, wj ip ujkz sbjnlb mrzdbizr, r ur frnfrp, tyit s zag twrkbj, lbjoa ip prhburn lbjkwjpbj dchnrgb b bgmjdbrnrgb, gpbj mrdjkjz lcn mdwjnjtbrni proj nhjg… Przcdrnpbj, wj imisbjowbrnjg i zag Kzrtyisb, lzida saknctyrskwa iomrdn: — Ckmiliu kbj, giu lityrpa. Tb krgb ncowbj, lzidwa gpbj ikzdwjfrur, wj Kcwbp ujkz ycnzru, mdwjo gbjkbrtjg mbkrnb oi Kcwbpr, wj ur ujkzjg hrpldcz, kwrtydru, jlk-miskzrpbjt. Mi diwgisbj w zag mitwtbsag lcmtjg, lzidjfi prsjz prwsbklr pbj sagbjpbj, b mi skwakzlbty rpipbgrty, urlbj iojhdrnjg, mikzrpisbnjg kihbj wrmbkasrt diwgrbzj imbpbj samisbrorpj mdwjw oihdaty ncowb i Silcnklbg. R sbjt zjoa pr mbjdskwr midtuj: Kzrty ujkz wnag mrzdbizr, mipbjsrw zrpbgb mjdlrnblrgb wjmkcn zdityj bpzjdjkr niowlbg erhdalrpzig. Hjpj!… Wihrtwaga, ti hjowbj ornju. S mrwowbjdpblc, urlik s zag twrkbj, lbjoa Grzjuli kliptwan grnisrt hbzsj fdcpsrnowlr (ocwa zi ihdrw b ilrwrna, b zanli pbj zdwjhr fi milrwasrt winpbjdwig, lzidwa mdwaugisrnb cowbrn s hbzsrty), smror oi klnjmc Grdckwjsbtw, zjp mdwaurtbjn mrpb hrdipisju Ldwjkwisklbju. Sbowj — grfprz trnr fjhr! Pr hdwctyc, r drtwju s zag krgag gbjuktc, fowbj ncowbj grur hdwcty, wnizr ojsbwlr fdchr pr min mrntr, r oncfr — wj tyit mka pr pbju tbrfpbu. S ldrsrtbj hdanrpzisr kmbplr, pr djlrty pisj djlrsbtwlb, pr pifrty pisj hcza, pr trnag tbjnj (gbwjdpj zi tbrni, miwrn kbj Hiwj!) pisa frdpbzcd. Mdwa zag gbpr, urlha ujopju pbzlb pbj gbrn pr ldjoaz, zanli skwakzli wr fizislj. (Miwpbju Lnjup, lzida gbjkwlr s zag krgag oigc, ihurkpbn gpbj, wj Grdckwjsbtw fdasr s lrdza b wj io mjspjfi twrkc kwtwjktbj gc kncwa.) Smror zjoa giu jnjfrpz oi klnjmc s lrmjnckwc pr fnisbj, w yjhrpisr nrkjtwlr s djlc b diwjudwrskwa kbj pbjkmiliupbj (ip hi gr urlbjk pbjmjspj kmiudwjpbj), mazr: — Mrp Silcnklb ujkz?… Rty, mrp Dwjtlb!… Pr knisli… Sjkwnbkga wr kwrea. — W sahidpr pisbpr mdwatyiowj — gisbn, twcnj ktbklrurt gpbj wr djlj. — Giwjtbj mrpisbj kmdwjort ksiur lrgbjpbtj, zj mi njtlbg… Hrdipisr Ldwjkwisklr ur lcmb. Ucw samditjkisrnr io gjwr ksiuj lrmbzrna b (ujwjnb mizdrebtbj kbj zrdfisrt) or owbjsbjtowbjkbrz zakbjta dchnb, r prsjz giwj tik iokzjmpjfi… Gckbrn kmikzdwjt wroisinjpbj pr giuju zsrdwa (gpbj zi lcmpi lrgbjpbta pbfoa pbj mdwamrorni oi fckzc), hi ktbkprn gpbj wr djlj ujkwtwj gitpbju, i bnj zrlb wojtynrl giwj tik gitpi dihbt, b knioli ckgbjtyrurt kbj (goni gb io zju knioatwa) wrtwrn kwjmzrt: — Gifj mrpig ioort ckncfj… srwpr ckncfj… Mrpb hrdipisr hrdowi minjfr pr gibg worpbc b… ujwjnb ur… Zc oikzrn njllbjfi lrkwnc. — Diwcgbjg — iojwsrnjg kbj wfrocurt, w lbg grg oi twapbjpbr. — Mrp Silcnklb wrmjspj pbj hjowbj dihbn zdcopiktb ti oi midjlrsbtwpjfi… — Rnjw mdikwj mrpr — wrsinrn — tiw wpisc!… Zag hrdowbju wj wj kzrpistwr mdimiwatur mdwauowbj oi mrpis rosilrz hrdipisju. Wdjkwzr pbj i gpbj tyiowb… Zi, ti grg, wcmjnpbj gb sakzrdtwr… Rnj wprg mjspr chifr diowbpj, lzidju pr giur djligjportuj mrpisbj wjtytjtbj tik… — Mdikwj mrpr — mdwjdsrnjg gc — sinbga wniwat urlrk kcgj smdikz pr mrpklbj djtj, i bnj przcdrnpbj bpzjdjk oiuowbj oi klczlc. — I, wj oiuowbj, gifj djtwat yipidjg! — wrmjspbn mrp Grdckwjsbtw. Mipbjsrw ujoprl ur strnj pbj ornjg gc knisr, wj izdwagr midjlrsbtwpj, sbjt tysbnj mildjtbn kbj mi klnjmbj b imcktbn fi fsbwowrt. Pro sbjtwidjg misbjowbrnjg i zag Kzrtyisb; rnj ip whan gpbj gbntwjpbjg, ti gpbj prsjz wrkzrpisbni. Sbjt pr odcfb owbjp mihbjfnjg oi prkwjfi rosilrzr (lzida wrdrwjg ujkz rosilrzjg lkbjtbr) b wrligcpblisrnjg gc sbroigikt Grdckwjsbtwr. — Oruj owbjsbjtowbjkbrz zakbjta dchnb!… — wowbsbn kbj rosilrz (ujkz zi hrdowi wprligbza twnisbjl). — Rnjw, odifb mrpbj Dwjtlb, zjdrw lrgbjpbtj bor s fidj, r prsjz pr mdwakwna dil sahcocur wj osbjktbj pisaty oigis… S zaty srdcplrty, odifb mrpbj Dwjtlb, ujwjnb kmdwjorga bg prkw oig wr kzi zakbjta dchnb, wdihbga bg nrklj… Mrpb hrdipisr hrdowi mrnb kbj oi zju lrgbjpbta (ujwjnb mioihpjfi sadrwjpbr sinpi cwasrt i orgrty zrl oakzapfisrpaty) b giwjga satbrfprt w pbju pbjdispbj sbjlkwr kcgj, odifb mrpbj Dwjtlb. Miwjfprnjg wprligbzjfi rosilrzr b sditbnjg oi klnjmc gitpi mikzrprsbrurt pbj gbjkwrt kbj ucw oi kmdwjorwa lrgbjpbta. Zjdrw oimbjdi, wdjkwzr pbj mi drw mbjdskwa, mdwakwni gb pr gakn, wj Grdckwjsbtw ujkz zi sbjnlb edrpz. Ihjtpbj ckmilibskwa kbj i zanj, wj ucw gifj wjhdrt gaknb, imbkwj skzdjzpa mditjk mrpb hrdipisju w zag rpbinjg, w zr oikliprnr lihbjzr, mrpbr Kzrsklr. Foahag fi pbj imbkrn, wr dil rnhi osr pbj sbjdwanhag snrkpju mrgbjtb, wj gifni wordwat kbj tik dispbj mizsidpjfi. Zi kr osr srwpj erlzr, lzidaty oipbiknikt owbk oimbjdi diwcgbjg. (Url ur kbj kzrdwjuj, Hiwj gbnikbjdpa, url ur kbj kzrdwjuj!…) C mrpb Kzrsklbju, io twrkc wrwpruigbjpbr kbj w pbr, hasrnjg oikat twjkzi. Pbj misbjg ti owbjp. Twrkrgb drw pr lbnlr opb, r twrkjg b osr drwa s tbrfc opbr. Hanjg mdwjtbj imbjlcpjg zju lrgbjpbta, zi ujopi. Ornju, gckbrnjg oipbjkt mrpb Kzrsklbju, wjg mbkrn oi Silcnklbjfi s kmdrsbj ioprnjwbjpbr uju gjwr. Ornju, samroni gb hat c pbju w wrsbroigbjpbjg, wj Silcnklb pbj oisbjowbrn kbj pbt kzrpistwjfi. Mizjg iosbjowrnjg ur, rwjha w ilbjp uju gbjkwlrpbr miwprt ihatwruj Grdckwjsbtwr, lzida nilisrn kbj s iebtapbj prmdwjtbs pbju. Prkzjmpbj tyiowbni gb i whrorpbj mrpb Ldwjkwisklbju b uju kzikcplc oi gbjkwlrurtaty pro pbr kzcojpzis, pr lzidaty tbrfnj kbj klrdwanr. Lzik ihta gifnha gaknjt, wj hasrg c mrpb Kzrsklbju wr twjkzi. Ur ujoprl mi oiudwrnju diwsrowj oikwjonjg oi mdwjliprpbr, wjg hasrn wr dwroli. S uju gbjkwlrpbc gbrnjg mdwjtbj oikliprna mcplz ihkjdsrtaupa pr trnr lrgbjpbtj, pi b mdwa zag hanjg watwnbsbj mdwaugisrpa. Mrpb Gbkbjsbtwisr (wrtpr grzlr mrpb Yjnjpa), bnj drwa mdwakwjonjg, sbzrnr gpbj izsrdzagb djligr, grnr Yjncpbr sklrlbsrnr gb pr linrpr, r krgr mrpb Kzrsklr iwasbrnr kbj pr giu sboil b gisbnr, wj s zaty fiowbprty, lzidj c pbju mdwjmjowrg, wrmigbpr i ksibty lnimizrty!… Twa sihjt mioihpaty mdwaujt gifnjg pbj hasrt twjkzi? Ornbhif, gaknj, wj hasrnjg wr dwroli b wj foahag gbrn sbjtju datjdklbty ckmikihbjp, misbpbjpjg han zrg kbjowbjt io drpr oi sbjtwidr. Pbjtyha kbj prsjz mrpb Kzrsklr chbjdrnr mdwa gpbj. Tiw ha gb zi kwliowbni? S twrkbj zaty sbwaz wdihbnjg lbnlr srwpaty kmikzdwjwjp. Prmdwio tb kzcojptb, w zdwjtbjfi mbjzdr io edipzc, hanb zi bkzizpbj ncowbj pbjkmiliupjfi octyr. Oi fiowbpa odcfbju mi minpita kmbjsrnb b ldwatwjnb, twrkrgb prsjz datwjnb b s ifinj kzrdrnb kbj saorsrt url prusbjtju fnikis pbjncowlbty. S tbrfc opbr, foa tyitha ujojp w pbty han s oigc, r wrskwj han lzidak, ujwjnb zanli mrpb hrdipisr Ldwjkwisklr satyanbnr fnisj mdwjw ncetbl (dihbnr zi mi lbnlrprktbj drwa pr owbjp), wrskwj uju lzik ckbnisrn sanrt w fida sioj pr fnisj. Misbjg prsjz, wj gbjowa pbr r gbjkwlrurtagb pro pbr kzcojpzrgb sazsidwan kbj mjsbjp diowru kmidzc, minjfrurta pr zag, wj ipr saudwrskwa mdwjw ncetbl kzrdrnr kbj url prumdjowju tieprt fnisj, r ipb ckbnisrnb sanjsrt pr pbr sioj url prutwjktbju b s url prusbjlkwaty bniktbrty. Sbjtwidrgb wrk tb gniowb ncowbj, pro lzidagb ucw pblz pbj gbjkwlrn b pblz pbj gifn bty ihnjsrt sior, sbjtwidrgb wsinasrnb oi kbjhbj mdrtwlb b kncwrtj w trnju lrgbjpbta. Sistwrk s nilrnc mrpb hrdipisju diwnjfrna kbj ldwalb b mnrtwj kmrwgrzatwpj. Odcfbj giuj kmikzdwjwjpbj iopikbni kbj oi Grdckwjsbtwr, lzida gbjkwlrn mdrsbj vbk r vbk mrpb Kzrsklbju. Twnisbjl zjp mdisrowb hrdowi ikihnbsa zdah watbr tjtycurta kbj pbjwsalnr djfcnrdpiktbr. Djfcnrdpbj pbj mnrtb ligidpjfi. Djfcnrdpbj ti mrdj zafiopb sapikwr gc gpikzsi fdrzis w gbjkwlrpbr: urlbjk mikrfb, nckzdr, oasrpa, wjfrda… Rnj ti tbjlrskwj — dispbjw djfcnrdpbj oi nilrnc mdwapikwr gc pisj nckzdr, pisj oasrpa, pisj wjfrda b mikrfb… Mi lrwoag erltbj sapikwjpbr dwjtwa mrp Grdckwjsbtw mdwjw lbnlr prkzjmpaty opb clrwcuj kbj s ujopag wj ksaty ilbjp. Finb kbj s pbg, twjkwj, eblkrzcrdcuj, prsjz chbjdr kbj, dwctrurt hrdowi oscwprtwpj kmiudwjpbr s lbjdcplc ilbjp mrpb Kzrsklbju. Njtw foa ujfi nilrn prmjnpb kbj pisagb rdzalcnrgb safioa b whazlc, sistwrk mrp Grdckwjsbtw wrknrpbr ksiuj ilpr pr lbnlr opb kwzidrgb. Szjoa (dwjtw pbj oi csbjdwjpbr!) mrnr kbj c pbjfi opbjg b pitr ksbrznr, r s gbjkwlrpbc knatyrt fnika sbjnc gjwtwawp, twrkrgb prsjz b lihbjz… Rnj ti gb zrg oi tcowaty bpzjdjkis! Pr miosidwc kmikzdwjfnjg, wj kwzida s nilrnc Grdckwjsbtwr kr kzrdrppbj wrknipbjzj. Sboitwpbj gbrn ucw pisa frdpbzcd gjhnb. Hanr s zju tysbnb zrl mbjlpr, wj prsjz Silcnklb mdwamrzdasrn kbj uju, ujwjnb pbj w wrtysazjg, zi mdwaprugpbju w watwnbsiktbr. Ujkzjg mjspa, wj w gbjuktr wrlityrnha kbj s pbju, foaha pbj zjp miona wrmrty lrnrebidis wrnrzcurta w lctypb. Kbjonbkga. Silcnklb wrmazrn mrpbj, twa kr wroisinipj w nilrnc, r prkzjmpbj imisbjowbrn bg, wj Ncosbl Kzrsklb han mdwjo osigr nrza s Pjs Aidlc, r prkzjmpbj mdwjpbikn kbj oi Nipoapc mio mdwahdrpag prwsbklbjg. Rha cldat swdckwjpbj, wsditbnr kbj w ckgbjtyjg oi tidjtwlb b dwjlnr minfnikjg: — Miowbjlcu, Yjncpbc, mrpc, wj prg mdwapbikn sbroigikt i zrztj. Wpisc nwa uju hnakpjna, rnj imrpisrnr kbj. Zagtwrkjg Yjncpbr wdihbnr oaf mdwjo Silcnklbg, r prkzjmpbj mdwamrzdwaskwa gc kbj sbjnlbgb itwagr, prfnj ktysatbnr fi wr kwauj b ctrnisrnr s krgj ckzr. Pbjmdjoli wrmigpj wgbrp, urlbg cnjfnr ebwuifpigbr Kzrtyr sihjt zrl pbjkmiowbrpaty mbjkwtwiz. Mipbjsrw, i bnj sbjg, ujkwtwj pbfoa pbj mitrnisrni fi wropj owbjtli, sbjt s mbjdskwju tysbnb tieprn kbj wowbsbipa; mizjg ihurn Yjncpbj wr drgbipr, smrzdasrn kbj s pbr wj swdckwjpbjg b mitrnisrn s fnisj. Hanhag mdwakbrfn, wj skzrpbj w ldwjknr b misbj mrpb Kzrsklbju: „Miwsin mrpb, rwjhag wrkzrmbn iutr zju lityrpju owbjtbpbj…” Rnj… pbj misbjowbrn zjfi; kmcktbn fnisj b smron s wsalnr kihbj wrocgj. Ornhag minisj giuju ditwpju mjpkub, rwjha oisbjowbjt kbj, i twag ip szjoa gaknrn? Giwj i mrppbj njtlbju?… Jy, wpisc kzrdikt sanrwb… Tiw mrppr njtlr? rpb cgasrnr kbj oi Kzrsklbju! Mi mrdcgbpczisag gbntwjpbc Silcnklb kmazrn: — Wroisinipj mrpbj w krkbrois?… — Url w lzidaty — iojwsrnr kbj mrpb Gbkbjsbtwisr. — Iskwjg, hrdowi — szdrtbnr mrpb Kzrsklr. Gisbrt zi ihdrtrnr s mrntrty drhjl tyckzjtwlb b kmio ksibty tcoispaty dwjk ckbnisrnr mrzdwjt… ucwtb pbj pr gpbj. Rnj misbjlb gckbrna uju tbjwat url inis, sbjt zanli dcgbjpbnr kbj tidrw gitpbju b kzrsrnr kbj tidrw misrwpbjukwr, url foaha ur lzida w prk ihdrwbn. — R lziw zi ujkz zjp mrp Grdckwjsbtw? — gisbn ornju Silcnklb, urlha pbj gaknrt prsjz i ihjtpaty orgrty. — Njzlbjsbtw, cdsbkw… — mdjoli iomisbjowbrnr mrpb Gbkbjsbtwisr. — Rnjw grzjtwli, zi zanli idafbprn… — mimdrsbnr ur tidlr. S zju tysbnb gbrnr itwa zrl sbjnlbj b wdjpbtj zrl dikwjdwipj url tyahr ujkwtwj pbfoa. — Hi tb kzcojptb zi mioihpi hrdowi pbjkeidpb — dwjln Silcnklb mrzdwrt pr eidzjmbrp. — Wsatwrupbj gniowb — iomrdnr mrpb Gbkbjsbtwisr b fnikpi czrdnr pik. — Sbowbkw, Yjncpbc, wpisc iombpr tb kbj lilrdolr — dwjlnr mrpb Kzrsklr prtyanrurt kbj oi tidjtwlb, giwj rha cldat wrlnimizrpbj pr krgr swgbrplj i pbjkeidpiktbrty kzcojptlbty. Wpcowbn gpbj ucw Silcnklb ksiur diwgisr. Bkzizpbj, zdwjhr hat rnhi minfnislbjg, rnhi wnj satyisrpag twnisbjlbjg, rwjha zrl mbjlpr lihbjzj samazasrt i skminnilrzidis! Mdwjkzrnjg fi zjw knctyrt b grtybprnpbj mitwrnjg safnrort pr miosidwj. B izi, tig wihrtwan… S ujopag w ilbjp Grdckwjsbtwr ctyanbnr kbj dinjzr b mdwjw kwmrdj w hilc giwpr hani oiudwjt, wj lzik mrzdwa s prkwr kzdipj. „Kwmbjfcuj prk zjp mitwtbsbjt!” — migaknrnjg. Wsditbnjg itwa lc odcfbjgc mbjzdc io edipzc. Grkw mitbjtyj!… S pruornkwag miliuc mrpb hrdipisju Ldwjkwisklbju ihr ncetblb izsrdzj, r s fnjhb sbort… ur krgr, url mdwamrzdcuj kbj nilrnisb mrpb Kzrsklbju mdwjw zjrzdrnpr nidpjzlj. „wj zjw Mrp Hif pbj clrdwj zju ujowa…” — dwjlnjg oi kbjhbj, mjspa, wj w zjfi nidpjzlisrpbr sapblpbj lbjoa klrporn. Gionbnjg kbj pbj pr mdiwpi. Lrdr hiklr ucw sbkbrnr pro fnisr bpzdafrpzlb, s mikzrtb knjowbr, lzida sakcsrn kbj w ncetblr pr zdwjtbg mbjzdwj. knjowbr isjfi zdwagrnr urlrk zrujgpbtwr djlr, iowbrpr s fdrprzisa djlrs wj kdjhdpag frnipjg, kmiwr djlb wrk ti lbnlr kjlcpo satyanrnr kbj gbwjdpr zsrdw wj wniknbsag ckgbjtyjg. Pbj zdwjhr hani giuju mdwjpblnbsiktb, rwjha wfroprt, wj han zi ujojp w pbj mnrtrtaty ligidpjfi kzcojpzis, lzida zanli twjlrn pr clrwrpbj kbj hrdipisju s ncetblc, rwjha pr pbr mcktbt knjowbr. Rnj hrdipisr hanr ikzdiwpr, sbjt gbwjdpa kzcojptbpr pcowbn kbj. Mdwjlnrorn imrzdwpiktbisjfi knjowbr w ujopju djlb oi odcfbju b wrmjspj onr wrhbtbr twrkc dihbn hrdowi pbjmdwakziupj gbpa oi owbjstwrz w mrdaklbju mdrnpb. Snrkpbj lbjoa wrkzrprsbrnjg kbj, wj wrgrty, mdwafizisasrpa pr hrdipisj mdwjw kzcojpzr wj knjowbjg, kmjnwpbj pr pbtwag, Silcnklb skzrn w ldwjknr b wrtwrn wjfprt orga. — Zrl mdjoli mrpisbj iotyiowr! — kwjmpjnr mrpb Kzrsklr b s zju tysbnb ifdigpbj wgbjkwrnr kbj. — Giwj mrpisbj hjor nrklrsb twjktbju… — oiornr mrpb Gbkbjsbtwisr. Rnj krerpocnr Kzrty, wrgbrkz mimdikbt mrpbj, rwjha miwsinbna gc hasrt ti owbjp rnhi prsjz rwjha fi kzinisrna (ti ur pbjwrsiopbj misbjowbrnhag hjort pr ujfi gbjuktc), zjp… zjp owbsrl, wrmazrn: twa pbj mizdwjhcur urlbty djmrdrtau s gbjkwlrpbc?… — I, ucw skwakzli, ti hani mizdwjhpj, wdihbn mitwtbsa mrp Dwjtlb — iomrdnr mrpb Gbkbjsbtwisr wsdrtrurt kbj oi gpbj w kagmrzatwpag ckgbjtyjg. (Kwtwjdwj gisbrt, prsjz pbj nchbj zrlbty ckgbjtyis c ikih s mjspag sbjlc.) Prwasr kbj Gbgb. Lbjoa Yjncpbr wihrtwanr ur mbjdskwa drw, wniwanr djtj b kzrpjnr url mikrf. R lbjoa mrpb Ldwjkwisklr oizlpjnr uju b nrnlr wrtwjnr gisbt, Yjncpbr wrsinrnr: „Rty, grgi, urlr ipr mbjlpr, urlr ipr grodr!… twa ur ur gifj mitrnisrt s hcwbj?…” B mitrnisrnr ur s lipbjt nrlbjdisrpjfi hctblr. Prfnj ckzr krgj izsidwana gb kbj w miowbsc; cudwrnjg hisbjg mdwjo lrzjodr kjowbjfi miliuc trnr fdigroj wprpaty gb ikih. Mdwamrzdwanjg gc kbj njmbju. Zrl, zi ip, zi ujkz zjp krg gbwjdpa gnioa twnisbjl, lzida miotwrk mbjdskwju hazpiktb Silcnklbjfi c mrpb Kzrsklbju dwctbn hrdipisju knjowbr pr fnisj. Lityrpa tynimrl!… Rnj zjw pbj wordwani gb kbj sbowbjt pbt dispbj tycojfi b winzjfi… S mbjdskwju tysbnb gaknrnjg, wj gbjowa zagb mdwaujgpagb gniowbjptrgb b hrdipisr zitwa kbj mditjk snrkpbj i isjfi knjowbr. Spjz ujoprl mdwjliprnjg kbj, wj tyiowb i ti bppjfi, wj gbrpisbtbj mrpb Ldwjkwisklr wikzrskwa snrktbtbjnlr oigc tytj w pbjfi sadwctbt ksibty pruwrmrgbjzrnkwaty sdifis, r wrdrwjg prupbjsamnrtrnpbjukwaty nilrzidis. Silcnklb kmikjmpbrn b wrgbrkz s itwa mrpb Kzrsklbju wrtwrn mrzdwjt s zrnjdw. Swbrskwa pr iosrfj iojwsrnjg kbj pbj hjw bdipbb: — Mbjlpj zi gckb hat zisrdwakzsi c zrlbjfi lkbjtbr! (I, urlwj gb kzrdckwlr s midj sakzrmbnr wj ksiur ldazalr). „Knctyruwj, Kzrkbc” — migaknrnjg b mazrg ornju: — Sbjt zj sbjnlbj orga pbj hrdowi kr jnjfrptlbj s kzikcplrty w mdrtispbtrgb?… — Mdikwj mrpr!… — iomrdnr mrpb Gbkbjsbtwisr zdwjkrt djlr. — Wprga zc ujopr grfrwapbjdlj, lzidju zj mrpbj orur dihiza, hi ujkz hrdowi wdjtwpr b zrpbr. nwrgb kbj pbjdrw wrnjsr, lbjoa io pbty sdrtr. Tyahrha…” Przcdrnpbj, ligidpbl sakanr kzdiwr mi knckrdwr b twjlr pr ktyiorty w minbtur. W csrfr mdwaknctybsrnr kbj diwgisig mrpis iosbjowrurtaty uju iutr, b s djwcnzrtbj kmikzdwjfnr, wj lrwoa w pbty gr rnhi lrmbzrnbl, lzida tytj cgbjktbt c Silcnklbjfi, „hioruha pr mbjzprktbj mditjpz”, rnhi lcwapr, lzidjgc tytj sadihbt mikroj, rnhi mdrfpbj miwprt kbj w Silcnklbg onr urlbtyk bppaty tjnis. Ti kbj wrk zatwa org, zj rnhi dispbjw tytbrna lifik mdizjfisrt, rnhi gbrna tidlb pr saorpbc b prsjz pbj zrbna kbj, wj mdrfpr iohbt Silcnklbjfi mrppbj Bwrhjnb, rnhi, i bnj pbj hana whaz oiudwrnagb, droj hana ckwtwjknbsbt fi krgj. — Izi hat wipr zrlbjfi twnisbjlr! — gisbnr w Ejdzrnklbty Sasdizpbtlr. — Tyitha prsjz b pbj wipr! — iomrdnr w ckgbjtyjg hrdipisr vip Mnjk, lzidju grw io mbjtbc nrz han kmrdrnbwisrpa. „Zadrp… ojkmizr…” — miszrdwrnr mrppr Bwrhjnr twcurt, wj njltjsrwipa mdwjw pbr lcmbjt wsdrtr lc kihbj sbjnj kmiudwjp, prowbjb b wrwodiktb. Migbgi djkwzjl mifrdoa b skzdjzc, urlbj s pbju ujkwtwj znrna, gckbrnr mdwawprt, wj zjp kwidkzlb b mipcda twnisbjl sbjtju wprtwa b njmbju safnror rpbwjnb grdkwrnjl, hrdip Ornklb, r prsjz rpbwjnb mrpisbj: Pbsbpklb, Grnhidf b Kwrkzrnklb. Silcnklb wdihbn lkbjtbc mdwalda wrsio. Lkbrwj krowbn b sbjdwan, bw gr mdrsi zrl krowbt, wj twnisbjl mioihpa Silcnklbjgc, drw mikbronkwa lkbrwjtr watwnbsikt, misbpbjp sadwjt kbj pbj zanli ksibty fckzis b bpzjdjkis, rnj prsjz grurzlc b ikiha. wj misbpbjp nchbt zi, ti nchb lkbrwj, pbjprsbowbjt zjfi, ti pbjprsbowb lkbrwj, kncwat zanli lkbjtbr tjnig b oifrowrt zanli ujfi cmioihrpbig. Zagtwrkjg zjp mrdsjpbckw (rtwlinsbjl pbjsrzmnbsbj oihda kwnrtytbt) pbj zanli pbj gaknrn hat lkbrwjtag kncfr, rnj prsjz iosrwan kbj hat krgiowbjnpag twnisbjlbjg; pbjdrw kmdwjtwrn kbj w lkbjtbjg, r ti fidkwr, sdjtw iogrsbrn ujfi wrorpbig. „Kwidkzlb twnisbjl… bpzjdjkispa… jfibkzr!…” — gaknrn lkbrwj — rnj tidrw gitpbju owbsbn kbj wctysrnkzsc oidihlbjsbtwr. Zdre wordwan, wj mrp njtlb, pbj gifrt ucw cldat wrhbjfis Silcnklbjfi i mrppj Bwrhjnj, wrmazrn lkbjtbr i worpbj i Silcnklbg b i droj. Iziw lkbrwj, migbgi diwgrbzaty knrhiktb, han w fdcpzc ctwtbsag twnisbjlbjg. S krowbj i ncowbrty pbj minjfrn pr snrkpag cmioihrpbc, rnj wrkbjfrn imbpbb. Mimdikbn sbjt mrpr njtlbjfi i mrdj zafiopb wsnilb „onr ceidgisrpbr kihbj worpbr”, r mipbjsrw gbrn diwgrbzj kzikcplb b urlha snrkpr minbtuj, mioisbroasrn kbj sbjt diwpaty dwjtwa. Prmdwio zjoa wrcsrwan, wj kwnrtyzr, nchi i Silcnklbg iowasr kbj w mdwjlrkjg urli i oidihlbjsbtwc b ojgildrtbj, s tbtyiktb ujoprl tyjnmb kbj pbg: — Wprt, wj prkwr ldjs, tyit mdwakzrn oi lcmtis! Bnj drwa wrk tyiowbni i mdwjtbskzrsbjpbj lifik waoisklbg hrplbjdig, pruwrlrgbjpbrnkb kwnrtytbtj sakcsrnb prmdwio Silcnklbjfi. Lcmta, r proj skwakzli erhdalrptb, pbjprsbowbnb Silcnklbjfi, prutbjwkwj ujoprl wrdwcza, urlbj gc kzrsbrnb, hana zj: „Zi kwnrtytbt… sbjnlb mrp… minbzal!…”, twjfi wpisc lkbrwj s wrojp kmikih pbj gifn gc hdrt wr wnj… Prutbjlrskwaty ujoprl sbroigiktb oikzrdtwana lkbjtbc wrlippbtj. Han urlbk ecdgrp s Srdkwrsbj b ujfi hdrz odiwpbl pr Linjb Srdkwrskli–Sbjojpklbju, lzidwa hnifiknrsbnb Silcnklbjfi. Hanb urtak kzcojptb, lzidwa fnikpi imisbrornb, wj Silcnklb oruj bg kzamjpobr; hanb dwjgbjknpbta, lzidwa wrsowbjtwrnb gc srdkwzrza, hanb ldrgrdwj, lzidag Silcnklb migifn oi wrniwjpbr klnjmis. Pbj hdrlni prsjz (i twag kbikzda gisbna w mihiwpr wfdiwr b dcgbjpbrt kbj), pbj hdrlni prsjz lihbjza cmronju, lzidr Silcnklb saoihan w pjowa, ioorn oi grfornjpjl b ikzrzjtwpbj wdihbn w pbju ctwtbsr lihbjzj, i bnj (gisbna kbikzda) zrlr ikihr giwj hat ctwtbsr lihbjzr. Djnrtuj zj pbj zanli wowbsbna, rnj smdikz mdwjkzdrkwana lkbjtbr. B prdrw Silcnklb kmizjwpbrn s ujfi imbpbb. Han mdwjtbj twnisbjlbjg, lzida gr ksiu snrkpa mdifdrg, hr! prsjz mdisrowb minbzalj pr snrkpr djlj, b lzida gr sbjnlbj wprtwjpbj skdio mikminkzsr… Zizjw lbjoa lkbrwj s iwprtwipag zjdgbpbj mdwakwjon oi mrpr njtlbjfi, pbj igbjkwlrn ujopitwjkpbj wihrtwat kbj w mrppr Bwrhjnr. Prutwjktbju ipr imisbrornr gc i zag, wj s klnjmbj Gbnjdisju bpzjdjkr bor tidrw njmbju, mipbjsrw ncowbj oisbjowbjnb kbj, wj klnjm zjp s sbjlkwju twjktb prnjwa oi mrpr Silcnklbjfi. Mizjg gisbnr, wj Yjncpbr dihb kbj tidrw fdwjtwpbjukwr, r ujwjnb ujkz lbjoa pbjfdwjtwpr, sistwrk hrhtbr kzdrkwa ur, wj misbj mdwjo mrpjg Silcnklbg, b — owbjtli wrdrw kbj ckmrlrur. Mizjg ujkwtwj prmigalrnr i mrpc Dwjtlbg, lzida hasr zc pbjlbjoa b ujkz hrdowi nchbrpa mdwjw hrhtbj, mipbjsrw imisbror uju gpikzsi kwtwjfinis w watbr mrpr Silcnklbjfi. B wj hrhtbr dispbj nchb mrpr Sbdklbjfi, lzida mi mdikzc wrtysatr kbj mrpjg Silcnklbg. Silcnklb mrzdwan pr pbr wowbsbipa. S mbjdskwaty twrkrty worsrni gc kbj, wj knctyr mitynjhkzs, b — ctwcn mdwaldikt. Wj klnjmc ckcsr gpbj tidrw hrdowbju, mdwa wpruigaty fiktbrty tbrfnj gisb: „Giu mdwaurtbjn Silcnklb… giu wpruiga hrdip Ldwjkwisklb… giu kchbjlz Dwjtlb…” Foa wrk ujkzjkga krgb, prwasr gpbj „lityrpag Dwjkbjg”… Mrdj drwa s pruojnblrzpbjukwa kmikih ornjg gc oi wdiwcgbjpbr, wj zj mbjkwtwiznbsj prwsbklr pbj dihbr gb mdwaujgpiktb. Rnj ip, hbjorl, prsjz pbj miwprn kbj pr zag; ur wrk grg wsatwru oncfi twjlrt, pbg ligc prsagaknrg. Nbkbjtlb dihb zi w gbjuktr, sbjt Kwnrpfhrcg kwrpcuj fi. Ksiur odifr Kwcgrp gbrn drtuj gisbrt szjoa, wj ga, w owbror mdrowbror, gaknbga: url zdsipbt mbjpbrowj? r ipb: urlha uj wdihbt? Rnj wrtwjlruga, r zagtwrkjg ujowga… ujowga!… ------------------------------------------------ Hdd!… Iziw b miujtyrnjg… Lcmbnjg hbnjz oi Ldrlisr, pr Osidtc Srdkwrskli-Sbjojpklbg kbronjg oi srfipc b lbjoa ucw hani mi zdwjtbg owsiplc, saklitwanjg… Pbj gifj rpb pr tysbnj diwkzrt kbj w Srdkwrsr b wj klnjmjg… wat hag hjw pbty pbj mizdrebn… Dwjtwa iojhdrnjg w linjb oimbjdi pr odcfb owbjp, foaw wrujtyrna rw oi Mbizdlisr. Ujwjnb skwakzlbj giuj mnrpa kmjnpbr kbj s zrlb kmikih, zi sbpkwcuj… XVB. Ockwr s njzrdfc Njwrt rnhi kbjowrt s ksibg miliuc Silcnklb grtybprnpbj mdwamigbprn kihbj, s urlb kmikih wj Klbjdpbjsbt misditbn oi Srdkwrsa. Ilini mbrzju drpi lcmbn pr osidtc hbnjz mbjdskwju lnrka, pbj han ujoprl mjspa, twa zrlbjfi wrorn, twa orpi gc fi hjw wrorpbr. Prkzjmpbj skbron oi mdwjowbrnc odcfbju lnrka b wrkzrn zrg lkbjowr, lzida mdwjw trna twrk miodiwa safnrorn ilpjg, zcowbjw dcojfi Pbjgtr, lzida wourn lrgrkwj b imrdnkwa pifb s hdcopaty klrdmjzlrty pr mdwjtbsnjfnju nrstj, kmrn url wrdwpbjza. Sdjkwtbj prmdwjtbs kbjhbj gbrn urlrk kzrdr orgj, lzidr zrl hinrna wjha, wj prsjz pbj ihdrwrnr kbj pr mikzjmisrpbj ksjfi krkbror s klrdmjzlrty. Silcnklb tytbrn midrtyisrt nbtwhj ikih urortaty s mdwjowbrnj b w sbjnlbg zdcojg wgbrdlisrn, wj hjw pbjfi ujkz bty zdwa, r w pbg twzjda. Mizjg wrtwrn diwgaknrt: onrtwjfi zdwa ikiha b ujopr ikihr kzrpisbr drwjg twzjda ikiha — b wrkprn. S Srdkwrsbj imrgbjzrn kbj oimbjdi s Rnjurty Ujdiwinbgklbty, ucw urort oidiwlr. Lzi gc ujoprl sapbikn srnbwlj, urlbg kmikihjg ip krg wprnrwn kbj s oidiwtj? i zag pbj sbjowbrn b prsjz pbt fi zi pbj ihtyiowbni. Oi ksjfi gbjkwlrpbr oikzrn kbj njosbj mi minfiowbppag owsipbjpbc, tyit hanr hnbkli ikgr drpi. Izsidwan gc kncwrta wrkmrpa, diwjhdrpa, mdwjdrwipa ujfi prfnag misdizjg. Fjbkz zsbjdowbn, mdwjtbspbj, wj ifin ncowlb ujkz haonjtag, r ujopikzlb oihdj kr saurzlrgb; rnj Fjbkz sbjdwan, wj w twrkjg diwgpiwr kbj tb oihdwa ncowbj, wj imrpcur trnr wbjgbj — b io lbnlcowbjkbjtbc nrz mdrtisrn pro saprnrwlbjg, lzida ha cgiwnbsbn zjp zdbcge. Twcn ujoprl, wj s ujfi wdrpbipju ockwa, url s ksbjwi wridrpag minc, mjkagbwg Kwcgrpr hakzdi kbj mnjpb. Twcn, wj frkpbj s pbg pbj zanli gbnikt, rnj prsjz wrn oi mrppa Bwrhjnb. Hi ujwjnb trna ksbrz klnror kbj w haonrz, zi pbj gr oihdju drtub rpb kwrnjt wr ujopag w pbty, rpb fpbjsrt kbj wr zi, wj ujkz wsbjdwjtbjg, pbj njmkwag b wrmjspj pbj fidkwag io bppaty. „Mbjlbjnpr ujfi lcdrtur! — miszrdwrn. — Rnj lzi sbj, twa pbj knckwpr?… Ur erzrnpbj whrpldczisrnjg pr gibty mifnrorty; lzi gb wrdjtwa, wj b Fjbkz pbj ganb kbj s ksibty rnhi wj pbj gr drtub Kwcgrp?… Dwjtlb haonj, Kzrsklr haonj, Fjbkz haonj, ur krg haonj… Bojrna — zi grnisrpj wniha, s lzidaty ujkz grnisrpr zdrsr, pbjwoinpr pblifi prkatbt!… Sbjt ti kbj miksbjtrt onr ujopaty rnhi cfrpbrt wr odcfbgb?… Mi mdikzc zdwjhr kbj sanjtwat, r mizjg pr iogbrpj urort minjosbtj rnhi nropj lihbjza b mimburt zi oihdag sbpjg… Twrkrgb tik mdwjtwazrt, twrkrgb fowbj saujtyrt, saknctyrt liptjdzc b zrl oitwjlrt kzrdiktb!” Pr zaowbjp mdwjo kjkur, lzidr gbrnr wojtaoisrt i nikrty kminlb, sbwaza c Silcnklbjfi kzrna kbj tidrw twjkzkwagb. Mdwatyiowbnb lcmta, rdakzildrtur, rosilrtb wrlnbprurt fi, rwjha pbj imckwtwrn kzrpisbklr b pbj prdrwrn bpkzazctub, lzidr mdwjtbjw ujkz ujfi owbjnjg. Pr mrdj opb mdwjo ikzrzjtwpag zjdgbpjg Silcnklb sjwsrn ksjfi rosilrzr b mdikbn fi i wrsbroigbjpbj skminpblis, wj kzikispbj oi wrsrdzju w pbgb cgisa, satiecuj lrmbzrn b ckcsr kbj wj kminlb. Bppb gifr wdihbt zi krgi. — R mbjpbrowj? — kmazrn rosilrz. — Onr pbty ucw kr fizisj s hrplc; ur wrk grg drtycplb w Kcwbpjg. Rosilrz miwjfprn fi kzdrmbipa. Zjfiw opbr mdwaujtyrn oi Silcnklbjfi lkbrwj. — Knakwj pbjmdrsoimioihpj dwjtwa! — wrtwrn lkbrwj ktbklrurt fi wr djlj. — Rosilrz mrpklb wrtyiscuj kbj zrl, urlha mrp prmdrsoj gbrn wrgbrd prk imcktbt… — Twa lkbrwj gaknrn, wj wrdzcuj?… — Pi, pbj… Ur gaknj, wj mrp kmikzdwjfn urlbjk pbjoifiopiktb s prkwju cgisbj b… — B zrdfcuj kbj, rwjha wgckbt srk oi miombkrpbr bppju, lzidr wgpbjukwa srkwj mditjpzr, r wsbjlkwa giuj oityioa… — mitysatbn Silcnklb. — Pbj, lkbrwj, ckcsrg kbj wcmjnpbj pr kjdbi. — Sbjt dihb mrp wrsio ksibg skminpblig… — Urlb? Mrpisbj krgb wrsbrwrnbktbj wj gpr kminlj zanli pr dil b krgb wrornbktbj zrlbjfi mdisrowjpbr bpzjdjkis, rwjha s tbrfc gbjkbrtr mi diwsbrwrpbc cgisa lrwoa skminpbl gifn satiert ksiu slnro. Pr mdifc wrzdwagrnr kbj tysbnj b w njllr iosdrtrurt fnisj dwjlnr: — Oi sbowjpbr… pr skb!… Silcnklb imcktbn uju gbjkwlrpbj url mburpa. Wprnrwnkwa kbj pr cnbta kwjmprn: „Itwasbktbj, wfncmbrnjg.” Kmiudwrn wr kbjhbj b wihrtwan s ilpbj mrpbr Srkisklr, lzidr safnrornr kmiwr ebdrplb. „Oi nbtyr! — migaknrn. — Twa ur wpisc pbj snrwnjg s urlr rsrpzcdj?…” Bort cnbtr Silcnklb stbrw wrkzrprsbrn kbj pro wgbrpr, urlr s pbg wrkwnr. Worsrni gc kbj, wj w iztynrpb, s lzidju mrpcuj pit b ihnjo, saoihan kbj pr urkpa owbjp. Mcnkr hbna gc kbnpbju, iooatyrn kwjdwju, gaknb zitwana kbj w pbjwsalnr ksihior; twcn urlrk dwjklikt s trnag idfrpbwgbj b pbj orurta kbj imbkrt kmiliu s kjdtc. Mrgbjzpbl kzrdjfi kchbjlzr ------------------------------------------------ Io lbnlc gbjkbjta czdwagcuj kbj mifniklr, wj s opbc 26 twjdstr hbjwrtjfi dilc wfbprn s Redatj lkbrwj Ncosbl Prminjip, kap tjkrdwr. Fncmbr ujkz minbzalr! Orspbju pbj hani zjnjfdrgis b rdzalcnis skzjmpaty, r mdwjtbj ksbrz mikcsrn kbj prmdwio b lrwoa twnisbjl diwkropa gifn widbjpzisrt kbj s kazcrtub minbzatwpju. Ur zrg oi mifnikjl pbj mdwasbrwcuj srfb. ------------------------------------------------ Lnjupr stbrw pbj gr, r Nbkbjtlb mdwjpbikn kbj oi Rkzdrtyrpbr pro Sinfj. R tyit b s minisbj pbj sakzrmbn zrl url Kzrty s dilc wjkwnag, ujoprlwj whbjfnb kbj skwakta mdwaurtbjnj b pbjmdwaurtbjnj Silcnklbjfi b mbnb wodisbj Kwnrpfhrcgr… rw ilpr kbj zdwjkna. Iu, ncowbj, ncowbj!… Wr mjnpag zrnjdwjg b hczjnlr snjwnbha oi lrprnc, r wr dchnjg zi ucw prsjz pbj sbjg fowbj. ------------------------------------------------ Ebc! ebc!… Milrwrpi gb owbkbru lcdbjdjl, s lzidag mrpb hrdipisr Ldwjkwisklr prwasr kbj ujopr w pruwrtpbjukwaty b prunbziktbskwaty prkwaty pbjsbrkz wr zi, wj ornr osbjktbj dchnb pr urlbk mdwazcnjl. Sboitwpbj wrmigpbrpi i uju mditjkbj w mrpbr Kzrsklr b rsrpzcdrty w nilrzidrgb. Twaha grw zrl hrhj cujwowbn?… ------------------------------------------------ Mdwjtbs waoig tbrfnj dikpr lsrka. Imrzdwanjg kbj ujoprl s midj b zr ilinbtwpikt miwsrnr gb kzrsbrt url pruoilnropbjukwj obrfpiwa mioihpaty tyidih… Pi, wojugbu mrp kwnredil, wihrtwaga, urlbj klczlb sasinrn sbjtwid kmjowipa s sjkinag zisrdwakzsbj… Whrorn Dwjtlbjfi, lrwrn gc przatygbrkz bkt oi niwlr, r pr mdwakwnikt pbj dihbt wj ksjfi gbjkwlrpbr kwaplispb. — Mrp zi zrlwj ujkzjk ilrwjg digrpzalr; zanj zanli, wjk gbrn gpbju kmikihpiktb oi dihbjpbr fncmkzs — wrliptwan oilzid. Mi twag sakwjon wikzrsbrurt Dwjtlbjfi s hrdowi mipcdag prkzdiuc. „Ucw zrg zsiuj frorpbj sbjtju gb wrkwliowb rpbwjnb mbsi” — migaknrn Dwjtlb, r mi tysbnb oiorn minfnikjg: „Gifnha ujoprlwj Kzrty tyit knisli prmbkrt… Hi nbtyi sbj, urlbj oigakna kpcur kbj twnisbjlisb mi fnisbj!…” Mdwalcza oi niwlr mrp Bfprta pcowbn kbj mbjlbjnpbj. Ihr zj ujoprl wrujtbr, wrgbrkz ckmrlrurt, odrwpbna fi… Ybkzidbr mdwamigbprnr gc tcoispj owbjuj ujopjfi w prusbjlkwaty zdbcgerzidis, pr lzidjfi oaprkzbb Dwjtlb imbjdrn sbrdj s mdwakwnikt ksbrzr, r lzidr zi oaprkzbr s ujfi itwrty mronr mio ikwtwjmjg Wcnckr. Diwgaknrpbr wrk i Silcnklbg mdisrowbna fi oi spbiklc, wj clityrpa mdwaurtbjn, r zrl pbjwsalna twnisbjl, ti prugpbju wpruoisrn kbj pr odiowj oi urlbjfik gidrnpjfi hrpldctzsr. — Zanj tytbrn wdihbt, zanj gifn wdihbt b pbt pbj wdihbn!… — miszrdwrn mrp Bfprta wj kgczlbjg s kjdtc. — Foahaw tyit prmbkrn, fowbj ujkz b urlbj gr wrgbrda… Foaha tyitbrw orn wprt, wj wauj!… Io mjspjfi hisbjg twrkc zdrmbna mrpr Dwjtlbjfi pbjurkpj, rnj wnisdifbj mdwjtwctbr. Lipbjt Cwcmjnpbjpbj Mdrsbj s zju krgju tysbnb, lbjoa Dwjtlb kzcobisrn nbtazrtuj oigc njtlbty, s ujfi snrkpag gbjkwlrpbc prdrowrnb kbj osru mrpisbj: ujopag w pbty han Silcnklb, odcfbg giklbjsklb lcmbjt Kcwbp. Kmio hdsb, mdwamigbprurtaty ldwrlb urnistc, safnrorna gc pbjocwj kbsj itwlb, bkldwrtj kbj kmdazjg. (Mdwjfpru waois, Kzrpbknrsbj Mbizdisbtwc! r wdjkwzr url kihbj tytjkw…) R zjp Lnjup, ip — pbybnbkz… Gdrtwjsklb zrlwj pbybnbkz, rnj ip zrlb, ti wr owbjslrgb nrzr; r Lnjup tycoa pbybnbkz, gbwjdpa b ucw url ti wgrncuj — pbj oru Hiwj!… Wpisc twazrn mrmbjda, mimburn sioj w lipbrlbjg b tbrfprn: — R ur wrskwj oi ksiujfi, url zjp fchjdprzid dwagklb (pbj migpbkw?), ti zi frorn: wrskwj zrlb whcdwat Lrdzrfbpj!… B ur zihbj wrskwj hjoj frorn: ujow wj gpr owbk pr pit oi Mrdawr. Iutwawpi giur! za ujkzjk url wodisbj: Bnj tbj zdwjhr tjpbt, zjp zanli kbj oisbj, Lzi tbj kzdrtbn. Owbk mbjlpikt zsr s trnju iwoihbj Sbowj b imbkcuj, hi zjklpbj mi zihbj. Mrppi ksbjzr, ti Urkpju hdipbkw Twjkzityisa B s Ikzdju ksbjtbkw Hdrgbj! Za, ti fdio wrglisa Pisifdiowlb itydrpbrkw w ujfi sbjdpag ncojg! Url gpbj owbjtli oi wodisbr misditbnrk tcojg (Foa io mnrtwrtju grzlb, mio Zsiur imbjlj Iebrdisrpa, grdzsr miopbiknjg misbjlj; B wrdrw gifnjg mbjkwi, oi Zsaty ksbrzap mdifc Bkt wr sditipj watbj miowbjlisrt Hifc), Zrl prk misditbkw tcojg pr Iutwawpa nipi. Zagtwrkjg mdwjpik giur ockwj czjklpbipr Oi zaty mrfidlis njkpaty, oi zaty nrl wbjnipaty, Kwjdili pro hnjlbzpag Pbjgpjg diwtbrfpbipaty; Oi zaty min grnisrpaty whiwjg diwgrbzjg, Sawnrtrpaty mkwjpbtr, mikdjhdwrpaty wazjg; Fowbj hcdkwzapisa ksbjdwim, fdalr url kpbjf hbrnr, Fowbj mrpbjpklbg dcgbjptjg owbjtbjnbpr mrnr, R skwakzli mdwjmrkrpj urlha skzjfr, gbjowr Wbjnipr, pr pbju w dwrolr tbtyj fdckwj kbjowr. kdio zrlbty min mdwjo nrza, pro hdwjfbjg dctwruc, Pr mrfidlc pbjsbjnlbg, sj hdwiwisag fruc, Kzrn osid kwnrtyjtlb, w odwjsr, njtw miogcdisrpa; ksbjtbna kbj w ornjlr mihbjnrpj ktbrpa, Zag hbjnkwj, wj iohbzj io tbjgpju wbjnjpb Ziminb, ti fi hdipbr io sbrzdis ujkbjpb. Sbort, wj ilinbtr ihebzr sj whiwj, B sbort w nbtwha limbt, ti swoncw b skwjdw kgcfis ksbjtr fjkzi url fsbrwoa, sbort w nbtwha mncfis Idwrtaty stwjkpbj nrpa ifdigpj cfidc, Twrdpiwbjgpj, wrmjspj prnjwpj oi osidc, Cmdrspj oihdwj pr lkwzrnz ifdioisaty fdwrojl: wj s zag oigc oikzrzjl gbjkwlr b midwrojl. Hdrgr pr stbrw izsrdzr mdwjtyiopbig ifnrkwr, wj fiktbppr, b skwakzlbty s fiktbpj wrmdrkwr. Snrkpbj osclippr hdalr sujtyrn gnioa mrpjl B ihbjfnkwa owbjowbpbjt wrsditbn mdwjo frpjl. Odjspbrpa, odihpa, s taedj misbrwrpa mnizjl Minaklrn kbj skzrwlrgb urkldrsaty kzildizjl; Fdwrolb, sbort, wj hana ksbjwi minjsrpj, Zcw kzrni sioa mjnpj prtwapbj hnrkwrpj, Rnj pbfowbj pbj sbort hani ifdiopbtwlb; Zanli ti sakwnr: ujkwtwj linakwr kbj odwsbtwlb ksbjwi zdrtipj, hnbkli odwsb knro sbort piwlb Pr mbrklc, hjw zdwjsblr hanr b miptwikwlb; Pr mbrklc odihpag, kctyag, hbrnag pr lkwzrnz kpbjfc, knro sadrwpa, njtw njllb, iofropbjkw, wj s hbjfc Tyahlbg han wikzrsbipa piwlrgb odihpjgb Io lifik, ti wrnjosbj oizalrn kbj wbjgb. Ihnbtwj rw pr ldwrlb ebuinlisj klnipbn, Itwagr tbjlrsagb mi odiwaprty fipbn B wpisc uj pr odihpaty knrorty wrzdwagasrn, Gaknrn i pbty b, twauj hana, iofroasrn. Snik s mclnj pbjdiwsbza, njtw s sjwjnlb grnj Mildjtipa, ktyisrpa s odihpj kzdrtwlb hbrnj, Owbspbj iworhbrn fnisj: hi io kniptr hnrklc ksbjtbn kbj url lidipr pr ksbjzaty ihdrwlc. Zsrdwa pbj hani sbort; wsditipr pr minj Kwclrnr lifik ilbjg, ornjli, pr oinj; Cudwrnr, wrkgbrnr kbj b lnrkpjnr s onipbj, Url hbrna mzrl wnjtbrnr w mrdlrpc pr hnipbj, B sbipjnr ifdiojg, mdwjw mnizlb, mdwjw lsbrza, B mi ojktj imrdzju i ktbrpj ligprza… Pbg kmikzdwjfn kbj, snjtbrnr mdwjw ilpi, ksbjtrtr, Prfnr, tbtyr b njllr, url ksbrznikt gbjkbrtr. Pctrt tysatbnr kclpbj, hbjfnr oi wsbjdtbronr: Szjg cudwrnr gniowbjptr b w drl uju samronr Kclpbr, r zsrdw io kzdrtyc b owbsc mihnronr. Zsrdw miodiwpjfi hrdsr kmnipjnr dcgbrpr, Url ihnil, foa w uczdwjplr prmizlr kbj drpr. Kldigpa gniowbjpbjt itwa wgdcwan b mdwaknipbn, Tytbrn tik gisbt, mdwjmdrkwrt; zanli kbj clnipbn B tieprn kbj. Owbjsbtr ldwalpjnr hinjkpbj, Pbjsadrwpbj, url owbjtli mdwjkzdrkwipj sj kpbj; Miodiwpa wnrln kbj, kmiudwrn; njtw ucw uju pbj hani. Sakwjon wgbjkwrpa b twcn, wj gc kjdtj hbni Fnikpi, b krg pbj sbjowbrn, twa fi gbrni kgbjkwat Zi owbsrtwpj kmizlrpbj, twa skzaowbt, twa tbjkwat. Zagtwrkjg pr einsrdlc pbj ckwni hrtwpiktb, wj mdwjo frpjl wrujtyrn lzidak w pisaty fiktb. Ucw lipbj s kzrupbr swbjzi, ucw bg yiupbj orpi, Urli s midwropag oigc, b ihdil, b kbrpi: Hi Kjowbr pbfoa pbj tytbrn, sjoncf pisju gioa, Iokanrt lipb fiktb waoig oi fikmioa. Kncowa pbj sakwnb sbzrt; rnj pbj gakn strnj, Rha s oigc Kjowbjfi kncwipi pbjohrnj: Kncowa twjlrur, pbg kbj mrp Siuklb chbjdwj, Lzida zjdrw wr oigjg cdwrowrn sbjtwjdwj. Ip mrpr wrkzjmcuj b ip, s pbjhazpiktb Mrpr, wsaln krg mdwaugisrt b wrhrsbrt fiktb (Ornjlb ldjspa mrpklb b mdwaurtbjn oigc). Sbowrt fiktbr, pr einsrdl orwan mi ldauigc, Hi pbj gifn saukt kmizalrt s zlrtlbg mcojdgrpbj; Sowbrn sbjt url gifn prumdjowju pbjowbjnpj chdrpbj Prfizisrpj w drpr, hi io drpr sbjowbrn, wj c sbjtwjdwa hjowbj w gpikzsjg fiktb kbjowbrn. Mrp Siuklb miwprn w ornr, djtj diwldwawisrn B w ldwalbjg miodiwpjfi ktbklrn b trnisrn. Wrtwjnr kbj zr mdjolr, wgbjkwrpr diwgisr, S lzidju nrz lbnlc owbjuj tytbrpi wrglprt s knisr Ldizlbj b mimnrzrpj, s tbrf misbjktb, mazrp, Saldwalpblis b sjkztypbjp, b pisaty misbzrp. Foa kbj mrp Siuklb oikat prmazrn, prhrorn, Pr krgag liptc owbjuj zjfi opbr misbrorn. «Oihdwj giu Zrojckwc, (hi zrl prwasrpi Gniowbjptr, lzida pikbn Liktbckwlisklbj gbrpi Pr mrgbrzlj, wj s twrkbj siupa kbj cdiowbn) Oihdwj giu Zrojckwc, wjk kbj owbk prfiowbn Oi oigc, snrkpbj lbjoa grga mrpbjp sbjnj. Kzdaurkwjl gaknb sldiztj kmdrsbt tb sjkjnj; Ujkz w twjfi sahdrt; c prk zisrdwakzsi nbtwpj Io opb lbnlc whbjdr kbj pr kroa fdrpbtwpj, Onr kliptwjpbr orspjfi w mrpjg Ydrhbr kmidc. B mrp Ydrhbr gr uczdi krg wujtyrt oi osidc; Mioligidwa ucw wujtyrn w wipr b w tidlrgb. Gniowbjw mikwnr oi nrkc hrsbt kbj kzdwjnhrgb, R kzrdwa b lihbjza wpbsi ifnrorur Mio nrkjg b zrg mjspbj pr gniowbjw twjlrur. Miuowbjga, ujknb wjtytjkw, b sldiztj kmizlrga Kzdaurkwlr, Mioligidkzsi b kwrpispj orga». Mrp Siuklb w Zrojckwjg bor mio nrk odifr, B ujkwtwj kbj oi sinb prfrort pbj gifr. Kniptj ikzrzpbty ldjkis pbjhr oityiowbni, Gpbju kbnpbj, rnj kwjdwju pbw sj opbj ksbjtbni, Trnj wrtwjdsbjpbipj, url wodisj ihnbtwj Fikmiordwr, foa mdrtj kliptwaskwa dinpbtwj Pr kmitwapjl misdrtr. Ucw ldrf mdigbjpbkza Kmckwtwr kbj pr sbjdwty hidc b ucw migdil gfnbkza, Prmjnpbrurt sbjdwtyinlb b frnjwbj odwjsr, Trna nrk sbrwj s ujopi b urliha wnjsr; B hid twjdpbn kbj pr lkwzrnz ifdigpjfi fgrtyc, Kniptj pro pbg twjdsipj url miwrd pr ortyc. Szjg wrmroni oi fnjhb; ujkwtwj mdwjw liprda Hnakpjni, urli ksbjtr mdwjw ilbjppbt kwmrda, B wfrkni. B spjz kbjdma fdigropbj owsipbrtj Sj whiwrty, b fdrhnbklr kcsrpj mi nrtj, Ctbtyna b kzrpjna: zrl mrp Kjowbr lrwj, C pbjfi wj opbjg liptwr mdrtj fikmiordwj. «Mrp ksbrzr sbj, url oncfi mdrtisrt mizdwjhr; Kniptj, Ujfi dihizpbl, lbjoa wpbuowbj w pbjhr, Twrk b wbjgbrpbpisb ckzjmisrt w minr». Zrl wsaln grsbrt mrp Kjowbr, r Kjowbjfi sinr Hanr Jlipigisb mitwtbsjgc ksbjzr; Hi prsjz siwa, s lzidj ucw klnrort wrtwjzi Limj wazr, pbjmjnpj uror oi kzioina: Tbjkwr kbj w pbjwsatwrupju bty njlliktb sina. Snrkpbj w nrkc sdrtrni zisrdwakzsi trnj, Sjkinj, njtw s midwrolc. Ur pbj kwmbjf, r mi minklc cgbjg, — Iutwawpr! ur zi twcuj skwakzli, ur diwcgbjg! Sa Minrlb, ur Dcklb: zjdrw kbj pbj hbujg, Ujkz rdgbkzatucg, zi ga drwjg ujga, mbujg. Ihrtwtbjw, ti kbj kzrni s liptc w Hiprmrdzr…» Zc Dalis mdwjdsrn b uron; szjg, w mizdrsr twsrdzr Skwjon kncwrta b drmzjg hitwpj odwsb izsrdzi. Sjkwnr pisr ikihr mdwakziupr b gnior. Uju wursbjpbj kbj prfnj, uju swdikz b cdior, Uju chbid wsditbn itwa; skwakta ur sbzrnb, Mditw Zrojckwr sbort, wj ur skwakta wprnb. Lbhbt gbrnr sakgclnr, lkwzrnzpr, mbjdk misrhpr, Kclpbj grzjdaurnpr, diwisr, ujosrhpr, Fidk satbjza, linpbjdwal w lidipjl, djlrslb Ldizlbj; s djlc ldjtbnr srtynrdw onr wrhrslb (Hi pbj hani fidrti); srtynrdw miwnitbkza Misbjsrurt diwnjsrn ojkwtw bklbjd dwjkbkza; Fnisr oi snikis, snika miwsburpj s ldjfb, S mclnj, b mdwjmnrzrpj diwisagb skzjfb, Mikdio pbty hdanrpz, pbha wrldaza io itwc, ksbjtbn kbj urli fsbrwor s ligjza srdlitwc: Knisjg, chbid frnisa; kwjmzrnb pbjujopb, wj whaz salsbpzpa pr sbjk b pr owbjp miskwjopb. Piwjl, tyit kclpbr ldizlr, ili pbj wihrtwa, Hi hbjfnr hrdowi kwahli, kcsrnr kbj drtwéu Urli ikihlb, lzidj pr zdwaldinklbj ksbjzr Mdwjkcsrur s urkjnlrty cldazj tynimbjzr. Hbjfnr b skwakzlbty njllbg sbzrurt clnipjg, Tytbrnr ckbjkt pr gbjuktc kihbj wikzrsbipjg: Zdcopi hani; hi ldwjkjn onr fiktb pbj kzrni, Pr twzjdjty nrsrty twzjda bty dwjoa kbjowbrni: Zdwjhr hani dwjo dckwat nch nrsj mdwjklitwat; Wdjtwpbj gbjowa osbj nrsa cgbrnr kbj sznitwat, R mizjg, gbjowa dwjojg kbjowrtaty b kzinjg, Url hbnrdoisr lcnr zitwanr kbj linjg. S hbjfc oizlpjnr hnbkli prkwjfi gniowbrpr; Ctwjmbskwa ernhrpr i twaujk linrpr, Miknbwpjnr kbj pbjti b s zag diwzrdfpbjpbc Pr mrpr Zrojckwr skmrdnr kbj drgbjpbc. Mdwjmdikbskwa fi fdwjtwpbj, pr gbjuktc ksag kbronr Migbjowa pbg b kzdaujg, rnj pbt pbj uronr; Zanli kbj srtynisrnr, zi srtynrdwr zdwipjl Ldjtbnr, zi linpbjdwal w hdrhrptlbty lidipjl Mimdrsbrnr, zi njllbg oizlpbjtbjg kbj djlb Gcklrnr snikis mclnj b skzrf urkpaty mjlb. Zr mdwjdsr diwgis zdsrnr ucw gbpcz wj twzjda. Zagtwrkjg, s liptc kzinr, prmdwio tbtyj kwgjda, R mizjg kbj wrtwjna smin fnikpj diwgisa; Gjwtwawpb diwkrowrnb ksj owbkbjukwj nisa. Rkjkidr w Djujpzjg swgifnr kbj cmrdzr Tidrw fnikpbjukwr lnizpbr i lckjfi tyrdzr, Lzidjfi mikbrorpbjg mrp Djujpz kbj kwtwatbn B czdwagasrn, wj ip wrurtr mitysatbn; Rkjkid wrk oisiowbn pr wnikt Djujpzisb, wj zr tysrnr prnjwa tyrdzc Kilinisb. Mazrpi worpbr bppaty; sbjt skwakta oilinr Hdrnb kzdipj Lckjfi rnhi zjw Kilinr, Tb url wprsta, tb wpisc url pritwpj ksbrolb. Kjowbr pr odcfbg liptc oi pisju krkbrolb Dwjln minfnikjg: «Mdwjmdrkwrg, gckbjnbkga kbrort, Pbj mioihpr sbjtwjdwa pr miwpbju iolnrort: Fiktbj fniopb, tyiowbnb ornjli pr minj; Gaknbnjg, wj owbk w prgb pbj hjowbjkw mdwa kzinj». Zi dwjlnkwa, w Mioligidwag mdwa mjnpag lbjnbtyc I minbzatwpaty kmdrsrty diwgrsbrn mi tbtyc. Foa zrl hana wrujzj kzinc kzdipa ihbj, Zrojckw mdwafnrorn kbj pbjwprpju ikihbj. Mdwamigpbrn, wj wr mbjdskwag pr gbjuktj sjudwjpbjg Iofroprn wrdrw, twabg gbrni hat kbjowjpbjg. Dcgbjpbn kbj, kjdtj gc hbni prowsatwrupbj: Sbjt diwsbrwrpj sbowbrn ksaty oigaknis zrupbj! Sbjt hani mdwjwprtwipi, ha mdwa ujfi hilc Ckbronr isr mbjlpikt sbowbrpr s migdilc! Smdrsowbj wornr kbj zjdrw swdikzjg oidiopbjukwr, Hi chdrpr, r chbid misbjlkwr b wgpbjukwr. B snik c zrgzju sbowbrn ldizlb, urkpiwniza, R c zju ldctwj oncfbj wsburna kbj kmniza? Linid gckbrn mityiowbt io kniptr mdigbjpb, Lzidagb mdwa wrtyiowbj skwakzli kbj twjdsbjpb. Zsrdwa sistwrk pbj oikzdwjfn, prwhaz datyni wpblnr; Rnj gakn zsrdw proihpr iofroasrt wsalnr: Gaknbn, wj mjspbj gbrnr twrdpbczlbj itwjzr, Hbrnr zsrdw, ckzr ldrkpj url sbkpbj hnbwpbjzr; C zju wprnrwn mioihpj itwa, ckzr, nbtr. S sbjlc giwj ha hanr prusbjlkwr diwpbtr: Ifdiopbtwlr owbjstwaplr worsrnr kbj grnr, R mrpb zr pbjsbrkzr ucw s nrzrty oiudwrnr; Njtw gniowbjw i mbjlpiktb gjzdalj pbj mazr, Hi gniowbjptisb gnior ujkz lrwor lihbézr, Tynimtisb lrwor mbjlpikt wor kbj disbjppbtr, R pbjsbppjgc lrwor lityrplr owbjsbtr. W fida ucw dihbn mdiujlz, wj kihbj miwsinb Cwasrt pr skb oncfi swhdipbipju ksihioa; Sbjowbrn, wj han mdwakziupa, twcn kbj dwjklb, gnioa, R s kmrolc mi diowbtrty swbrn twjdkzsikt b wodisbj. Lrwrn, rha mdwaujtyrn b rha kbj wjpbn B ihurn fikmiordkzsi; mdwadwjln pr mitwrzjl Ort grnr sbjk, r mizjg trna ksiu grurzjl. Wgbjdwanr ujfi mikzrt lkwzrnzpr b sakilr, Ujfi drgbipr kbnpj, ujfi mbjdk kwjdilr, B s zsrdw kmiudwrnr, w lzidju sazdaklrn dcgbjpbjt, Bnjldit w uju itwagr kmizlrn kbj gniowbjpbjt: Hi w mbjdskwju njlnbsiktb trnlbjg ucw ityniprn, B mrzdwan swdilbjg kgbrnag, s lzidag ifbjp mniprn. Dispbjw mrzdwanr ipr: b twzjda wdjpbtj Fidwrna mdwjtbs kihbj url didrzpj ksbétj. Mbjdskwr w pbg mi edrptcklc wrtwjnr diwgisj. Kwtwjktbjg, wj prctwatbjn nropa b pbjkdifb; Iofropjnr krkbrolr misio ujfi zdsifb, Skwtwjnr dwjtw i gpbju zdcopaty b grodaty mdwjogbizrty, I sbjuklbjfi miwatbr pcorty b lnimizrty, B url hrsbt kbj zdwjhr, b url twrk miowbjnbt, Ha watbj cmdwaujgpbt b sbjk diwsjkjnbt. Zdwa ikiha pr sahid; swbrn pruhnbwkwr kihbj; Mioligidwrplb pr zi wgrdkwtwana kbj ihbj, Krkbrolr wrkgbrnr kbj, njtw pbj misbjowbrnr Lifi isr kwtwjknbskwr frnlr iwprtwrnr. Kmid han sbjnlb, ucw mizdrs ikzrzpbty pbj ujonb; Kziurt b mburt ihbj lnitbna kbj kzdipa, R prukzdrkwpbju mrp Djujpz han wrtbjzdwjsbipa: Url drw wrtwrn, hjw mdwjdsa dwjtw ksiur zilisrn, B fjkzrgb ur hrdowi oihbzpbj grnisrn. (Han orspbju rosilrzjg mrp Djujpz Hinjkzr, Wsrpi fi lrwpiowbjur, wj whaz nchbn fjkzr). Zjdrw djtj mdwa hilc gbrn, s zan safbrn niltbj, Kmio drgbip sazlprn mrntj b oncfbj mrwpiltbj, Mdwjokzrsbrurt osr kgatwj tyrdzis zag ihdrwjg: Snrkpbj dwjtw liptwan. «Satwyr! mcktbnbkga drwjg Ur b Rkjkid, drwjg, urliha osr lcdlb Ujopag mrntjg kmckwtwipj c ujopju oscdcdlb; Satwyr! mikwnb, r wrurt url kzdcpr, kgal s minj, Mka zcw (zi gisbrt, djtj tbrfprn swoncw mi kzinj B mrntrgb dcty tyrdzis mdwjowbspbj corsrn) Mka zcw, b yjt io nrkc iokrowbnb lrsrn; Kilin kgal prmdwio; drtwa mbjk, njtw wrfidwrnjt, Sakrowbn kbj mdwjo Lckag, i zanj, i mrnjt: Sbjowbrnjg, wj kmconcuj. Kwrdrl, fdrtw pbj nror, Twtyrn pbha mdikzi s minj, wr pbg mkis fdigror; Fdrtw kwrdrl! Klidi mitwcn skwakzlbj tyrdza s lcmbj Mkzdjl pr mdrsi, liwbinlr, w pbg s mdrsi mka fncmbj, R ip wpisc eruz s njsi, url sazpbj osr kcka, Mka wr pbg eruz pr njsi: ip s nrk, r giu Lcka Trm!» Zrl ldwatwrt, mrp Djujpz pr kzin mityanipa, W mrntrgb ksagb wrhbjfn rw oi odcfbju kzdipa, B «trm!» Zrojckwisb sdwrkprn zcw pro ctyjg: Zrojckw b krkbrolr, zag fnikc sahctyjg Wpbjprtlr mdwjkzdrkwjpb snrkpbj s min diwgisa, Iokzdatypjnb io kbjhbj gbgisinpbj fnisa, Urli sbjdwtyinlb odwjsr misbrwrpj kminjg Foa uj sbtyjd diwjdsbj; b djtj mio kzinjg Hnbkli kbjhbj njwrtj skzjtw prfnj ctbjlna, B osbj zsrdwj s ujojp kbj dcgbjpbjt ihnjlna. Zrojckw, ha pbj wodrowbt ksjfi diwzrdfpbjpbr: «Mdrsor — dwjln — giu Djujptbj, mdrsor hjw srzmbjpbr, Lcka mbjlpa tyrdz w lkwzrnzc, ujknb dispbj tysazpa…» «Tysazpa? — ldwalprn mrp Djujpz — giu mbjk ersidazpa wjha pbj gbrn hat tysazpa?…» Sbjt Zrojckw wpisc Tbjkwan kbj, wj zrl mbjlpa mbjk pbj gr prdisc, wrnisrn, wj fi zanli sbowbrn bort w nrkc, B wj mdwagbizis ujfi miwprt pbj gbrn twrkc. Pr zi wrodwrn Rkjkid, mcktbn w drl lbjnbkwjl, Czimbn s Zrojckwr swdil url hrwanbkwjl. Rkjkid gpbju ldwalnbsa b gpbju han dctyrsa Io Djujpzr, kwtwcmnjukwa b grna w mikzrsa, Njtw kzdrkwpa pr djoctbj, hrnc b kjugblc, Hi misbrorpi i pbg: gr wroni s ujwalc; Zrl oistbmpj wrdtblb cgbrn ligmipisrt, Bwha uj s lrnjpordwc giwpr saodclisrt, Skwakzlbj wniknbsj, ikzdj. Orspbju twnjl oikzrzpb, Ktyjoj iutr ksiujfi b grurzjl hdrzpb Skwakzli kzdsipbn pr sbjnlbg ebfcdcurt ksbjtbj; Zjdrw skwjon s kncwhj dwroc, ha wprtwat s misbjtbj. Nchbn hrdowi gaknbkzsi, ucw zi onr wrhrsa, Ucw zi wj iofnik zdrhlb b sboil ihnrsa Mdwamigbprn gc ujfi nrzr gnioitbrpj, Lbjoa gbrn kzdwjntis nbtwpaty b mka wrsinrpj: Zjdrw gc w trnju mkbrdpb osr tyrdza wikzrna, B ujkwtwj w zaty ujopjgc tytbrpi mdwjtwat tysrna! Sbjt whnbwan kbj b w sinpr fnrowrt ersidaza Dwjln w ckgbjtyjg, r han zi ckgbjty uroisbza: «Tyrdz hjw ifipr ujkz url kwnrtytbt hjw cdwjoc, Ifip zjw wprtwpbj tyrdzig migrfr oi mjoc: R mrp lckikt csrwrkw wr oisio oihditb? Wdjkwzr wort kbj giwjga pr kro mrpklbju tbitb. Tyit mrpb Zjnbgjpr gbjkwlrnr s kzinbta B hrsb kbj pbjorspi s prkwju ilinbta, Njmbju wpr kbj pr nisrty pbw gaknbsb gniowb: Zrl zi prclr krgr w nrzrgb mdwatyiowb». Zrojckw, pr lzidjfi pbjkmiowbrpbj kmrorn Fdig zrlb, skzrn wgbjkwrpa, tysbnj pbt pbj frorn, Njtw mrzdwrn pr dasrnr tidrw kzdrkwpbju, kdiwju… Szjg, sbjnlbg kwtwjktbjg, osrldit lbtyprn Mioligidwa «Sbsrz!» ldwalpjnb skwakta; ip kbj skwakzlbg klnipbn B w sinpr s zrhrlbjdj mrntrgb wrowsipbn. Zrhrlbjdr wj wnizr, w hdanrpzis imdrsr, R s kdiolc uju han midzdjz ldinr Kzrpbknrsr. Iutc Mioligidwjfi krg ldin ur ordisrn, Mi iutc Mioligidwa fiopbj ur mbrkzisrn; Foa s pbr owsipbn, wprl orsrn, wj gbrn fnik wrhbjdrt. Cgbnlnb skwakta b ckz pbj kgbjnb izsbjdrt. Ip dwjln: «Sbjngiwpb kwnrtyzr hdrtbr oihdiowbjuj, Eidcg gaknbsklbg zanli kr nrlb b lpbjuj; Sbjt ur s oigc mioihpaty kmdrs pbj ojtaocuj, B mikbjowjpbj prkwj pr uczdi kinscuj, B ornkwaty djmnbl kzdipig owbkbru pbj oiwsinj. Siwpa! iosinru kmdrsj, pr uczdi pr minj. Uczdi b Ydrhbr w trnag gaknbkzsjg zc wujowbj, B srkwjt w prgb dckwakw, Kjowbi giu krkbjowbj, B mrpb Zjnbgjpr, b mrppa, b mrpbj, Knisjg, wdihbg pr cdwro sbjnlbj minisrpbj; B Siuklb zisrdwakzsr prg zjw pbj iogisb». Zi gisbrt, zrhrlbjdj miorsrn kzrdtisb. Siuklb pr ikzdag liptc kdio gaknbsaty kbjowbrn, Knctyrn wgdcwaskwa itwa, knisr pbj misbjowbrn, Tyit gniowbjw pbjdrw ujfi wrkbjfrnr worpbr, Hi pblz njmbju pro pbjfi pbj wprn minisrpbr. Ip gbntwrn, kwtwamzj swbjzr w zrhrlbjda srwan S mrntrty b oncfi ocgrn, pbg ur s liptc wrwan; Lbtyprn, rw trnr bwhr diwnjfnr kbj jtyjg, B mizdwrkrurt fnisr, dwjln w fidwlbg ckgbjtyjg: «I, url gpbj zi kzrdjfi b kgctb, b owbsb! Tiw ha zi i zag kzrdwa gisbnb gaknbsb, Sbowrt wj s zanc kwnrtyza, s zanc mrpis fdipbj, Grur krowbt kbj kmida i tyrdtbg ifipbj? Tiw ha dwjln pr zi kzrda Djuzrp, foaha iwan? Sditbnha oi Nrtyisbtw b s fdih kbj miniwan! Ti ha dwjln siujsior Pbjkbinisklb kzrda, Lzida gr oizro mbjdskwj pr ksbjtbj ifrda, B osbjkzc kzdwjntis zdwagr ihatwrujg mrpklbg, B gr kzi siwis kbjtb s wrglc Sidiptwrpklbg, R io zanc nrz kbjowb url gpbty pr ksag osidwj, Pblz fi pr minisrpbj cmdikbt pbj giwj, Hbrnimbizdisbtwisb krgjgc iogisbn! Hi tiw ha ip pr srkwaty minisrpbrty nisbn? Mbjlpr hanrha knrsr, rwjha mrp zrlb Sjonj owbkbjukwju gioa ujwowbn pr kwrdrlb! Wr gibty, mrpbj, twrkis, s ujwalc kzdwjnjtlbg, Owbl, pbjowsbjow, nik, sbnl, wsrpa han wsbjdwjg kwnrtyjtlbg R wsbjdwj pbjgrurtj lnis, difis, mrwcdis, Wikzrsbrpi onr mnrzpaty kncf b osidklbty tbcdis; wrojp mrp pbfoa mdwaurt pbj tytbrnha oi djlb Kzdwjnha, lzidr wyrphbipi kambrt s pbr kdcz tbjplb! Zdwagrpi smdrsowbj tyrdzis: hi w nisis sdrtrurt, Zdrebr kbj, wj kmio lipbr glpbj kbj hbjorl wrurt: Mckwtwrpi szjptwrk wr pbg onr wrhrslb kgatwj B pr lipblrty grnj fipbna mrpbtwj Mdwjo itwagr diowbtis, lzidwa zj mifipbj Njosbj drtwanb sbowbjt, tiw lnitbt kbj i pbj! Sbjt pbjty urkpbj sbjngiwpa Mioligidwa drtwa Iosinrt ksj diwlrwa b pbjty gb sahrtwa, wj pbj gifj pr zrlbj ujtyrt minisrpbj, B pbfoa pr pbg pifr giur pbj mikzrpbj! Prwasrg kbj Ydjtwjtyr, r io ldinr Njtyr, wrojp wr wrurtrgb pbj ujwowbn Ydjtwjtyr». Zc kgbjty gniowbjwa gisj Siuklbjfi wrfnckwan. Skzrpi io kzinc, mbjdskwa Mioligidwa dckwan, W sbjlc gc b w cdwjoc zjp wrkwtwaz prnjwa, Bort lnrpbrn kbj orgig, kzrdtig b gniowbjwa; Wr pbg kwjon lsjkzrdw, Kjowbr zcw mdwa hjdprdoapbj. Kjowbr c mdifc djlj orn Mioligidwapbj, Zrojckw Zjnbgjpbj, Rkjkid Ldrutwrptj, R mrp Djujpz pr liptc Siuklbju Ydjtwjkwrptj. Zrojckw w lbnlc fiktgb mikwjon oi kzioina, R twcn kbj migbjkwrpa, wna b pbjsjkina. Diwhbjdrn gaknr skwakzlbj owbkbjukwj samrolb: Kmizlrpbj kbj, sbjtwjdwj mdwa hilc krkbrolb; R kwtwjfinpbju gc knisi «tbitbr» lini ctyr Hdwjtwrni tbrfnj urli prmdwaldwipr gctyr. Mdrfprnha c Siwpjfi njmbju kbj samazrt I mrpb Zjnbgjpbj, njtw fi pbj gifn ktysazrt; Siuklbjfi zjw pbj sbowbrn, hi wrdrw w sbjtwjdwa Skwakta mikwnb wr fiktgb, url kncfig prnjwa, Cdwrowrurt sj osidwj bwha oi kmitwaplc. Kzrdkb b orga kmrna sj osidklbg hcoaplc; Gniowbjw Zrojckwisb mdisrowbt lrwrpi, S wrkzjmkzsbj fikmiordwr, s kzioinj pr kbrpi. S min fiowbpa zrl hani fnctyi s trnag osidwj urli mi wrowsipbjpbc pr mrtbjdw s lnrkwzidwj; Tbkwj mdwjdasrn zanli fnik pitpjfi kzdiwr. Ckpjnb skwakta. Kjowbr krg itwc pbj wgdcwr; Urli siow fikmiordkzsr ihgaknr samdrsj S minj b s oigc mdwakwnr cdwrowr wrhrsj. Orn diwlrw jlipigig, siuzig b fcgbjppag, Mbkrdwig, itygbkzdwapb, kzdwjntig b kzrujppag B gckbrn skwakzlbj owbjppj drtycplb mdwjwbjdrt. Prdjkwtbj dwjln Siwpjgc, wj kbj tytj diwhbjdrt. Siwpa mrk gc iosbrwrn, mrk knctlb, mrk nbza, Mdwa lzidag ksbjtr fjkzj lczrka url lbza, W ujopju kzdipa wnizifnis s mcdmcdisj lsbrza, Pr sasdiz ujosrh twrdpa mikdjhdwrpa s ldrza; Mrk zrlb giwpr dispbj lnrkt pr kzdipa ihbj, Wnizr pr owbjp frnisa, r twrdpr s wrnihbj. Krg Siwpa cgbrn mrk zjp iosbrwasrt, klnrort; Snrkpbj zag kbj wrzdcopbrn b liptwan zrl frort: «Tiw wnjfi, wj mdwjpbiknjg kzina oi wrgtwaklr? Pblz pr zag pbt pbj kzdrtbn, r mrp giwj waklr. Hi mdwjtbjw i zjp wrgjl owbk zitwa kbj kmdrsr. Ga io owbkbru oi wrglc prhanbkga mdrsr B gbgi trnr kzdipa mdwjtbspju wruronikt Oisbioj, wj wrgtwakli swbjnbkga s mikbronikt. Skwrlwj lzi fiktb mdikb s wrgjl pr sbjtwjdwj, Oisiowb, wj mikbronikt zrg gr rnhi hbjdwj; Prsjz kzdipa mdwjtbspj sjwgbjga pr ksbrolb: Mrgbjzrg wr gaty twrkis mioihpj samrolb». Ucw Kjowbr kmrn. Sbjt Siwpa tbtyi skwjon oi kbjpb, Kbron mdwa ksbjta b oihan lkbrwjtwlj w lbjkwjpb, Lzidr gc url Inzrdwal Wniza wrskwj kncwa, Lzidju pbfoa pbj dwctr s oigc b s miodiwa. Hanr zi zdahcprnklr silrpor: zrg dwjojg Kzrna kmbkrpj kmdrsa, lzidj mdwjo cdwjojg Siwpa krg fnikjg ksibg mdwjo nrza sasinrn, Rnhi i lzidaty miwpbju oisbjowbjt kbj woinrn. Mdikzag ncowbig silrpor wor kbj bgbip kmbkjg; Siwpjgc ujkz ihdrwis skmrpbrnaty wrdakjg. Twazrn sbjt b diwgaknrn: Ifbpklb w Sbwfbdojg, Oigbpblrpbj w Dagkwr, Dagkwr w Sakifbdojg, Drowbsbn w Sjdjkwtwrlr, Fbjodibt w Docnzisklbg, Ihctyisbtw w lryrnjg, Ucdryr w Mbizdisklbg, Grnjklb w Gbtlbjsbtwjg, r pr lipbjt Ydrhbr W Kimnbtr; b twazrurt, w zaty bgbip sasrhbr Mrgbjt kmdrs sbjnlbty, skwakzlbj mditjkc samrolb, B kzrur gc mdwjo itwa kro, kzdipa b ksbrolb; B ifnror krg kbjhbj, url s wcmrpbj hbrnag, S fdrprzisag lipzckwc kzrn mdwjo zdahcprnjg, Ujopr djlr pr kwrhnb, r odcfr oi kzinr, Mdwasinrskwa osbj kzdipa, «Ctbkwtbj kbj!» sinr. Grdwrt b liptwrt mrtbjdw sbjtwidpa, migrnc Ckprn ikzrzpb s Nbzsbj siwpa zdahcprnc. Zrlbj hana wrhrsa, kmida s ipj nrzr kdio tbtyju skb nbzjsklbju, lbjoa djkwzr ksbrzr Sj nwrty b ldsb zipjnr; foa is grw, hif siupa, Izitwip tygcdr mcnlis, zakbrtjg owbrn whdiupa, Smdwrfnkwa s ksiu daosrp idna wnizj ihil kdjhdpaty, Io mckwtw Nbhbuklbty nrzrn oi Rnmis miopbjhpaty, Tbklrurt fdig mi fdigbj, s Mbdrgboa, s Zrhid, S Grdjpfi, s Cng, s Rckzjdnbzw. Wsatbjkzsi b Wrhid Hbjfna mdwjo pbg b wr pbg. Knrsr twapis zanc, Hdwjgbjppr bgbiprgb datjdwa, io Pbnc Kwnr yctwrt lc minpita, rw c Pbjgpr hdwjfis Iohbnr kbj, url io klrn, io Giklsa kwjdjfis, Lzidj hdipbna Nbzsj gcdrgb wjnrwr Mdwjo sbjktbr onr Dikab kzdrkwpr url wrdrwr. Pro Kimnbtisjg kniptj sjkwni b ucw mroni Pr kzdwjtya b mdwjw kwmrda s kzioinj kbj sldroni; B mi tbjgpiwbjnipag, ksbjwag, sippag kbrpbj, W lzidjfi gniowbjw kihbj wdihbnr miknrpbj, Diwmnasrna kbj wnizj, gbfrurtj mdjfb W izsidc twrdpju kzdwjtya url w srdlitwr skzjfb; B kniptj ckzr kjppaty mdigalbjg midrplr Odrwpb url owbjstwj lnikjg hcowrtj lityrplr. W stwidrukwju sbjtwjdwa Sditbn zrl pbjkmiliupa, wj i lcdis mbrpbc Ujkwtwj itwc pbj wgdcwan, r pr ksag miknrpbc Zrl ldjtbn kbj, wj s kbrpi url s sioj cziprn, B kmrn zsrdoi, rw wbgpa sbrzd s itwa gc sbiprn, Foa kldwambrtj kzioina odwsb izsrdzi w zdwrklbjg, B hjdprdoap, lkbrow Dihrl, skwjon w sjwnrkzag mrklbjg, «Kcdfj mcjd!» sinrurt b mipro hrdlrgb Dchrkwpbj sasbururt mrkjl w ifidlrgb. Ucw pr owbjowbptc knatyrt gaknbsklbj ildwalb; Samdisrowrur lipbj, wrujwowrur hdalb, Njosbj owbjowbpbjt zrlr fdigroj ifrdpbj, Iojwsrna kbj zdrha, izsidwipi mkbrdpbj; Wfdrur tyrdzis, samronkwa, sjkini klisatwj; Sbowrt dcgrlb kwtwsrtwis, oiujwowrtwis kgatwj, Mka url kwrnipj tsrnjg kgbfrur mi osidwj, Mizjg hbjfpr b lnror kwauj pr ihdiwj: Skwakzli zi hrdowi oihdj minisrpbj sdiwa; Prdjkwtbj Mioligidwa orn diwlrw miodiwa. W zanc orga s miurworty; gniowbjpta, kzdiprgb Tsrncurt zcw mdwa linrty, frornb w orgrgb. Lkbrow Dihrl mi owbjowbptc sinpag tyiowbn ldilbjg Liptwrt drppj mrtbjdwj; rnj dwctrn ilbjg Pr mrpr Zrojckwr, grdkwtwan kbj, ckgbjtyrn, Sdjkwtbj lbsprn prp mrntjg, Zrojckw mioujtyrn; Dihrl mrntjg mi pikbj orsrn gc wprl fdiwha: Njtw gbgi Zrojckwr mazrpbr b mdikha, Rwjha gc sadrwpbj, ti tytj, sazncgrtwan, Hjdprdoap iomisbjowbjt pb kmiudwjt pbj drtwan; Lrmzcd zanli prkcprn b mrtbjdw ksiu liptwan, Sbjt Zrojckw ioujtyrn b w fiktgb kbj wnrtwan. Snrkpbj szjptwrk gaknbsb kgatwj wrzdwagrnb, B skwakta pbjdctyigb s gbjuktrty ksibty kzrnb; Ujojp odcfbjgc djlr orsrn wprl gbntwjpbr, R skwakta ihditbnb itwa oi lrgbjpbr, Pro lzidag kzrn mrp Kjowbr. Ip wsbjdwr ihrtwan B drl klbpbjpbjg ksiuj diwlrwa zncgrtwan. Miujnb skwakta: kziur, r kdiolbjg mi dinb Rkjkid b mrp Djujpz lnckcur misinb. Zrojckw, hjort hnbwkwa, ihaosc samdwjowbn, Kzrprn ihil Kjowbjfi b itwagr knjowbn. Orspi ucw pbj han s minc; pr kwrdju mdwjkzdwjpb Zdcopi oiudwjt kwrdrlr, wsnrkwtwr kdio lrgbjpb. Milrwrn gc mrp Kjowbr; kbjowbrn hbjopa wrurt, Mnrkwtwrt kbj mio lrgbjpbjg, ckwa prokzrsbrurt, Ilbjg twjdsipag kmizlrn gaknbstis sjudwjpbj B urlha cdwjtwipa, twcurt mdwjwprtwjpbj, Wj kzdrtyc io bty itwc pbj gifn wsditbt ilr, B mio imilr kbjowbrn grdzsa url imilr. Zagtwrkjg lcdw pr dinb dikpbj tidrw hnbwéu; Mjowb pr kgatwa Lcka, wr pbg Kilin tyawa, Zcw Rkjkid w Djujpzjg drwjg sdwrknb w zanc: «Satwyr, satwyr!» b w mkrgb wpblnb s lnjhrty manc. Lbjoa zrl wr kwrdrlbjg fipbipi, zagtwrkjg Clrwrn kbj mrp Ydrhbr mio wrglisag nrkjg. Sbjowbrpi s ilinbta, wj zjp mrp pbj giwj Pbfoa pbfowbj kzrsbt kbj s prwprtwipju midwj. B owbk wrkmrn midrpjl; sbjt pr kncfb wdwjowbn, Sbowrt gaknbstis s minc tsrnjg oi pbty mjowbn. Kcdocz ksiu rpfbjnklbjfi ldiuc, hbrna, oncfb, Minrgb pr sbrzd mcktbn; w zanc lippi kncfb, S lrmjnckwrty url fdwahlb, twrdpaty, nkpbrtaty, grnaty, S lcdzlrty, s hczrty kzdaenrkzaty, s mrpzrniprty hbrnaty: Kncfb, lzidj mrp Ydrhbr zag lkwzrnzjg iowbjuj, Prwasrur kbj s ujfi mrnrtc owiljuj. Tsrncurtr twjdjor wnjtbrnr pr hnipbr, Foa Ydrhbr cudwrn wrgjl b wrzdwagrn lipbr. Mbjdskwa drw sbowbrn wrgjl w drpr b pbj sbjdwan, wj zi hana zjw krgj gcda; zrl ioksbjwan B cmbjlpbn midrpjl wrdaka hcoisa: Wrowbsbn kbj mrp Ydrhbr pr sboil zrl pisa. Sbjwr wornr kbj osrldit sawkwr, hi kzjdtwrtr Pro gfnr drppr; orty w hnrtya wnitbn kbj io kniptr, Mio pbg hnakwtwrnr s ldrzrty djkwzr kwah sahbzaty, nrgbrt mdigbjpbj sktyioc s zjtwrty diwgrbzaty; Pbwkwj mbjzdr ihnrnr zcgrpc misnilr, Diwmronbpa b kwtwjdha wrldanr io ilr; Ldwal ornjlbty gaknbstis sbrzdrgb mdwafprpa, Iohburn kbj lbnlrldit i wrglisj ktbrpa: Mdwakbrfnhak, wj ldwal w wrglc, wj mio gfna wrknipr Gcda iohcoisrpi b wpis wrncopbipi. Ydrhbr nchbn sboilb pbjwsalnj b pisj, Wsrn uj digrpkisagb; grsbrn, wj gr fnisj Digrpkisr: s bkzitbj han sbjnlbg owbsrlbjg. Pbjdrw, mjowrt wr nbkjg rnhi wr kwrdrlbjg, Prfnj kzrsrn b s pbjhi mifnrorn wrnikpbj, Url liz, foa cudwa sdihnj pr sakilbju kikpbj; Twjkzi hjw mkr, hjw kzdwjnha, hnrlrn kbj mi fruc Url djldcz whbjfna; twjkzi kbrorn mdwa dctwruc Pbjdctyiga, ktyanbskwa fnisj pro mizilbjg, Url twrmnr skwakzlbj daha tytrtr miwdwjt ilbjg: Zrlbj hana Ydrhbjfi owbspj ihatwruj. Skwakta gisbnb, wj gc twjfik pbj oikzruj; Kwrpisrpi fi mdwjtbjw, hi mrp w mdrmdrowbrois, Hifrtw, oihda onr tynimis, ncowlb onr krkbrois, Prsjz onr waois. Ydrhklb lip, wsditipa w odifb, Mdikzi lnckisrn minjg rw mio wrglc mdifb. Ydrhbr krgizpa swoatyrn, mifnrorn pr gcda, Saurn mrmbjd, inisjl b ldjknbn ebfcda. Szjg, kmiudwrskwa s hil — cudwrn i osrowbjktbr ldilis Twnisbjlr, lzida, dispbj gbnikpbl sboilis, W fnisr wrordzr, djtj sniwaskwa s lbjkwjpbj, Worsrni kbj, wj nbtwan itwagr lrgbjpbj. Miwprn fi wrdrw, rnj gckbrn lbnlr drwa Ldwalprt, pbg fnik Ydrhbjfi cknakwrn Fjdsrwa. Kwnrtytbt zi han, kncwrta orspaty wrglc mrpis, Miwikzrna ikzrzpb w Yidjkwlb osidwrpis; Kzrdwjt sakilb, kbsa, zsrdw gbrn twjdkzsr, wodisr, Wgrdkwtwlrgb miidrpr, mikjmpr, kcdisr. Orspbju migbjowa kwnrtyzr w sjkiniktb knaprn; Rnj io hbzsa, s lzidju owbjowbt wrglc wfbprn, Fjdsrwa kbj iogbjpbn b ucw io nrz sbjnc Rpb han pr lbjdgrkwc, rpb pr sjkjnc; Iozro ujfi oistbmpaty wrdzis pbj knakwrpi, B ckgbjtyc pr ujfi zsrdwa pbj sbowbrpi. Wrskwj pikbn Yidjkwlis nbhjdaur orspr; Lcdzj w minrgb winzr, frnipjg imdrspr, Lzida owbk winza, orspbju wrmjspj han wniza, Slini kwazj ujosrhbjg yjdhisj lnjupiza, Minliwbtj: b kzro zjw trnr ilinbtr Minliwbtjg mdwjwsrnr kzrdjfi kwnrtytbtr. Twrkjg zjw io mdwaknisbr, lzidj hjw ckzrplc Miszrdwrn, prwasrpi fi zrlwj Gimrplc; Twrkjg Kwtwjdhtjg, wj trnr nakbpj gbrn s kwtwjdhrty; Njtw ip wsrn kbj Djhruni, r i ujfi yjdhrty Pbj sbroigi. Lnctwpblbjg kbjhbj zazcnisrn, Bw zjp cdwro pr wrglc mdwjo nrza mbrkzisrn. B oizro pikbn sbjnlb mjl lnctwa wr mrkjg, Csbrwrpa pr zrkgbj wj kdjhdpag lczrkjg, Tyit pbj gbrn ti izsbjdrt, hi wrglc miosiuj Kzrna izsidjg. Mdwjtbjw, saprnrwn odwsb osiuj; Krg uj snrkpag prlnrojg prmdrsbn b skzrsbn, B odwsb zaty iogalrpbjg tiowbjppbj kbj hrsbn. S ujopju w bwh mckzaty, ihdrn gbjkwlrpbj onr kbjhbj; Gifrt wat c Ydrhbjfi pr nrklrsag tynjhbj, Pbj tytbrn, hi skwjowbj zjklpbn b twcn kbj pbjwodisag, Ujwjnb pbj iooatyrn misbjzdwjg wrglisag. Klidi cudwrn Ydrhbjfi, twrmlj w fnisa ktysatbn, B ldjspjfi ksaty mrpis clnipjg wrkwtwatbn, Tyanrt nakbpj sbjnlr, ksbjtrtr w ornjlr, B prtbjzr io nbtwpaty lidois url prkbjlr; Fnrowbn ur djlr, miokwjon, b ujkwtwj drw pbkli Klnipbskwa kbj, dwjln kgczpbj: «Gimrplc, mrpbkli, Ordcu gpbj, wj zrl gisbj, urkpbj fdrebj mrpbj, Zi ujkz giu wsatwru, pbj wrk pbjckwrpisrpbj: »gimrplc« misbrornb skwakta Yidjkwlisbj, Ikzrzpb Kzinpbl, mrp giu, gbrn zrlbj mdwaknisbj… Twaw zi mdrsor, gimrplc, wj mrp fdikwr klrmbkw Pr mditjk b zjp wrgjl Kimnbtig ckzrmbkw? Pbj sbjdwanjg, njtw s trnag misbjtbj zrl knatyrt». Zc, mifnrorurt s wrgjl, pbj mdwjkzrsrn swoatyrt. «Tiw owbspjfi — dwjln Ydrhbr — likwz sbjnlb, r pcor Ujkwtwj sbjlkwr; tytj kliptwat, njtw kwnrtytbt grdcor Cmbjdr kbj; mdwjsbowbrn, wj gbj wpcowbt giwj: Oncwju zjw pbj sazdwagrg b owbkbru hdip wniwj, Mdwaugj srdcplb wfioa, urlbj gb kro mior…» «Wfioa? — ldwalprn Fjdsrwa — w Kimnbtrgb wfior? W Kimnbtrgb, gimrplc?» — Zi gisbrt saldwasbn Ckzr, urlha pro snrkpr gisr kbj wrowbsbn. «Wfior b Kimnbtisbj! Gimrplc, mrpbkli, Mrp wrdzcuj, ti? Wrgjl, Yidjkwlis kbjonbkli, Gr miukt s djtj Kimnbtis? Pbjty mrp zanli drtwa Wkbrkt w lipbr. Miuowga s wrgjl. Pbjty pi mrp ihrtwa. Mrp krg pbj sbj, ti dihb. Pbjty kbj mrp pbj swhdrpbr, Wkbroru mrp» — b mdwazdwagrn kzdwjgbj oi wkbrorpbr. Sjkwnb s wrgjl; Fjdsrwa kzrprn s mdifc kbjpb: «Zc — dwjln — orspb mrpisbj osidjg izitwjpb, Twjkzi kbrornb s ldwjknrty s miihbjopbju midwj. Mrp fiowbn kmida sniktbrp nch s oihdag ycgidwj Fiktbig diwpj tbjlrsj ybkzidauj mdrsbn, Rnhi bty misbjktbrgb b wrdza kbj hrsbn, R gniowbjw pr owbjowbptc hbnr kbj s mrntrza, Nch cujwowrnr mrpklbj zcdjtlbj hrtygrza». Sjkwnb s kbjp. Dwjln Fjdsrwa: «S zju ifdigpju kbjpb Hdclisrpju pbj wpruowbjkw mrp zanj lrgbjpb, Bnj zc mjlni hjtwjl sbpr s oihdaty twrkrty; Kwnrtyzr tbrfpjnr lcea w mbspbta pr mrkrty, Kmdikwipr pr kjug rnhi kjugbl misbrzisa, Rnhi pr bgbjpbpa mrpklbj, nch pr nisa. Miotwrk ctwza pr tyidwj zag lrmjnr kzrnr, B s idfrp, b s diwnbtwpj bpkzdcgjpza fdrnr; R foa spikwipi wodisbj, zdrha url s opbc kropag Fdwgbrna w tyidc; sbsrza kwna tbrfbjg midwropag: Mbjdskwa sbsrz wr wodisbj Ldinr Ujfigiktb, Mizjg mdagrkr, mizjg Ldinisju Ujugiktb, Mizjg kwnrtyza b trnju Dwjtwamikminbzju, R pr lipbjt mi mbrzju kwlnrpbta sambzju, Spikwipi: »Lityruga kbj«. Sbsrz hjw mdwjkzrplc, Lzida opbjg ildwalpbipa, hdwgbrn rw oi midrplc; R ucw fizisj kzrna tcfb b miosioa, Rha lrwojfi iosbjwt oi ujfi fikmioa». Mdwjkwnb ucw lbnlr ligprz. Fjdsrwa s gbntwjpbc, Zc swdil pr ktbrpbj skzdwagrn, isowbj pr klnjmbjpbc, Mdwasincurt mrgbrzlj zc kgczpr, zrg gbnr; Twrkjg, urlha tytbrn gisbt: «Skwakzli kbj kliptwani», Lbsprn wrnikpbj fnisr; twrkjg grtyprn djlr: Sbort, wj gc skmigpbjpbj krgi hani gjlr, B wj uj tytbrn iomjowbt. Rw kbj wrzdwagrnb Pr fidwj, s sbjnlbju, pbjfoak wsbjdtbronrpju krnb. Owbk saordzaty wsbjdtbrojn kzrna mckzj drga, Ilpr hjw kwah, w ldcwfrplbjg smdikz prmdwjtbs hdrga. Ydrhbr, tyitbrw pbj sbjowbrn, ti zi skwakzli wprtwa, Mifnrorurt s zsrdw kzrdtr twcn urlbjk swdckwjpbj, Djlj gc ktbkprn; tysbnj zdsrni zi gbntwjpbj, Mdwjdsrn uj kzrdwjt, zdwjkrt swpbjkbipr mdrsbtr: «Pbj grkw wfioa, gimrplc, migbjowa Kimnbtr B ldsbr Yidjkwlis; s mrpc ldjs Yidjkwlis mnapbj, Ujkzjk ldjspag Kzinpblr, mi grztj nistwapbj, Lzidr kbj diowb w odcfbju tidlb lrkwzjnrpr, Lzida han, url sbroigi, scujg gjfi mrpr. Knctyru mrp ybkzidab ksju snrkpju diowbppju, Lzidr kbj kzrnr snrkpbj s zju bwhbj, pbj bppju. Han kro. — Odwjsr isitpj, wrkrowipj s dwjoa, Itbjpbrna kwjdilbj minj; kmiojg fdwjoa. Ornju grlis hbrnrsj fidcur hroanj; Pr pbty, gaknbkw, bw diujg ckbrona gizanj Zdwjmbizrt kldwaojnlrgb, pr lzidaty kbj gbjpb W diwgrbziktbr zjtwa hnrkl odifbty lrgbjpb: Zanr erdh wasaty, diwpaty, grl wdjpbtj grgb. Ydrhbr ujkwtwj tysbnj s gbjuktc hrsbn, kgbjurt kbj b lnprt drwjg zju prfnju mdwjkwliowbj. Gjwtwawpb zrl url sjkwnb, s ksaty wbjnipaty kzdiurty, W zrnjdwrgb, w kwlnrplrgb, tyiowrt mi miliurty, Ujonb, mbnb nch skmrdtb pr ilbjp ckwrlrty, Diwmdrsbrnb i enbpzrty, tyrdzrty b kwrdrlrty. Diwpj zjw hana onr org b gjwtwawp mizdrsa: Zc diwpikwipi zrtj w trnr kncwhr lrsa, Zrtj ifdigpj, s lsbrza knbtwpbj grnisrpj, Pr pbty lcdwrtj sippbj bghdalb hnrkwrpj B w midtjnrpa krklbju wnizj ebnbwrplb; Mdwa lrwoju frdpckwjtwjl grna oi kgbjzrplb. Mrpbj kzrdkwj, ucw stwjkpbju skzrskwa, mbna lrsj; Zjdrw odcfr onr kbjhbj wdihbna mizdrsj W fidrtjfi, kgbjzrpr hbjnipjfi mbsr, S lzidag zsrdif fdcwnrgb mikbjlrpa mnasr. Wrk onr gjwtwawp sjonbpa njwr oi sahidc: Minfjklb znckzj, lcgmbj, kldwaonblb iwidc, Skwakzlbj sahidpj, skwakzlbj kmikihjg oigisag Csjowipj s ligbpbj oagjg urnistisag; S liptc spbjkbipi wdrwa pr ikzrzpbj orpbj: Zrlbj hasrni s oigc Kjowbjfi kpbrorpbj. Sj osity bwhrty osr diwpj klcmbna kbj fdipr: Kzrdkwawpr mdwa kzinblc grnag wfdigrowipr Gisbnr i kmikihrty pisaty fikmiordklbty, I pisaty tidrw kdiwkwaty clrwrty tjkrdklbty; Mioligidwa ldrwrtj i siupbj mifniklb Itjpbrn b satbrfrn minbzatwpj spbiklb. Mrppr Siuklr, sniwaskwa ilcnrda kbpj, Wrhrsbrnr lrhrnr w lrdz Mioligidwapj. S odcfbju bwhbj zitwanr gniowbjw dwjtw i nisrty S kmiliupbjukwaty b tbtykwaty pbw wsalnj diwgisrty: Hi Rkjkid b Djujpz, ihr gista sbjnta, Mbjdskb wprsta gaknbkzsr b prunjmkb kzdwjnta, Kbjowbjnb mdwjtbs kihbj gdclnbsb b fpbjspb. Ihr oihdwj mikwtwcnb, ihr hanb mjspb Wsatbjkzsr ksibty tyrdzis: foa mikdio dispbpa Wprnrwn kbj wrfip tynimklbju pbjwwjzju urdwapa. Zrg smron wrurt; ucw Lcka, ucw fi Kilin bgrn, Foa Kjowbr oiujwowrtwa pr gbjowa wrzdwagrn. Gckbjnb hat miknckwpb, tyitbrw s sbjnlbg fpbjsbj; Mka misditbna krgj b pblz mjspbj pbj sbj, Twa wsbjdw ckwjon, twa swbjza; pblz wfroprt pbj woinr, Twa smron s mrkwtwj Lckjfi, twanb zjw Kilinr, Twanb ihaosc drwjg: diwpbj krowr kzdipa, B kmid pr ornkwj twrka zdsrn pbjdiwkzdwafpbipa. Siuklb kzrda io bwha oi bwha mdwjtyiowbn, Mi ihc kzdiprty itwa diwzrdfpbipj siowbn, Pbj gbjkwrn kbj s gaknbsaty pb s kzrdtis diwgisj B sbort, wj twag bppag wrujzr gbrn fnisj. Pikbn klidwrpr mnrtlj: twrkjg s gbjuktc kzrpbj, Ocgr oncfi b — gctyj wrhbuj pr ktbrpbj. Zrojckw w Zjnbgjpr, migbjowa bwhrgb Kziurt sj odwsbrty pr mdifc, diwgrsbrnb krgb. Pbjsbjnlb ioowbjnrn bty io knctyrtwis mdwjowbrn, Sbjt kwjmzrnb. Zrojckw zjdrw kbj oisbjowbrn: wj tbitbr Zjnbgjpr ujkz hifrzr mrpb, wj pbj kr lrpipbtwpbj w kihr misbrwrpb Whaz hnbklbg mildjsbjpkzsjg; b prsjz pbjmjspi, Twa tbitbr Zjnbgjpr ujkz kapistr ldjspr, Tyit ur kzdau wisbj kbikzdr, hi skminpb diowbtj Zrl bty lbjoak prwsrnb gbgi nrz diwpbtj; wj mizjg ipr waurt s kzinbta twrk oncfb Sadwrowbnr pbjwgbjdpj Kjowbjgc ckncfb; Kzro ur Kjowbr kwrpisrn hrdowi b mdwjo ksbrzjg Nchbn, giwj w mdiwpiktb, prwasrt kbj hdrzjg, Twjfi gc Zjnbgjpr mdwjw mdwaurwp pbj swhdrpbr. Cnwana Zrojckwr kjdtc zj sawprpbr. Sbjnj zjw bppaty dwjtwa kihbj iksbrotwanb; R skwakzli zi kbj kzrni s ujopju ldizlbju tysbnb. Mrp Siuklb, urlha mdwjhcowipa W fnjhilbjfi ocgrpbr, s kdiolc kbj mikzrsbn, Srka kbsj mildjtbn, lrmiza mimdrsbn, Bkldwana gc kbj itwa (wrswoa mikzdwjfrpi Zjp hnrkl pbjwsalna, lbjoa i nisrty frorpi), Ihbjfrn wfdigrowjpbj ifpbkzr wdjpbtr B fowbj kwgjd ujkwtwj knakwrn, url lkbrow ldimbjnpbtr, Zrg ctbkwrurt grtyrn ksr mnrtlr wj klida; Sdjkwtbj miopbiknkwa zdwipjl w misrfr oi fida, Url nrklj grdkwrnlisklr, prlrwrn gbntwjpbj. «Ctbkwtbj kbj! — miszrdwrn — gbjutbj zjw hrtwjpbj, Sa, ti ujkzjktbj mbjdskb gaknbsb s misbjtbj, W fidkwrtju lnizpb srkwju ti hjowbj? twa sbjtbj? Ur cmdikwj Kjowbjfi, rwjha pbj hdipbn Oiujwowrtwisb, tyitha mi mkwjpbta fipbn; B zckwj, wj zj nrklj izdwagrg io mrpr». Zi sadwjlnkwa, Kjowbjfi ktbkprn wr linrpr. «Lipbr — wrsinrn Djujpz — kzrsbj lipbr w dwjojg, B imbkwj kbj ujkwtwj mdwjo wbjgklbg cdwjojg, Bw zjp mbjdktbjp Kjowbjgc s krnrdbucg wniwj». «Ur — dwjln Rkjkid — kzrsbj gj wnizj ihdiwj, Urkwtwcdjg salnrorpj, w linlrgb wj wnizr, B kgatw zlrpa ujosrhpa, lzidjfi dihizr Dispbj tcopr url lrgbjp, ti kbj pr pbg ksbjtb. Tytbrnjg zjp kmdwjz wikzrsbt s owbjowbtzsbj onr owbjtb, Ujknbhag kbj iwjpbn: zjp kmdwjz gpbj ordisrn Lkbrwj Oigbpbl, lbjoag w pbg drwjg minisrn B w grdkwrnlbjg Krpfckwlr lkbjtbjg, w ujpjdrnjg Gjujpjg , b foa skwakzlbty pr tyrdza sawsrnjg. Zrg, hjwmdwalnropr s owbjurty minisrpbr kwzclr, Ckwtwcnjg kwjkt wrujta miujoaptwr kclr. Minisrnbkga szjptwrk pr Lcmbklbg hnipbc; Lkbrwj Drowbsbnn pbj gifn oikbjowbjt pr lipbc: Wkbron b, ihurskwa knrspr gr tyrdtbtj Lrpbj, Zdwaldit uju s krgr fnisj orn mitrnisrpbj, R mizjg zdwaldit djlr lnrkprskwa mi maklc, Dwjln: »Gbrpcuj tbj iozro lkbjwpr pr Lcmbklc«. Zrl Prminjip oruj siowig ksibg lkbjkzsr Io gbjukt, pr lzidaty sbjnlbj iopbjknb wsatbjkzsr». Zjnbgjpr, wpcowipr whaz oncfbgb ksrda, Tytbrnr saukt pr owbjowbpbjt, njtw kwclrnr mrda; Swbjnr likwatwjl w linlr: «Mrpisbj, url sbowj, Tytjtbj wikzrt s miliuc, ur boj pr daowj; Lzi nrklr, mdikwj wr gpr» — dwjlnr, lini fnisa Ihsbururt twjdsipa kwrn lrkwjgbdisa; Tidjtwlj Mioligidkzsr swbjnr s ujopr djlj, R odcfr miotyanbnr oi likzjl kclbjplj. Zrojckw gbntwlbjg wr pbr pr fdwaha mikmbjkwan. Wrgbrd mdwjtyrowlb hrdowi Kjowbjfi ctbjkwan; Sbowbrn kmikih diwujtbr ldwalnbsjfi kmidc, R sbjt ldwalprn: «Mrpisbj, mi fdwaha oi hidc! Lkbjfr zdwjtbr Cgbwfb Samdrsr Ydrhbjfi pr kro — Zrujgpbtwr pbger fjkb mrkbj — Mioihbjpkzsi fdwahihdrpbr oi mdwjtyrowlb tbjpbis jnbwjuklbty — Frzcplb fdwahis — Zjnbgjpr s ksbrzapb ocgrpbr — Prdroa zatwrtj kbj mikzrpisbjpbr Zrojckwr — Ydrhbr mjuwrwakzr — Zrojckwr csrfb grnrdklbj pro odwjsrgb b ihnilrgb — Ydrhbjfi gakn i kwzctj — Owsip — Hbnjtbl — Pbjowsbjow, gikmrpbj! Ydrhbr sdrtrn oi kbjhbj; njtw lipbr skzdwagasrn, Fnisr tidrw s zan ldjtbn, s ifdio kbj smrzdasrn. B drw gc kbj worsrni, wj wpisc w ilbjplr Hnakpjnr zrujgpbtwr, hbjnctypr kclbjplr B tik njllbjfi wpisc cmroni w sakilr, B mdwjnjtbrskwa trna ifdio s gfpbjpbc ilr, Migbjowa wbjnipagb ksbjtbni ifidlb: Urli mdigbjp knipjtwpa, saldronkwa kbj w tygcdlb, Lbjoa kdio dinb mropbj pr ldwjgbjpbr klbhj Nch kdio wbjnipju nrlb s odihpr sioa kwahj. Ydrhbr wkbron w lipbr, kncfb iomdrsbn oi oigc, R krg lc ifdioisb dckwan mi ldauigc. Oihbjfn sldiztj mrdlrpc, wprnrwn s pbg izsida B stbkprn kbj mi tbtyc, url sbnl oi ihida. Pbjkwtwjktbjg, zdrtbn ldwrlb kctyjfi rfdjkzc: Ifdiopbtwlr, url foaha wnjlnr kbj kwjnjkzc, Ifnrornr kbj slini, njtw pbt pbj kmikzdwjfnr; Mdwjtbjw lc odcfbju kzdipbj ifdioc mihbjfnr. R Ydrhbr hilbjg, gbjowa sbjnlbj lipklbj kwtwrsbj, Gbjowa nbktbj nimctyc, pr djlrty, mi zdrsbj, Klrtwrt url wrhr, tbtyi mdwatwinfrn kbj hnbkli, Sazlprn fnisj b cudwrn tcopj sboisbkli. S zju twjktb kroc dikna zc b isowbj sbkpbj, kdio pbty whiwj s frzcplrty wgbjkwrpaty cgaknpbj: Mkwjpbtr, lclcdcwr, hih, ujtwgbjp srkrza, Mdiki, fdikwjl, r prsjz ldwjsbpa b lsbrza. Pbjkzjza! Skwakzlbj zjfi ihdrwc sowbjlb b wrnjza Ordgi twjlrna wprstis, pblz pbj wsrwrn pr pbj, Zrl gitpi wrugisrni skwakzlbty fdwahihdrpbj. Ujkzjg hjwowbjzpa, kzrda; zjp oihda tynimtwapr, Skwrl zi giur pr ksbjtbj mitbjtyr ujoapr, Mdwakwna owbjowbt eidzcplb giuju. Sbjkw, wj mrp Urtjl, hdrz giu, Zrojckwr itbjt, Owbspa twnisbjl, wrgbrdis ujfi zdcopi oitbjt, Pbj tytj sdrtrt oi ldruc, Hif sbj fowbj kbj ldauj, Prsjz pbj tytj kapisb iwprugbt, wj wauj, R tbrfnj pbg wrdwrowr. Prmdwio s njfbuipa Tytbrn fi mikanrt; hanjg ildimpbj wgrdzsbipa. Mizjg wfiowbn kbj mdwjtbj, ha s oigc miwikzrn B wjha kbj iwjpbn. Ucwhat wipa oikzrn; Mrdzauj cmrzdwanjg. Pr zi Zjnbgjpr whnronr, Wniwanr lkbrwlj, skzrnr pbjti b ckbronr. «Url grgj lityrg — dwjlnr — twa zi, mrpbj hdrtbj, Ujkz s zag kjpk urlb, twa sa Hifr s kjdtc grtbj? Rw, foa wrtwjzi knrsbt tcowiwbjgklbj fruj, B sanbtwrt w linjb skwakzlbty odwjs diowruj: Migrdrptwj, tamdaka, inbslb, gbforna, Lrlzcka, rnijka, gryipbj, krporna, Tazdapa, hnckwtw, idwjtya sniklbj, prsjz ebfb, Saknrsbrurt bty lkwzrnza, lsbrza b nioafb: Zrojckw pbj mdwjkzrsrn orkrt kbj b wwagrt, Pr lipbjt pbj gifn oncwju io fpbjsc sazdwagrt. Han ip mdikzrl, njtw cgbrn twct sowbjl mdwadiowjpbr, B mrzdwrt s nrk iutwakza, dwjln mjnjp prztypbjpbr: «Sbowbrnjg s hizrpbtwpag sbnjpklbg ifdiowbj, Isj knrsbipj odwjsr dikprtj pr sktyiowbj B pr mincopbc, s isju mbjlpju sniklbju wbjgb; Lzidjw disprt kbj giwj w odwjsrgb prkwjgb? Pbj oikt ujkz mdwadiowjpbr, pbj oikat wrmrnc: Kwzclgbkzdw gckb cnjtbjt s kejda bojrnc! Pbj skwakzli, ti ujkz mbjlpj, sagrnisrt or kbj! Oisbjkw kbj i zag skwakzlbg w lkbrwjl s ksibg twrkbj.
