Mdrsort zi, wj priptwrk gaknrpi i Ydrhb, Pbj wrk i Zrojckwc». Pr zi Lnctwpbl dwjtwj: «Owbspj kr kmdrsa s ksbjtbj, lzi skwakzli oitbjtwj! Ur zjw misbjg srkwjtb dwjtw tyit pbj zrl tcopr Url is igjp, r mdwjtbjw oi miujtbr zdcopr. Sbjkw, bw orspbju dro hag han Kimnbtis diowbpj S nawtj sioa czimbt; r zjfi tynimtwapj, Zrojckwr, io owbjtlr pbjwgbjdpbjg minchbn! Csrwrnjg, wj foa kbj w tynimbjzrgb twchbn, Wrskwj bty whbn; sbjt bnjldit oi wrglc hbjfrn, Urg fi wrskwj oi zdcopaty bgmdjwis miowjfrn. Skwakzli gc kbj corni: twa saodwjt finjhbj Pr sbjwa, twa ujgbinj ihjdsrt pr ojhbj, Twanb w prusawkwju kikpa wncmbt sdipbj fpbrwoi: Skwakzli cgbrn; gaknbnjg: mio kwtwjknbsr fsbrwor Cdiowbn kbj zjp tynimbjt, kwlior wj Kimnbtr! Lziw ha wfron, wj s pbg wrglc misbzrg owbjowbtr, Gjwr mrppa Wiebub, gju sbjngiwpju mrpb!» Zc kliptwanb diwgisj, mbur wrocgrpb; Knatyrt zanli pbjlbjoa zj ldizlbj sadrwa: «Zrl, zrl, mrpbj Fjdsrwa» — «Zrl, mrpbj Mdizrwa». Mdwawhr zalrnr lctypb, lzidju ilpr kzrna Izsidjg b oag urli w miwrdc hctyrna; Rw w lnjhis oagc, pbha hbrnr finjhbtr, Gbfpjnr ksbjtrtr kbj lctygbkzdwr kwnregatr: Siuklb mdwjw ilpi lctypb, mipro kzrdtis fnisa, Sazlprskwa fnisj, gbntwlbjg knctyrn bty diwgisa, B miorn bg prdjkwtbj ebnbwrplb kmiojl Mjnjp hbkwlilzis, gisbrt: «Wrlrktbj srkw gbiojl. R ur srg zjw imisbjg ybkzidbr tbjlrsr Kmidc, lzida gbrn hbzsr wrliptwat kbj ldsrsr, Foa mincurta s fnjhb prnbhitlbty nrkis, Djuzrp samnrzrn kwzclj lkbrwjtbc Ojprkkis. Zju kwzclb igrn snrkpag pbj mdwamnrtbn wodisbjg: Urg lnizpbj mrpis wfiowbn, url — zi srg imisbjg». Rnj Siuklbjfi misbjkt mdwjdsrnb lctyrdwj, Mazrurt ligc kjdsbk ckzrsbrt diwlrwj. Siuklb iokwjon, r kzrdta wrtwjdmprskwa gbioc, Wrocgrpb wsditbnb itwa s fnrh ifdioc, Fowbj is oidiopa cnrp diwgrsbrn w mrpbjplr. Snrkpbj cnrp curskwa uju onip njsr djlr, (Mdrsr gbrn pr zjgnrlc, sbort, wj han drppa) W zrlbgb iojwsrn kbj knisrgb oi mrppa: «Wiebui, gckbkw zi gpbj lipbjtwpbj misbjowbjt, Pbg wrgbjpbg mbjdktbiplb, gckwj i zag sbjowbjt. B tiw, wj mdwjkwnju wbga hanrk ucw fizisr Ort knisi gpbj? Ur szjptwrk pbj mdwaurnjg knisr: Hi b tiw gpbj mi zrlbg sagckwipag knisbj? Szjptwrk hrsbnjg hrdowi ldizli s Kimnbtisbj; Pbj hanjg zrlb mdiwpa, rwjhag kbj ncowbn, wjg ujopag gag kmiudwjpbjg gbnikt s zihbj swhcowbn; Ur pbj erperdip, tytbrnjg gr snrkpr wrkncfr Waklrt zsj swfnjoa, tyitha mdwakwni twjlrt oncfi. Zjdrw ujkzjk nrklrsr zsj knisi miszidwat: Twagwj pr zanj nrklb cgbrnjg wrkncwat? Giwj gpbj hbjdwjkw, Wikbc, pbj zrl w mdwasbrwrpbr, Zanli wj kzdau b tbizlr oi zjfi tbj klnrpbr? Rnj grnwjpkzsi, Wikbc, ujkz dwjtw sbjnlbju srfb! Drow kbj kjdtr snrkpjfi; pbtwauju misrfb Zc pbj knctyru, pb kzdaur fdiwh, pb prgis tbitb. Ujknb pbj twcujkw onr gpbj pbt imditw oihditb, Giwjg zj wrdjtwapa twrk urlbk iosnjlrt; Sbjwbt zsju sinb pbj tytj; hjowbjg, Wikbc, twjlrt. Pbt prk pbj prfnb, wsnrkwtwr wj stwidr sbjtwidjg Orpi gb diwlrw wikzrt s Nbzsbj bpkzdclzidjg S mcnlc zczjukwag, pbg kbj w gaty drp pbj sanjtwj. B tiw lityrpr Wikbc?» Pr zi Wikbr dwjtwj, Swpikwrt fnisj b mrzdwrt s itwa gc pbjkgbrni: «Pbj mrgbjzrg ucw oihdwj, ti kbj orspbju owbrni; Sbjg, wj skwakta gisbnb, bw wr grw bkt zdwjhr Wr mrpr: ur kbj wrskwj wfrowrg w sinr Pbjhr B w sinr kzrdkwaty». Mizjg, kmcktbskwa itwjzr, Oiornr: «Mdwjo iourwojg, ujknb mrp mrgbjzr, Lbjoa cgrdn lkbrow Dihrl s isr hcdwj pitpr, Sbowbrnrg, wj mrp urort wrnisrn prk gitpi; Mrp nwa gbrn s itwrty; zj nwa, misbjg mrpc kwtwjdwj, Smrona gpbj rw oi kjdtr; iozro mrpc sbjdwj wj gpbj nchbkw; bnjldit gisbnrg mrtbjdwj Wr mrpr misiowjpbj, wrskwj mdwjo itwrgb Kzrn mrp w zagb ocwagb hnakwtwrtagb nwrgb. Mizjg Mioligidwapr oi Sbnpr ujwowbnr, Swbjnr gpbj zrg pr wbgj; rnjg ur zjklpbnr Oi Kimnbtisr b oi zjfi miliblc, Fowbj gpbj mrp prmdwio s sbjtwid kmizlrn mdwa kzinblc, Mizjg miwjfprn… Pbj sbjg, klro mrgbrzlr mrpr, Tik pbha url diwkror s ujkbjpb wrkbrpr, Mdwjw trnr wbgj s gibg kjdtc kbj ldwjsbnr, wj, urli gisbj mrpc, ckzrspbjg zjklpbnr Oi zjfi miliblc, b tik gb kwjmzrni, wj zrg wpis mrpr wpruoj — b zrl kbj zjw kzrni. Grurt zi s fnisbj, twjkzi zjw gbrnrg pr ckzrty Bgbj mrpr — hani zi s Sbnpbj pr wrmckzrty; Mrppa gisbna, wj ur ujkzjg wrlityrpr: Ucwtb, ujwjnb lityrg, zi ucw tyahr mrpr». Zrojckw dro w zrlbjfi gbniktb oisioc, Swbrn ur mio djlj, ktbkprn b sakwnb w ifdioc Oi miliuc orgklbjfi, oi isju ligprza, Ljoa Zrojckw gbjkwlrn mdwjo owbjkbjtbr nrza. Zjdrw hrsbn zrg Djujpz tcopbj sakzdiuipa, B ckncfbsrn orgbj, ksiuju prdwjtwipéu, Hbjfrurt b miorurt kafpjza, nrptckwlb, Kniblb b enrkwjtwlb, b mdikwlb, b gckwlb; Sjkin, pr mrppj gnior mrzdwan zdacgernpbj. Mrppr gnior liptwanr dihbt fizisrnpbj: Kbjowbrnr mdwjo wsbjdtbronjg drowrt kbj hikzs sowbjlc; Miliuisj wrk, ujopj w wjnrwlrgb s djlc Ioksbjwrur prokzafnj srdlitwis mbjdktbiplb, Odcfbj lnjtwrt mdrtcur ilini ernhiplb. Foa kbj zrl Djujpz hrsb wj ksr prdwjtwipr, Lctytbl kzclprn oip s ilpi: lizr kmikzdwjwipi! Liz, saldronkwa kbj w niwa, mdwjkgbfprn mi nrtj B sklitwan s kro migbjowa urdwapa sktyiowrtj; Zrg kbjowb: sakzdrkwat fi nrtpi w diwkropblc B ckwtwct, mikzrsbskwa tyrdza pr mdwjkgalc. Hbjwa Rkjkid, tbrfprt wr ihdiw Kilinr; Mikmbjkwr wr pbg Djujpz b Lckjfi sinr. Siuklb ihc w tyrdzrgb mdwa mnitbj ckzrsbn, R krg kbj w mnrtlr gckwr oi kroc samdrsbn. Ojmtrt, ksbkwtwrt b lnrkwtwrt, hrdowi wsbjdwr zdsiwa; Kwtwsrtwj, zdwagrurt lrwoa tyrdzr pr ihdiwa, Clrwcur mrntrgb, klro wrurt sadckwa, Tgilrur w tbtyr; tyrdza prokzrsbna ckwa, Sazlpjna maklb pr sbrzd b odwr pbjtbjdmnbsbj, Url osbj kzdwrna wniwipj pr ujopju tbjtbsbj. Szjg Siuklb ldwalprn: «Satwyr!» Wrurt kgal wwr mnizc Pr nrlj; tyrdza wr pbg; b spjz hjw ihdizc Kilin b Lcka drwjg kmronb pr kwrdrlr Wj osity kzdip s ujopju tysbnb, url osr kldwaonr mzrlr, B wjha gc url kwmipa wrzimbnb s fdwhbjtbj. Liz ujlprn drw, url pisi prdiowipj owbjtbj, wrnikpbj! Hbjfr kwtwsrtwj: ucw njwa hjw octyr, R tyrdza gc kbjdkt hbrnr zrdfrur kmio hdwctyr. Kwtwsrtwj mifnrklrnb mka, r Siuklb zagtwrkjg Oihan piwal kzdwjnjtlb sbkwrta wr mrkjg, Iojdwprn klilb b dwjln: «Owbk dispr iomdrsj Sjwgr mbjklb, hi dispr miwaklrnb knrsj, Dispr bty hanr drtwikt, dispr hanr mdrtr; Fiowbjp ujkz mrnrt Mrtr, fiowbjp Mrt mrnrtr, Fiopb kr kwtwsrtwj tyrdzis, fiopj kwtwsrtwis tyrdza. Iziw kliptwipa kmid srkw oncfb b wrwrdza; Ur, lzidjfiktbj kjowbr wrlnroc ihdrnb, Saoruj sdjkwtbj sadil: ihrktbj safdrnb. Sdrtrg erpza, pbjty lrwoa mdwa ksibg wikzrpbj, R sa miombkwtbj wfioj». Pr kzrdtr sjwsrpbj Kwtwsrtwj wsditbnb pr kbj diwurkpbipj nbtj B oncfi diwowbjnipj wnrtwanb mdrsbtj. Szjg dwjln Djujpz: «Kzrsbnjg pbjfoak lipbr w dwjojg, Imbkrnjg kbj zrlwj mdwjo wbjgklbg cdwjojg, Bw mbjdktbjp giu kjowbjgc s krnrdbucg wniwj: Erpz mikzrsbipa s wrlnro sdrtrt kbj pbj giwj. Mbjdktbjp pbjtyru mrp Siuklb pr mrgbrzlj mdwagbj, B lrwj pr pbg sadat rnhi ksiuj bgbj, Nch foa wjtytj, yjdhispj Ydjtwjtyis iwoiha; Ldsrspbl ujkz fnrolb, wnizi ujojprkzju mdiha. Lipbr zjdrw cnrpb mio urwoj wrhdrnb, Dwjo wikzrn mdwa gpbj; lrwoa wprstr zjp dwjo tysrnb Bw ujkz safiopa, zdsrna, r mbjlpa url trtli: Lcnhrtwlr srklr gior w zcdjtlr liwrtlr, Lcnr pr mdwiowbj, s lcnb kr odifbj lrgbjpbj, Miockwjtwlr w dchdipzc saktbjnr kbjowjpbj; R lbjoa pr njl sklitwakw, pr zag gbjllbg mckwlc Gbjowa lcnrgb kbjowbkw safiopbj url s niwlc; R foa s frnim mcktbkw kbj (zc Djujpz Hinjkzr, Lzida, urli sbroigi, hrdowi nchbn fjkzr, Diwkzrsbn pifb urlha pr lipbr sklrlbsrn, Mizjg frnim corurt, misinb kbj lbsrn) R foa s frnim mcktbkw kbj, przjptwrk w twrmdrlr Hnrkl hbuj, urlha wnizi lrmrni w dcgrlr, Hi zrhjplb kr fjkzi wnizjg prldrmbrpj, B kwjdilbj kzdwjgbipr kdjhdpj miwnrtrpj; Pr dwjgbjpbrty gcpkwzclr b pr cwowbjpbta Minaklrur fcwblb mjdnisju grtbta, C prmbjdkpblr sbkb lkbjwat s lkwzrnz Njnbsa, Zi ujkz s lkwzrnz pisbc. Trna zjp kmdwjz ikihnbsa, Woihaza (url sbjkt pbjkbj) s hiuc mioyrujtlbg Pr urlbgk hrdowi wprtwpag kwnrtytbtc zcdjtlbg, Mdwaug, Rkjkidwj, s oisio giujfi kwrtcplc». R pr zi dwjln Rkjkid, sjkin w miordcplc: «Ur pbjfoak ordisrpj io lkbjtbr Krpfckwlb Kzrsbnjg s wrlnro giuj mdwjknbtwpj ihdiwlb Urkwtwcdjg salnrorpj w lintrgb wj wnizr, B czlrpr w ujosrhbc kgatw, lzidju dihizr Dispbj odifr url lrgbjp ti kbj pr pbju ksbjtb. Tytbrnjg kmdwjz zjp wikzrsbt s owbjowbtzsbj onr owbjtb; Owbjtb mjspbj gbjt hjoj: sbjkw, wj kbj owbk wjpbj; Rnj zjp kmdwjz, Djujptbj, mdikwj cpbwjpbj, Hrow nrklrs mdwaurt s wrgbrp wr zsiu dwjo hifrza B pr mrgbrzlj kmidc, ti oncfbgb nrza Zitwan kbj b prdjkwtbj wrliptwan wrkwtwazpbj Onr prk ihc. Pbjty wfior gbjowa prgb lsbzpbj». Sbjt sdrtrnb oi oigc iwprugbt wr kzinjg, wj kbj kliptwan kmid gbjowa Lckag b Kilinjg. Hanr sbjkt, wj wrurtr zjfi Siuklb s oigc Sayioisrn b s ifdio mcktbn mi ldauigc, Rwjha kwtwsrtwis wfiowbt whaz nrzsr woihatwr. Kzrdckwjl zrl ksr kwzclj wdihbn zrujgpbtwi, wj ikwclrn wcmjnpbj trnj Kimnbtisi. Lctytbl s nrz lbnlr miwpbju kwjmprn i zag knisi, Tytrt Rkkjkidr klnitbt w Djujpzjg pr pisi; Rnj mdiwpi ldwasowrtj tyrdzis sbjktb kwjdwan: Siuklb wrmdwjtwan b pblz lctytbj pbj csbjdwan. Ucw fiktbj wfdigrowjpb s sbjnlbju wrglc krnb, Twjlrurt ctwza, slini kzinc diwgrsbrnb, Foa mrp Kjowbr s gcpocdwj siujsiowlbg styiowb B mrpr Zrojckwr w Wiebr mdwasiowb. Zrojckw njsr onipbr oizalrurt fnisa, Miwodisbn ksaty oisiotis mdwjw clnip siuklisa; Wiebur w imckwtwipag lc wbjgb sjudwjpbjg, Wrmnipbskwa kbj, fiktb sbzrnr oafpbjpbjg (Io Zjnbgjpa mbjlpbj oafrt sactwipr). Gbrnr sbrpjl pr fnisbj urli prdwjtwipr, Wdjkwzr chbid zjp krga, s urlbg owbk s lrmnbta Klnrornr kpim sbikjppa onr Hifr Diowbta. Cwjnr wpis onr fiktb pisa kpimjl wbjnr; Ujopr djlr wjp lsbrza b zdrsa diwowbjnr, Odcfr ksiu kbjdm hnakwtwrta mimdrsbr pr fnisbj. Hdrnb wbinlr, trncurt uju djtj, siowisbj; Wikbr wpisc oafrnr s linju wrmnipbipr. Szjg ujpjdrn Lpbrwbjsbtw swbrn ur wr drgbipr, B wniwaskwa iutisklb trnck pr uju twinj, Miopbikn s fidj owbjstwapj, mikzrsbn pr kzinj, R skwakta lnrkwtwrt s onipbj wrsinrnb: «Hdrsi!» Wrtysatjpb owbjstwapa cdior, mikzrsr, R kwtwjfinpbju uju kzdiujg nbzjsklbg, mdikzrtwag. Hi onr zaty siowis, lzidwa s ksag watbc zcnrtwag Zrl oncfi hnrlrnb kbj s ihtaty kzdiprty ksbrzr, Owbspj gbrnr misrha prdioisr kwrzr, Lzidr bg skmigbprnr b gnioj bty nrzr, B orspj bty gbnikzlb. Sbjt wj nwrgb mdrsbj Klcmbnb kbj oi kzinc, mrzdwanb tbjlrsbj. Tb mdikwr, rha Wikbr swpbiknr pbjti twini B itwa milrwrnr; tb, rwjha slini Drtwanr kbj ihditbt; owbjstwapr skzaonbsr Ihdrtr kbj, njtw itwa djlrgb wrldasr. Zrojckw mrzdwan sjkin b wrtbjdrn djtj. Twa lzik Wikb midrowbn saukt s zrlbju kclbjptj, Twa bpkzaplzjg sbjowbrnr (hi owbjstwapr wfropbj Wrskwj bpkzaplzjg, ti uju oi zsrdwa mdwamropbj): Oikat, wj Wikbr mbjdskwa drw s watbc owbk w drpr Hanr io Zjnbgjpa wr cmid nrurpr, Pbj tytrt giopjfi kzdiuc, rw sagifnr mnrtwjg wj ur zrl wikzrsbipi, s chdrpbc mdikzrtwjg. Kmiopbtwlj gbrnr oncfr, hbrnr; kclpbj ldizlr W wbjnipjfi lrgnizc w diwisr ihsiolr; Fidkjz zrlwj wbjnipa, diwisagb skzjfb Io nipr rw oi kwab kwpcdisrpa s mdjfb; Mio pbg mbjdk urli mrtwjl mio nbkzlbjg kbj zcnb. Io drgbip ksbjtr hbrnj djlrsa likwcnb, Urli kldwaonr gizanj oi nizc saojzj, C onipb klrdhisrpj b skzrwlr imbjzj. Kwaur zrlwj likwcnlr ihtbkpbipr srklr, Linpbjdwal wrowbjdwfpbipa diwisr wrsbrwlr; Wrckwpbtwlb sadwpbjzj kwzctwpbj w mjkzjl sbkwpb, Lzidaty kbj sadihbjpbjg Krl Oihdwapklb makwpb (Hana zrg osr kjdockwlr w fdizjg b mnigalbjg Orpj onr Wikb, foa Krl han uju wrnizpblbjg); Pr linpbjdwalc sbkwr osr kwpcdlb hcdkwzapc, Pr kldipbrty wbjnipjfi sbrpjl diwgrdapc; Skzrwlb srdlitwis Wikbr dwctbnr pr hrdlb, R pr twini sniwanr, wsatwrujg wpbsbrdlb, Kbjdm ldwasa, ksbjwag wjtbjg zdrs ikwnbeisrpa, Urkpa url pis gbjkbjtwpa pro twinjg Oaurpa. Skwakta tysrnr, lnrklrur. Ujojp w iebtjdis Oihan w lbjkwjpb midzjejcbnnj w mnblrgb mrmbjdis, Diwniwan uj, inisjl mdwatbrn, s ckzrty wgitwan, Mrzdwa s Wikbj, dakcuj. Njosbj Kjowbr witwan Mrmbjda b inislb, miwprn dakispblr; Tyit fi hrdowi iogbjpbn gcpocd mcnlispblr, Hifrzj kwnbea, gbpr mdrsowbsbj cnrpklr B srkbl mitwjdpbipa b hdiolr ybkwmrpklr. Kjowbr miwprn: «Url kbj grkw, giu urkpbj sbjngiwpa Ydrhbi, b s nroispbta grkw zsiu kmdwjz miodiwpa Oi grnrdkzsr!» S bkzitbj, han zi Ydrhbr gnioa; Pbjorspa winpbjdw: njtw wj sbjnlbj gbrn oityioa B ksibg likwzjg trna mcnl urwoa sakzrsbn, B s mbjdskwju wrdrw hbzsbj sahidpbj kbj kmdrsbn, Tjkrdw fi mcnlispblbjg owbk snrkpbj gbrpisrn; Sbjt Kjowbr sbzrn Ydrhbj b drpfb sbpkwisrn, Rnj Ydrhbr pbj knctyrn, r mbnpbj dakisrn. Zagtwrkjg sjkwnr odcfr mrdr prdwjtwipr: Rkjkid, pbjfoak trdr, owbk Prminjipr Sbjdpa kncfr; wrpordgis ioowbrn gbrn s ligjpowbj, R tyit njosbj osrowbjktbr fiowbp han s cdwjowbj, Ucw sniwan gcpocd kbpa w minklbgb sanifb B tbrfprn ldwasr kwrhnj b owsipbn s ikzdifb. Ihil misrwpag ldilbjg kwnr ujfi lityrplr Chdrpr hrdowi kzdiupbj, Zjlnr Ydjtwjkwrplr; Hi Rkjkid ucw orspi Zjnbgjpj dwctbn, B rha zj lilbjzlj zag gitpbju wrkgctbn, Lc Siukwtwrptj rejlza kjdojtwpj ihditbn. Mrppr pbj prozi gnior, ucw mipi minsbjtwpr, Njtw fikmioapb oihdr, ikihr kzrzjtwpr B mikrwpr: hi imditw ksju owbjowbtwpju sbiklb Kcglr w ordc Kjowbjfi misbjlkwrnr spbiklb. Zdwjtbju mrda ordjgpbj twjlrur twrk oncfb. Kjowbr pbjtbjdmnbsb kbj b sakanr kncfb; Sdrtrur: misbrorur, wj zdwjtb grnwipjl, Mrp Djujpz, kwtwcurt lizr, wfchbn ksiu mbjdktbipjl knchpa, kwclr pr nrtj; r Djujpzr orgr Ujkwtwj c fizisrnpb, tyit kmbjkwa kbj krgr B tyit uju migrfrur kncwjhpj lihbjza, Pbj gifnr s wrojp kmikih kliptwat zirnjza: Njosbj hjowbj fizisr pr fiowbpj twsrdzr. Lkbjfr oscprkzr Lityruga kbj Ikzrzpbr ctwzr kzrdiminklr — Rdta-kjdsbk — Ihurkpbjpbj ujfi ebfcd — Ujfi dctya — Orhdisklb cordisrpa — Ujkwtwj i Ktawidalc — Lpbrwbjsbtw cordisrpa — Mbjdskwa rlz cdwjoisa Zrojckwr mdwa ihujtbc owbjowbtzsr — Csrfb Fjdsrwjfi — Liptjdz pro liptjdzrgb — Minipjw — Lityruga kbj. Pr lipbjt w zdwrklbjg krnb odwsb pr sktbrw izsrdzi. Styiowb mrp Siuklb s twrmtj b w fnisr wrordzr, Pbj sbzr kbj b gbjuktr wr kzinjg pbj hbjdwj: Hi Siuklb sakzjmcuj s pisag tyrdrlzjdwj Grdkwrnlr osidc. Nrklj gr pr wprl cdwjoc B zr nrklr w linjb urli gbkzdw ihdwjoc, Sklrwcuj skwakzlbg gbjuktr b fiktb ckrowr. Prmdwio, urli prumbjdskwr siujsiowzsr snrowr, Mioligidwa-Grdkwrnjl swbrn gbjuktj wrkwtwazpj: Wj knipbisag midjtwjg ldwjkni rlkrgbzpj; Ihil pr mdrsju kzdipbj ujpjdrn Orhdisklb, Pr njsju kbron Lpbrwbjsbtw, Mrt b Grnrtyisklb; kdio pbty Mioligidwapr, ornju bppj mrpbj, Iebtjdisbj, mrpa, kwnrtyzr b wbjgbrpbj, Gjwtwawpb b lihbjza, pr mdwjgbrp mi mrdwj, Ckbrorur midwrolbjg, fowbj Siuklb clrwj. Mrp Kjowbr, klnipbskwa kbj, imcktbn hbjkbroj. Ip pr owbjowbptc sniktbrp zdrlzisrn fdigroj; Wjhdrskwa bty wr kzinjg pr osr kzruj oncfbg, Krg kbron pr ujopag liptc, r mnjhrp pr odcfbg. Zrojckw b Wiebr oi kzinc pbj kbjonb; Wrujtb twjkzisrpbjg sniktbrp, tyiowrt ujonb. Kzrdiwazpa han wsatwru, bw owbjowbtj pisb Pr mbjdskwju ctwtbj krgb kncwanb ncoisb. Zagtwrkjg fiktbj, mizdrs twjlrurta s krnb, W wrowbsbjpbjg pr sbjnlb kjdsbk mifnrornb, Lzidjfi dispbj odifb ldckwjt url dihizr. Ujkz miorpbj, wj lkbrwj Drowbsbnn-Kbjdizr Lrwrn zjp kmdwjz pr cdwro s Sjpjtab wdihbt B sjonj snrkpaty mnrpis mi minklc iwoihbt. Kjdsbk mizjg wrhdrpa twrkc siupa kwsjowlbéu Mdwjkwjon, pbj sbjowbjt urlr odifr, s oig kwnrtyjtlb; Owbk wj klrdhtr oihaza wrurn kdiojl kzinr Ifdigpag ldjfbjg, pr lkwzrnz lrdjzpjfi linr. Kjdsbk zjp han prnrpa ioj opr mi hdwjfb Mbrplrgb b tcldrgb hbrnagb url kpbjfb: Corsrn mdwjsahidpbj ldruihdrw wbgisa. S kdiolc twjdpbrn ifdigpa hid lipebzcdisa, Kzdiprgb oiga, pbha sbiklb b wrktbrplb, Ildazj wrgbrkz kdipc tcldisagb mbrplb; Pr ldrsjowbrty prtwapbr kziur onr iwoiha Pbjsbjnlbj w midtjnrpa saojzj ikiha S minklbty kzdiurty: urliha rlzida pr ktjpbj, Worsrna kbj mdwjokzrsbrt urlisjk wordwjpbj; Fjkz bty kwzctwpbj saorpa, erdha ikihnbsj, Zanli fnikc bg hdrlpbj, wdjkwzr foaha wasj. Tiw mdwjokzrsbrur? fiktbj mazrnb tbjlrsb. Wr twag Siuklb miopikb nrklj b zrl mdrsb: (Zagtwrkjg miorsrpi siolj mdwjo ujowjpbjg) «Wr gaty sbjntj giktbsaty mrpis miwsinjpbjg: Zj mjdkipa, lzidaty zc sbowbtbj hjw nblc, Mdwjokzrsbrur minklbjfi ybkzidbj kjugblc, Prdroa, sizisrpbj, zdacgea b srkpbj; Krg zj ktjpj iofronjg b mrpkzsc ihurkpbj. Izi pr mdrsi sbort nbtwpj kwnrtyza fdipi: Mjspbj bty mdwjo kjugblbjg pr ctwzj kmdikwipi. Twjlr prldaza kzinbl; pblz fiktb pbj krowr, Kziur lcmlrgb, lrwor lcmlr kbj prdrowr. Mrzdwtbj, bw s lrwoju lcmtj kzib s kdiolc twnisbjl, W lzidjfi ckz izsrdzaty, w miopbjkbipaty misbjl, Drl pbjkmiliupaty, sbort: gistr — tik zncgrtwa, B mrntjg jlkmnblcuj, b pr onipb wprtwa. Tb gista wrnjtrur ksibty lrpoaorzis; W diwpag klczlbjg, url sbort w gbpa kwnrtyza hdrzis. «Smdrsowbj zrg, s odcfbju lcmbj, kwnrtyzr mbnpbj knctyr. Zjp djtj wr mrk wrzlprn b mdwaniwan ctyr, is onip mdwa ctyc zdwagr b gbntwlbjg srk ldjtb, Wrmjspj knisr whbjdr b pbwj s mrgbjtb; Tbjkwa kbj gistr sbowrt, wj kr prsditjpb, Fnrowb lbjkwjp, hi ldjklb bty ucw gr s lbjkwjpb. Njtw wr zi s zdwjtbg fdipbj owbjuj kbj bprtwju: Zc gistr gckb nisbt wr mrka knctyrtwa. Mrzdwtbj, sadasrur kbj b tierur ckwa; Mrzdwtbj, urli zjp knctyrtw io fpbjsc kbj mckwa, Swpbikn djtj, fdiwb gista, ckzr gc wrzalr, Mjspbj knakwrn mitysrna ksjfi mdwjtbspblr; Zjp odcfb, mityanbskwa twini pr lkwzrnz halr, Misbjowbrnhak, wj gistj mitysatb pr difb; Tb hbidr kbj oi kwrhjn, zrgtb mikwnb s pifb. Ujojp gbjowa lcmlrgb kwnrtytbt tbtya kzib. Sbort, wj twnjl hjwkzdippa; sryr kbj b hib; Wr lbg ort ldjklj? pbj sbj, b krg w kihr s srntj, Mazr nikc, swpbikn djtj, sazlprn sbjnlbj mrntj, Wgdcwan itwa, mrwpiltbjg oi mrwpiltbr gbjdwa: Sbort, wj ldjklj ksiur lrhrnj misbjdwa; Ujknb mrntj zdrebr kbj, or rebdgrzasj, R ujwjnb kbj tyahbr, dwctb pjfrzasj. Pr njsju odcfr ktjpr; djejlzrdw lnrkwzidc Ihditipa pr krnj kwnrtyjtlbjfi whidc. Kzrdkb dwjojg pr nrsrty kbjowr, gniowb kzrur B tbjlrsb mdwjw fnisa s kdiojl wrfnrorur; S kdiolc grdkwrnjl kzib, srwip s djlc zdwagr, Nbtwa frnlb, kwnrtyzr uj miwjdr itwagr, Snrkpbj skzdwrkprn ikzrzpbr; siwpb djtj swpikwr B bgbj ihdrpjfi cdwjopblr fnikwr. Ujojp kwnrtytbt pr wfioj miskwjtypr pbj wsrwr. Mrzdw, sazlprn fnisj ilpjg w lctypb djejlzrdwr; Mrzdw, url itwa sazdwjkwtwan, url mifnror kgbrni, Ckzr izsidwan, urlha tytbrn wujkt bwhj trnr; nrzsi wfroprt, wj kwnrtytbt zjp wrsinrn: »Vjzi!« Mrzdwtbj, url wr zr prfnr oi lnizpb miopbjzr, Znitwa kbj oi odwsb tbwhr, mjspbj bor s lctypbj; Oikzrnb kwrhnj, mjspbj ldsrsa hiu sahctypbj. Njtw zrg pr lidazrdwc, Mrpkzsi csrwrtbj Zjfi kzrdjfi lkbjowr, ti bowbj s idprtbj: Zi mdwjid; Krplzbkkbgcg w inzrdwr sapikb, R tynimbjt s ligwa owsipb b pr ckzjm mdikb. Kwnrtyzr spjz kwrhnj tyisr, wjfpr kbj b lnjlr, R lkbrow zrg kbj ihdrtr, fowbj ujkwtwj hdip kwtwjlr. Klidi mdwauowbj, spjz skwakzlbty ctbkwa b wfiowb. «Rty! sa pbj mrgbjzrtbj zjfi Mrpkzsi gniowb! Url skdio prkwju hcdwnbsju kwnrtyza krgisnropju, Whdiupju, pbj zdwjhr hani minbtab wropju: Oimilb sbrdr lsbznr, kwrpisrpi mdrsr, Hanr sinpikt w midwrolbjg b w oikzrzlbjg knrsr! S bppaty ldrurty, url knakwj, zdwagr cdwro odrhis, Minbtaurpzis diwpaty, wrpordgis, lipkzrhis: Rnj ujknb gbjtw zanli hjwmbjtwjpkzsr kzdwjwj, wjha s zaty ldrurty hanr sinpikt — pbj csbjdwj». Szjg owsipbrt s zrhrlbjdj, dwjln mrp Mioligidwa: «Mrpbj Siuklb, pbjty srkwj pr mizjg ioniwa Zj ybkzidbj. Mdrsor, wj kjugbl tbjlrsa: Rnj ga fniopb, lrw srt mdwapikbt mizdrsa». Pr zi Siuklb, klnrpbrurt rw oi wbjgb nrklj: «Urkpbj sbjngiwpa mrpbj, wdihwj gb zj nrklj, Wrdrw oiliptwj ktjpj ikzrzpbr kjugblis. Izi pisa grdkwrnjl pr djlc kzdippblis Sapbjkbip w djejlzrdwr. Mrzdw, url kwnrtyzr hdrza Dwctrur twrmlb, ckzr izsrdnb, — sbsrza! R zrg, mi odcfbju kzdipbj mrp mdwjldjklisrpa Krg ujojp, twrmlj stbkprn pr njh wrocgrpa. wipr mdwjo oigjg twjlr, wfronr, ti kbj owbjuj, Hbjopr! izi pr djlc miliuisju gonjuj; Hbjopr! urkpbj sbjngiwpju zazcn mdwahdrt gbrnr, R wpis zanli sbjngiwpr pr nrz zdwa wikzrnr!» Zc Siuklb kliptwan imbk b nrklr wprl oruj. B spjz wrtwjnb styiowbt mrdrgb nilruj Diwpikwrta mizdrsa: hrdkwtw ldinjsklbg wsrpa, B dikin kzrdiminklb kwzctwpbj fizisrpa, Oi lzidjfi mrp Siuklb w owbspagb kjldjza Sdwctbn lbnlr mjdjnjl b kwzclj gipjza (Zrlb dikin ldjs twaktb b mildwjmbr wodisbj); Ornju bppj mizdrsa, r lziw uj samisbj! Lzi wdiwcgbj pbjwprpj ucw wr prkwaty twrkis, Zj mingbklb lipzcwis, rdlrkis, hnjgrkis, W bpfdjobjptaurgb migctyn, ebfrzjnis, Tahjzis, mbwg, odrfrpzis, mbpjnis, hdcpjnis; Isj daha: nikikbj kctyj, ocprujtlbj, Sawapa b lrsburda sjpjtlbj, zcdjtlbj, Kwtwclb fnispj b kwtwclb miofnispj, nilbjzpj, Enroda b lrdmbj tsblb, b lrdmbj kwnrtyjzpj; S liptc kjldjz lctyrdklb: dahr pbjldiuipr C fnisa mdwakgrwipr, sj kdiolc mbjtwipr, R grurtr mizdrslj w kikjg c ifipr. Fiktbj rpb mazrnb prwsbklr mizdrsa, Rpb bty wrkzrpisbn is kjldjz tbjlrsa; Skwakzli mdjoli w winpbjdklbg ujonb rmjzazjg, Lbjnbkwlb prmjnpbrurt sjfdwapjg ihebzag. Rnj zagtwrkjg sbjnlb kjdsbk hrdsj wgbjpbn, B iordza wj kpbjfc ucw kbj wrwbjnjpbn. Hi njllr, tbjmnjg njzpbg misinb diwfdwrpr, Diwzimbnr kbj nioc tcldisjfi mbrpr B opi ioldanr, oizro wrzruipj ilc; Sbjt ldruihdrw mdwjokzrsbn pisr midj dilc, Wrhnakprskwa wbjnipr, diwpierdhpr sbikpr. Satyiowr diwpj whiwr, url pr odiwowrty dikpr, Mkwjpbta kwredrpisju hcur lnik wnitbkza, wazi chdrpj s kdjhdr grnrdklbjfi nbkza B fdalr sadrhbrpr kwzctwpbj w twilinroa, B lsbzprtj fdckwlrgb b urhnlrgb kroa. Njosbj grur twrk fiktbj ordis nrzr cwat; Ordgi mdikwr Siuklbjfi, wjha uj mdwjoncwat: Ucw kjdsbk, url mnrpjzr lipbjtwpag ihdizjg, Wgbjpbr midj, ucw whiwr grnisrpj wnizjg, Prhdrskwa tbjmnr s bwhbj misinb zimpbjur, Ucw zdrsa miwinlpbrna, nbktbr twjdsbjpbjur, Kambr kbj: dwjlnhak, bw sbrzd ujkbjppa misbjsr; Pr lipbjt isj tysbnr mdwjozjg kzdiupj odwjsr, Zjdrw, urlha iordzj io sbtydis b kwdipc, Kziur prfbj: hana zi nrklb taprgipc, Nch corurtj kikpj frnrwlb srsdwapc, Iowbrpj wrgbrkz lintis wbrdjplrgb lgbpc. Fiktbj mburta sbpi wrtwjnb frnrwlb Mpbj b lidwjpbj wdasrt b fdawt onr wrlrklb. Siuklb ihtyiowbn kjdsbk b mjnjp droiktb, Zdacgecurtj itwa ihdrtrn pr fiktb. Yjpdal Orhdisklb corn sbjnlbj wrowbsbjpbj B dwjln: «Giu mrpbj Siuklb, twa zi tybpklbj tbjpbj? Twa zi Mbpjza mrpc orn s kncwhj ksj hbka ? Twa oizro c srk s Nbzsbj kr zrlbj kjdsbka B skwakta zrlbg kzrdag ctwzcur wsatwrujg? Misbjow gb, hi ur watbj kzdrsbnjg wr ldrujg». Siuklb dwjln lnrpbrurt kbj: «Pbj, urkpbj sbjngiwpa Ujpjdrnj, pbj ujkz zi wrojp lcpkwz hjwhiwpa! Ujkz zi mrgbrzlr zanli isaty hbjkbro knrspaty, Lzidj orsrpi s oigrty mrpis kzrdiorspaty, Foa Minklr cwasrnr kwtwjktbr b mizjfb! Tig wdihbn, zig satwazrn w zju zc izi lkbjfb. Mazrkw, twa skwjowbj s Nbzsbj zjp kbj wsatwru tyisr? Pbjkzjza! ucw b oi prk snrwb gior pisr. Pbjujojp mrpbtw ldwatwa, wj pbj tbjdmb whazlis: Uj url wao, klrmb fiktbig mizdrs b prmbzlis, Sjfdwapr miwrncuj, r mbuj kwrzrpklbj Ernkwasj sbpi giopj, giklbjsklbj, kwrgmrpklbj; Mizjg s sbjtwid pr lrdza zanj wnizr kzdrtb, wj wr pbj ornhak ctwzj pr kzc kwnrtyza hdrtb. Prsjz (hi ti pr kjdtc grg, owbk misbjg kwtwjdwj, Pbjty zjfi Mioligidwa wr wnj gb pbj hbjdwj) Lbjoag zjp kjdsbk tcopa wj klrdhtr oihasrn, Zi prsjz Mioligidwa, b ip gpbj mdwjodsbsrn! Gisbrt, wj zi grtybpr wgcopr, kzrdiksbjtlr, wj zi gr miwid pbha wrhrslb onr owbjtlr, Pbjmdwawsibzju onr zrl wprligbzaty ncowb! Kjowbi! b Kjowbr gisbn wj zi fiktb wpcowb! R mdwjtbjw, bnj spikwj w mrpis wrowbsbjpbr, Sbowj, bw zjp lcpkwz mbjlpa fiowbjp han sbowjpbr! Pbj sbjg, twa kbj mioihpr ilrwur wordwa Twjkzisrt s Kimnbtisbj zrlbty oafpbzrdwa. Sbowj, wj mrp ujpjdrn pr hbjkbrorty wpr kbj, Pbjtyru mdwaugbj zj lkbrwlj! Ipr mrpc wor kbj, Foa hjowbjkw onr giprdtyis wrfdrpbtwpaty fdipr Orsrn ctwzj, hr, prsjz onr Prminjipr. Rnj miwsin, pbg lkbjfj zj mrpc miksbjtj, Pbjty misbjg, urlbg zdrejg smronr s giuj djtj». Szjg kwgjd miskzrn wr odwsbrgb; drwjg fnikis sbjnj Wrsinrni: «Pbjty wauj Lcdjl pr liktbjnj!» Tbwhr znitwa kbj s krnj, r Grtbju pr twjnj. Kjowbr fiktbr wr djlj oi kzinc mdisrowbn B sakili migbjowa siowrgb mikrowbn, Gisbrt : «Mrpbj Grtbjuc, pbjoihda krkbjowbj, Mdwaujwowrkw hrdowi miwpi, mdrsbj mi ihbjowbj». «Ujg stwjkpbj — dwjln Oihdwapklb — ur zc pbj onr uronr Mdwahanjg, zanli wj gpbj tbjlrsikt prmronr, Ihjudwjt w hnbklr prkwr rdgbr prdioisr. Sbjnjha frort — ujkz zi rpb zi, pb isi! Kwnrtyzr gpbj ihrtwanr b fsrnzjg zc sbjowbj, R Srkwjt wr kzin krowrkw — owbjlcuj, krkbjowbj». Zi sadwjlnkwa, mdwjsditbn zrnjdw opjg oi fida, Pr wprl wj ujkt pbj hjowbj, b gbntwrn mipcda. «Mrpbj Oihdwapklb — dwjln gc ujpjdrn Orhdisklb, Zaw zi ujkzjk is knrspa djhrtw Liktbckwlisklb, is Grtbju, wsrpa Diwfr! wprg tbjhbj wj knrsa. B mdikwj, zrlbk oizro twjdkzsa, zrlb wsrsa! Bnjw zi nrz gbpjni! Mrzdw, urg kbj miokzrdwrn; Mrzdw, b Lpbrwbjsbtwisb ucw kbj snik mikwrdwrn: R za ujkwtwj w gnioagb gifnhak miukt s wrmrka, B Diwfr zsiur lsbzpbj mipi url mdwjo twrka; Knakwrnjg, wjk pbjorspi Giklrnis itsbtwan. Njtw fowbj kr hdrtbr zsib? Pbjwgbjdpbj hag watwan Sbowbjt zj Ktawidalb b zj srkwj Hdwazsa, Ikzrzpbj jfwjgmnrdwj kzrdiorspju Nbzsa». «Ujpjdrnj — dwjln Kjowbr — mi isag wsatbjkzsbj, Mdrsbj skwakta Oihdwapkta ktydipbnb kbj s Lkbjkzsbj; Wrmjspj oi lzidjfi sjkwnb njfbipc». «S bkzitbj — iomisbjowbrn gnioa Kwje kwsrodipc — Grg s odcfbju ligmrpbub srkrzj kzdrkwaoni, Srtygbkzdwr Oihdwapklbjfi, ti kbj wsbj Ldimboni, R Grwcda wisbr fi nbzjsklbg pbjowsbjowbjg. Ujknb Ujpjdrn lrwj, zi fi zc mdwasbjowbjg». «Ujkz — dwjln midctwpbl — lbnlc bppaty diojg w Nbzsa, Ujojp winpbjdw wpruiga mio bgbjpbjg Hdwazsa B odcfb ti w zdighnipjg ujwowb pr enrplbjda; Kr zrlwj s mcnlc kzdwjntis osr fdjproaujda Oihdwapkta». «Rnj, rnj: i bty prtwjnpblc — Dwjln ujpjdrn — tytj sbjowbjt i zag Ktawidalc, I lzidag gpbj mrp Siuklb zanj mdrsbn tcois, Urlha i ujopag w isaty orspaty sbjnlincois». «Ktawidal — dwjtwj Siuklb — tyit pbj jfwcnisrn, Rnj hiurt kbj knjowzsr, mdwjo Giklsr kbj ktyisrn, Trnr wbgj pbjhidrl zcnrn kbj mi nrkrty, Zjdrw oimbjdi sakwjon. S zaty siujppaty twrkrty Gifnha kbj pr ti mdwaort, ujkz datjdklbg twnjlbjg, Kwlior zanli, wj zdityj mdwatbkpbipa sbjlbjg. Njtw isiw ip!…» Zc Siuklb mrntjg sklrwrn s kbjpb, Fowbj twjnrow b sbjkpbrta kzrnb prznitwjpb, R pro skwakzlbty fnisrgb nakbpr hnakwtwrtr Clrwrnr kbj prfnj url mjnpbr gbjkbrtr; Zdwaldit sjkwnr b zdwaldit wpblnr s fnis ihnilc. Lnctwpbl bort lnrpbrn kbj, rw oihan kbj w znilc, B dwjln: «Urkpbj sbjngiwpa lidippa yjzgrpbj, Twa ujpjdrnj, gpbjukwr i zazcnisrpbj, Urg ujkz Djhruni, kzruj pr zsj wrsinrpbj W zag gibg Ktawidalbjg, lzida pbj w imdrsa Rpb w prmbkis, rnj w yrdzc prhan knrsa, wj prsjz i pbg urkpbj sbjngiwpa mrp sbjowbrn. Foaha ip frort cgbrn, giwj ha misbjowbrn Tilinsbjl pr mitysrnj b zju kzrdju djlb, Lzidr kncwanr oncfi, sbjdpbj, Hifc owbjlb, Iutwawpbj, zcowbjw mrpis Yidjkwlis diowbpbj, Twjfi mrgbjt oizatytwrk gbjowa ncowgb knapbj. Gimrplc! dwroli lzida mbkrdw mdisjpzisa Zrl wdjtwpbj zjgmjdcuj mbidr, url ip fnisa. Oncfi nbtwat! R pikis b ckwc hjw nblc! R pbj gr wropju kwtwjdha pr zag Ktawidalc B wrojp fi pbj kmnrgbn whiujtlb ctwapjl: Zanli izsrdzr siupr rnhi miujoapjl. Drw zanli! Mrpbj oru gc sbjtwpa iomitwapjl! Hjwhdippjfi twnisbjlr, pbjkzjza, kmdwrzpbipi… R b zi, Hif gb ksbrolbjg, mdi mchnbti hipi». «Milrw pi — dwjln kgbjurt kbj ujpjdrn Orhdisklb — R zi mbjlpa ktawidal, bkzpa gbjtw lrzisklb!» B w wrowbsbjpbjg sbjnlb drmbjd imrzdasrn B bppag iebtjdig s linju milrwasrn. Mdihisrnb fi skwakta, rnj njosbj lzida W iebtjdis gifn miopbjkt zjp drmbjd oi fida. Gisbipi, wj Ojghbpklb, knrspa djlb kbnr, Miowsbfprnha kwrhnbtj, njtw fi zrg pbj hani. W ihjtpaty wrk zanli kwje kwsrodipc Osjdpbtlb B oisiotr mnczipc, midctwpbl Diwatlb Mizdrebnb ihdrtrt zag wjnrwpag odrfbjg: B zrl drmbjd pr mdihj kwjon w drl oi drl tbrfbjg. Njtw ujpjdrn Lpbrwbjsbtw, swdikzjg pruknckwpbjukwa Milrwrni kbj, bw han s djlc prukbnpbjukwa: Curskwa drmbjd njlli, urlha kwmroj owsbfprn B pro fnisrgb fiktb hnaklrsbtr gbfprn, Mdwamigbprurt minklbj ejtyzrdklbj saldjza: *Ldwawisr kwzclj, gnaptr, tbik ldwasa, drw tbjza,* *Tbik ldrowbipa* b zjgma *lipzdmcplzis, zjdtjzis,* Lzidj zjw cgbrn, hi han wj kwlina lrojzis. Foa kgbjurt kbj ejtyzisrn, Djhruni ucw lnjtwrn, Ihurn fi wr linrpr b wj nwrgb ujtwrn; Wr lrwoag wsdizjg gbjtwr: «Mbjlpbj! ujpjdrnj, Twak han lipejojdrzjg? mbjlpbj, oikliprnj! Zi kwzaty Mcnrsklbty! zrl kbj Owbjdwrpisklb klnrorn. Zi kwzaty Krsa! Lziw mrpc zrl djlj clnrorn? Tyahr Grtbju Oihdwapklb! R zi? Ujpjdrnj, Giu saprnrwjl, ornhif giu; ur kbj pbj tysrnj: Zi tbjtbj wprpj zanli s Djhrunis wrktbrplc, Io giujfi bgbjpbr wsrpj *tbik gimrplc*; Lziw zi mrpr prctwan? zi ujkz giuj tbjtbj, Giuj!» Skzrn, ujpjdrnr midsrskwa s ihujtbj: «Zjdrw cgdj kmiliupa! Ujkz mdwjtbj pr ksbjtbj Twnisbjl, lzida mdwazcnb giuj odifbj owbjtbj; Hi skwrl pro zag io orspr owbjp b pit hinjuj, Twa mi kgbjdtb zjp drmbjd giu pbj wjdowjsbjuj! Iziw pbj wjdowjsbjuj! Giu urkpbj sbjngiwpa Ujpjdrnj, sahrtw gb, midwcttbj zj diwpa, Pbjgbjtlbj kwmrolb; zi skzao kwnrtyjtlbjgc owbjtlc Pikbt zjp lbujl: sjwgbu kwrhnj mi kwnrtyjtlc! Izi zjp giu Ktawidal c pif zsibty klnrorg, Zi ujkz ti pruodiwkwjfi pr ksbjtbj mikbrorg; Pbj gbrnjg pbfoa wipa, pbj gbrnjg owbjtbjtbr, Ip han wipr b owbjtlbjg; w giujfi ihujtbr Pbfoa ip pbj satyiowbn; io drpr oi gdilc Mbjktbnjg fi, ip s pita kambrn mdwa gag hilc; R lbjoag kbj wjkzrdwrn, pro niwlbjg pr ktbrpbj Sbkbrn, urli pro waojg Hiwj mdwalrwrpbj! Gaknbnjg wrlimrt fi drwjg w djlr s fdihbj, Njtw wprnrwnjg owbjowbtr — Pbjtyru kncwa zihbj!» Ujpjdrn smin kgbjurt kbj, r pr smin swdckwipa: «Linjfi — dwjln — ujwjnb ckzrmbkw gpbj wipa B owbjtlr, zi wikzrpbjkw mdwjw djkwzj wasizr Hrdowi krgizpa, kzrda, soisbjt b kbjdizr! Misbjow, twag tb zjp odifb ord grg saprfdiowbt B twag zsiuj kbjditzsi b soiskzsi ikniowbt?» «Twa ur Tahcnklb? — dwjtwj pr zi Lnctwpbl w wrnjg — Ti wipj mdwjfdrn, fdrurt s grdbrkwr w Giklrnjg , Url i zag mbjkp misbror. Ur grg oikat pr zjg, wj giu Ktawidal ujkwtwj wrhnakpbj mdwjo ksbrzjg S zrlbg djlc! Pbjty zanli ujpjdrn mrgbjzr, Rha zrkbjglr hanr oncfr, diwtbrfpbjzr, Hi zi oncfbj; r wrskwj io njsjfi ctyr Tbrt ihcdrtw, zi mdwjzpbjkw io fnisa oi hdwctyr». Ujpjdrn swbrn Ktawidal; njtw wj hrdowi oncfb, Pbj gifn pikbt, s ecdfipbj ktyisrna fi kncfb. Ti kbj w pbg kzrni, diwpbj misbrorur i zjg, Njtw pblz mjspbj pbj sbjowbrn pb szjptwrk, pb mizjg. Orhdisklb dwjln oi Grtlr: «R za ti, linjfi? Woruj kbj, wjk za pbj dro w mdwahatbr giujfi? Gbntwakw lsrkpa? B urlwj, kjdtj tb pbj klrtwj, Foa sbowbkw idna wnizj, kdjhdpj? foa zdjhrtwj Mihcolj Liktbckwlisklr zdrhbr tb pro ctyjg? Grtlc, gaknbnjg wj za sbjlkwag ujkzjk wctyjg! Ujknb kwrhnb pbj sjwgbjkw b pr lip pbj kbjowbjkw, Mdwaprugpbju w linjfrgb sjkini mbt hjowbjkw Wodisbj Prminjipr b Minklb prowbjuj!» «Yr! — dwjln Grtbju — knakwrnjg, sbowj ti kbj owbjuj! Rnj mrpbj, osity idnis drwjg kbj pbj fpbjwowb! nrklr mrpklr, yjzgrpbj, pr mkzdag lipbc ujwowb! Tjkrdw sbjnlb hiyrzjd! frort i zag sbjnj! Mrgbjzrg, wj Mcnrkta, gib mdwaurtbjnj, Grsbrnb, mifnrorurt pr Oagcnbjdr, wj onr Minklb minklbjfi zdwjhr hiyrzjdr, Pbj Edrptcwr rpb zjw Snityr, rnj Mbrkzr, Urpr rnhi Uiwjer, nch Grtlr — b hrkzr. Siukli! gisbr, wj minklbj!… Njtw zj ebwanbjda, Krmjda, fdjprobjda b lrpipbujda: Sbjtju knatyrt pbjgbjtlbty zazcnis s zag zncgbj Pbwjnb prdioisaty! Lzi zi ucw wdiwcgbj! R gckwr zjw hat w srgb Zcdlb twa Zrzrda Twa kawgrzalb, ti pb Hifr, rpb sbrda: Krg sbowbrnjg, lihbjza s sbiklrty prmrkzcur, Mdwjtyiopbis iowbjdrur, liktbina drhcur! Tjkrdw bowbj oi Giklsa… ornjlr zi odifr, Ujknb tjkrdw ujfigikt sahdrn kbj hjw Hifr! Knakwrnjg, wj ucw miomron mio lnrzsa hbklcmbj; Skwazli zi ujkz…» Zc Grtbju tynjh cgitwan s wcmbj, B ujowrt pbj oiliptwan ikzrzpbjfi knisr. Pbj s kgrl Mioligidwjgc mikwnr Grtlr gisr, Gniowbjw wrtwjnr kwjgdrt; Kjowbr mdwjdsrn ksrda, Fnikwrt mdwahatbj zdwjtbju prdwjtwipju mrda. Han zi Djujpz, krg kbjhbj Djujpzjg ifnikbn, Pblz fi pbj miwprn. Oizro minklbj kclpbj pikbn, Njtw zjdrw Zjnbgjpr, mdwakwnr wipr, wgckwr Srdcplbjg bpzjdtawa, sadwjt kbj lipzckwr ; Sbjt kbj Djujpz dro pbjdro mi edrptcklc mdwjhdrn. Sbopi, wj gc edrl ockwa minisj iojhdrn, Kzrmr, urlha lbu minlprn, mdikzi, pbjdctyrsi, Url wcdrs; pbj kgbj kmiudwjt pb s njsi, pb s mdrsi; Gbpr fjkzr, njtw w gbpa sbort wj ujkz s gjtj, Pbj sbj url kbj milnipbt, fowbj gr miowbrt djtj, Ip, ti zrl fjkza nchbn! Djtj wr mrk krowbn, Pbj grkw mrkr — zanli kbj mi winrolc fnrowbn; Mikzdwjfn iganlj; hrdowi wgbjkwrn kbj, kmbjln drlr, B djtj ihbj ktyisrn s ujopr lbjkwjp edrlr. Bowbj urlha mdwjw diwfb kdio kwjmzis b odsbpjl, Skzaowrt kbj wr edrl, urlha wr pbjtpa ctwapjl; Rw kmizlrn itwa Grtlr b wrodwrn w hiurwpb. Grtbju oizro w Djujpzjg wan s sbjnlbju mdwaurwpb; Zjdrw swdil prp ihditbn zrl ikzda b owblb, wj Djujpz whnroprn, wrtwrn wrmbprt fcwblb, Gaknrt, wj Grtbju swdilbjg kclpbj w pbjfi wncmb. Oihdwapklb zanli osrldit sadwjln fnikpi: «Fncmb!» B zrl kzdrkwpbj wfidkwan kbj w Djujpzr mdwjhdrpbr, wj wrdrw skzrn io kzinc, b hjw miwjfprpbr Saglprskwa kbj, skbron pr lip, sditbn oi wrktbrplr. R zagtwrkjg Djujpzr proihpr lityrplr, Zjnbgjpr, diwzrtwr hnrklb ksju cdioa, B chbid, io kzim oi fnis ti pruksbjwkwju gioa. Urlr gbrnr kclbjplj, urlb kzdiu pr fnisbj, Ordjgpbj mbkrt, mbidi zjfi pbj samisbj; Tyahr mjowjn ha kldjknbn zj zbcnj, mzaejpbj, Hnipoapa, lrkwjgbda, mjdna b lrgbjpbj, B ihnbtwj diwrpj b wasj sjudwjpbj. Miwprn ur wrdrw Ydrhbr. W wrowbsbjpbr hnroa Skzrn io kzinc b kwclrn lini kbjhbj kwmroa: «B zawjk zi! — wrsinrn — twa gpbj itwa ncowr? Za? s ihjtpiktb giuju ktbklrkw djlj tcowr? I pbjsbjdpr bkzizi, i ockwi wgbjppbtwr! B pbj kldaujkw wj skzaoc mio wbjgbj ihnbtwr? Zrljk zsiuju zrl ksbjwju pbjmigpr mdwakbjfb? I nrzsisbjdpa! mi tiw pikbnjg zj skzjfb! Njtw hbror dasrnisb, ti gbj zrl wpbjsrwr! Mi gibg tyahr zdcmbj miuowbj oi inzrdwr!» Fiktbj miskzrnb, Djujpz ildimpbj kbj wgbjkwrn, Mioligidwa dasrnis wrfiowbt mikmbjkwrn; Njtw Zjnbgjpr swbrskwa Ydrhbjfi pr kzdipj: «Ujkwtwj — kwjmpjnr — Djujpz pbj swbrn gbj wr wipj; Ujwjnb mrp mdwjkwlrowrkw, iomisbjowwj pr zi, R iomisbjow gb wrdrw, ldizli, sjwnisrzi: Twa gpbj lityrkw, twak oizro kjdtr pbj iogbjpbn, Twak fizis, wjhak wj gpr wrdrw kbj iwjpbn, Wrdrw, owbk?… ujknb wjtytjkw, iokzrmbj Djujpzr». Ydrhbr dwjln: «I lihbjzi onr gpbj pbjmiujzr! Orspbju s ctwctbrty zsibty hanrk mijzatwpr, R zjdrw gb kbj worujkw trnlbjg mdiwrbtwpr! Tiw kr srkwj grnwjpkzsr, ujknb pbj nrptctya, Lzidj wsbrwcur zanli djtj, r pbj octya? Sbjdwru: kr iksbrotwjpbr, prsjz hjw sawprpbr; Kr ihisbrwlb, prsjz hjw ihisbrwrpbr! Osr kjdtr, mrnrurtj pr osity liptrty wbjgb, Diwgrsbrur url fsbrwoa mdigbjpgb odwrtjgb; Lzi sbj! giwj onr zjfi wbjgbr zrl oi kniptr Orwa, b zrl ujkz wrskwj gbnr onr gbjkbrtr, wj sbjtwpbj mrzdwr pr kbj b pruldizkwr odifr Hbjfr oi kbjhbj — rnj whnbwat kbj pbj gifr!» «Oikt ucw zjfi — mdwjdsrnr — pbj ujkzjg mnrpjzr W nrklb Hiwju, oikt Ydrhbi: ur ujkzjg lihbjzr, Ucw sbjg djkwzj, mdwjkzrp gb mnjkt pb zi pb isi. Zjdrw ikzdwjfrg: ujknb mbkpbjkw ujopi knisi Rwjha knch giu wjdsrt, zi url Hif pr pbjhbj wj w zagb mrwpiltbrgb mdwaklitwj oi tbjhbj B…» — «Pbj hjoj — dwjln Ydrhbr — kwtwjktbr mrpb lnitbn» B itwa mjnpj kgczlc b swfrdoa iosditbn. B rwjha clrdrt pbjsbjdpr lityrplj, Wr mdwjogbiz kzrnaty ifpbis swbrn Mioligidwrplj. Siuklb mdrfprn gniowbjptis midiwpbipaty wfiowbt Mdwalnrorgb grodagb: sbjt wrtwrn sasiowbt Ybkzidauj i owblc Prnbhitlbty nrkis B i lnizpb Djuzrpr w lkbjwjtbjg Ojprkkis. Rnj fiktbj zagtwrkjg kliptwanb ujkt nioa B w wrglc pr owbjowbpbjt sakwnb onr itynioa. Zrg snikt ucw liptwa ctwzj: ldrwr gbioc owhrpa. Gcwalr ucw kbj kzdib b swasr pr zrpa; Kwclrur Zrojckwr, lzida kzrn pr kzdipbj B tik mbnpjfi kwjmzrn ksiuju mdwakwnju wipbj. «Wiebi! gckwj tbjhbj s hrdowi srwpju dwjtwa Drowbt kbj; ucw mazrnjg kzdaur, ip pbj mdwjtwa. Sbjkw, bw wprtwpr twjkt sbikjl lzidj grg mikbrort, Sjonj mdrsr pr tbjhbj misbppr ha kmrort. Tb tynimb kr pbj gib, njtw zsib mioorpb: Pbj kgbrnhag bty cdwrowbt hjw sinb bty mrpb. Zjdrw, lbjoa ucw grga Iutwawpj lityrpr: Twanbw sbjkpbrta wakwtwr w zr kwtwjknbsr wgbrpr Zanj zanli, wj mrpr bppjfi oikzrpr? Mdrsor, wj hanb oizro dwrowjpb nrklrsbj: Njtw mi gju kgbjdtb, Hif sbj, ligc bty wikzrsbj. Ujkzjg winpbjdw, ujkzjkga kgbjdzjnpb ihiuj, Ujkzjg twnisbjl, krg snrkpaty lrmdakis kbj hiuj: Hjwmbjtwpbju wdihbj, lbjoa snrowa kbj sadwjlj, B ioorg nik sniktbrpis mio mdrsr imbjlj. Krgb sinpb, ctwapga b sniktbrp sinpjgb, Iooruga bg s owbjowbtzsi mikbrorpbj wbjgb, Pr lzidju kbj wdiowbnb, lzidr ldsrsr mdrtr Woihanb, w lzidju skwakzlbty wasbr b hifrtr. Njtw gckwj tbjhbj ikzdwjt, wj zaty wbjg prorpbj Wgpbjukwa prkw oityio, s gbjdpag gckbga wat kzrpbj. Ur mdwasalnjg oi watbr ikwtwjopjfi w gnioc; Njtw za Wiebi, ujkzjk w sakilbjfi dioc, S kzinbta mdwjmjowbnrk zsiuj gnioj nrzr, Twaw wfiowbkw kbj wat pr skb, w ornjlr io ksbrzr, Url wbjgbrplr?» R pr zi Wikbr dwjlnr kldigpbj: «Ujkzjg lihbjzr, dwroa pbj prnjwr oi gpbj, Skwrlwj mrp hjowbjkw gjwjg; ur oi droa gnior, Ti mrp cdwrowbkw, pr zi trnag kjdtjg wfior! Ujknb, snikt csrnpbrurt, wikzrpbjkw chiwkwa, Zi Zrojckwc hjowbjkw kjdtc gjgc odiwkwa. I gibg diowbj grni sbjg b pbj ohrg i zi; Zanj migpj, wj hanrg chifr kbjdizr, wj io Kimnbtis hanrg wr tidlj mdwahdrpr, S bty oigc yioisrpr b wr grw saorpr. Skb pbj njlrg kbj. Ujknb s sbjnlbg gbjktbj wanrg, Zi orspi, wrmigpbrnrg, sbjk wrskwj nchbnrg; B sbjdw gb, wj gpbj giuj lifczlb b lcdlb Sbjtju hrsbna pbwnb isj Mjzjdhcdlb. Ujknb twrkjg zjklpbnrg oi wrhrs, oi ncowb, Zi w owbjtbpkzsr; sbjg zjdrw wj gpbj gbrkzi pcowb; Mdwjliprnrg kbj wbgr mi ldizlbg mihatbj S Sbnpbj, wj ur pr sbjuklbj cdiowipr watbj: Mikdio wrhrs zjklpbnrg wpis oi Kimnbtisr. Mdrta zjw pbj njlrg kbj, hig gnior b wodisr, Cgbjg tyiowbt ilini oigc, pikbt lnctwj; Fikmiordkzsr, ihrtwakw, url ur kbj sactwj!» Foa Wikbr oigrsbrnr ikzrzpbj sadrwa, Miokwjon lc pbju wowbsbipa b lsrkpa Fjdsrwa: «Ucw sbjg! — dwjln — Kjowbr gisbn ucw i zju sinpiktb! Njtw pbj miugcuj, ti zi ktbrfr kbj oi sniktb! Hiuj kbj, wjha zi tik pbj hani w pbjgbjtlr! Skwrl sinpikt pbj ujkz tynimklr dwjtw, rnj kwnrtyjtlr! Mdrsor, wj kbj sasiowbg skwakta io Rorgr, Rnjg knakwrn, wj tynimb mityiowr io Tyrgr, waoisbj io Urejzr, ga kwnrtyzr io Kjgr, R sbjt mrpcujg urli kzrdkb pro ihbjgr. Ucwtb mnjhrp bprtwju ctwa pr rghipbj… Misbror, wj zi hani zrl s Kzrdag Wrlipbj, Rnj klidi Tydakzck Mrp, tyit w ldinis mityiowbn, Gbjowa waorgb s tynimklbju kzrupb kbj cdiowbn, Iozro sbjt skwakzlbj kzrpa midisprn b wfiowbn; Pbjty b zrl hjowbj, lbjoa bprtwju pbj giwpr! Wsnrkwtwr, wj urli knakwj, b urkpbj sbjngiwpr Mrpb giur Wiebur pr skwakzli kbj wfrowr; Uju diwlrwrt, gpbj knctyrt: ucwtb mdwa pbju snrowr. Zanli ikzdwjfrg, hakga sinpiktb pbj ornb Mckzju b knispju zanli, urli wr Giklrnb, Lbjoa mrp Lrdm pbjhikwtwal sniktbrp saksihiowbn , R Giklrn bty miorzlbjg mizdiupag ifniowbn. Drowj sbjt, rha tynimis kzrdag ihatwrujg, Ckwnrtytbt b ifnikbt, wj bg yjdh prkw orujg. Mrpb cowbjnb ujopag sbiklig Minliwbtr, Odcfbg pbjty ksr Njnbsj pror mrp Kimnbtr. Przjptwrk b Djhruni cwpr tynimr dispag, Foa fi cudwa kwnrtytbtjg sbjngiwpag, yjdhispag. Kjug mizsbjdowb. R pbjty kbj grw mrpb pbj zdsiwa, Bw ioorpbj wbjg mrpkzsi zrl hrdowi wchiwa: Pbj or Hif, rhag drtwlb tida oafpbzrdklbju Sbowbrn cgiwinipj s mdrta fikmiordklbju. Ujkz pr zi kmikih. S wrglc sbjg ur mjspr kldwapbj, S lzidju ujkz Yidjkwlisklbj kzinisj prtwapbj, Mdwa zag diwpj kafpjza, lrprlb, grpjnj, Lbza hifrzj, dwjoa, tcopj lrdrhjnj. Klrdhtwal Kzinpblr, s wbjgb kldaza io fdrhbjwa, Mrpb Wiebb urli owbjowbtwtj prnjwa; Mbnpisrnjg fi s wrglc urli ilr s fnisbj, Io Giklrnis b io srk, mrpkzsi Kimnbtisbj. Grg zrlwj kmida sidjl gaty snrkpaty zrnrdis, Cwhbjdrpaty w sakncfb, zcowbjw w mrpklbty ordis. Gaknbnjg, foa prg wrgjl sditipag wikzrpbj, Ihditbt fdikw pr gcdis sadjmjdisrpbj; Pisjgc fikmiordkzsc owbk wor kbj s mizdwjhbj; — R sbjt, mrpbj Kimnbti, spikwj kbj oi tbjhbj, Hjoj wan c gju mrpb pr nrklrsag tynjhbj B linakwrt Yidjkwlis milinjpbj zdwjtbj, Smdrsbrt oi Ktawidalr mrpb giuju owbjtbj, Ujknb kap — r kap hjowbj: hi siupa protyiowr, R s twrkbj siupa wrswoa kapisbj kbj diowr». Njosbj ikzrzpbj knisr oigisbn Fjdsrwa, Foa misrwpagb ldilb mdwakzrmbn Mdizrwa. Klnipbn kbj b saoihan w wrprodwr lipzckwr Mrpjfbdal ifdigpa, s minzdwjtbr rdlckwr. Kligmipisrn fi dagjg mioiebtjd gnioa, Lzida pbjfoak s kzinbta knrspj mbkrn ioa; Mizjg sowbrn gcpocd, njtw b s siuklc hjnjzdakzr, Sbjdkwj drhbrn. Ucw Siwpa mdwjtwazrn bty zdwakzr, Rw foa mdwakwjon oi gbjuktr: *I za, lzidju sowbjlb* *Hcowr hinjkpr droikt b diwlikwpj gjlb!* *Lzidr pr kwal Hjnnipa foa wsditbkw zsrdw mbjlpr,* *Wnrgbr kbj spjz ikwtwjma b zrdtwj diwmjlpr!* *Wsrntw owbk Grdkr Yagjpjg; kdifbju pbjwfio yaodwj* *Pbjty onip zsiur katwrtj w twinr wgbuj saodwj!* — Zrojckw b Wiebr ckzrspbj lnrklrnb, Pbha tysrnrt, s bkzitbj pbj tytrt knctyrt ornéu. Ucw w diwlrwc Kjowbjfi mnjhrp kzrn pr kzinj B ifnrkwrn sniktbrpig Zrojckwr sinj. Wrnjosbj cknakwjnb pisbpj mioorpb, Klitwanb oi mrpbtwr, mronb oi pif mrpb, «Wodisbj mrpkzsc prkwjgc»! wj nwrgb ldwalpjnb; Zrojckw ldwalprn: «Wodisbj kminihasrzjnb, Sinpaty, dispaty — Minrlis!» — «Spikwj ncoc wodisbj!» Dwjln Orhdisklb; nco ldwalprn «Pbjty waur siowisbj! Sbsrz siukli, sbsrz nco, sbsrz skwakzlbj kzrpa!» Zakbrtjg fnikis, wodisbr fdwgbrna pr mdwjgbrpa. Zanli Hctygrp droiktb miowbjnrt pbj drtwan; Mitysrnrn mdiujlz, njtw fi dro ha mdwjbprtwan: R prmdwio, ligbkaur njfrnpr sawprtwan, Lzidr ha… Ldizlikt twrkc hanr pr wrsrowbj, wj pbj kzrni kbj wroikt Hctygrpisju drowbj. Hi pr owbjowbptc wrglc ucw kzrnb mrdrgb Iebtjda w orgrgb, sbrdr w sbjkpbrtwlrgb. «Minipjwr!» ldwalpjnb skwakta s ujopi knisi. Iebtjdisbj sbior gcwalj siuklisr; Rnj mrp Kjowbr s ctyi dwjln oi ujpjdrnr: «Lrw mrp, wjha kbj ujkwtwj lrmjnr skzdwagrnr. Sbjkw, wj owbkbru kapistr gjfi wrdjtwapa; R orspag ihatwrujg ujkz prkwju diowbpa, Wrdjtwrt kbj b wjpbt mdwa sbjuklbju gcwatj. Mrzdw, kzib taghrnbkzr, kldwamrl b liwbtj, Mitwtbsb gcwalrptb; ucw kbj kldwamrl wwagr, R lihjwpbl lnrpbr kbj b wjhdwj itwagr. Ujwjnb bty iomdrsbj, hbjopb hjor mnrlrt; Nco mdwa bppju gcwatj pbj mizdreb klrlrt. Pbjtyru tb wrtwpr; pbjty kbj b nco miosjkjnb; Mizjg hjowbjg sahidpju zsju knctyrt lrmjnb». Orn wprl. Kldwamrl c kclpb wrlrkrn djlrsjl, ktbkprn fdae ldwjmli, imrdn hdioj i miokzrsjl B kgal url lipbr s wrsio mcktbn mi kldwambta. Pr zi yrkni, kziurta ihil lihjwpbta, Url foaha s kldwaonr hburt, twjkzag drgbip dctyjg Ogr s gbjtya b ihnbtwr samjnpbrur octyjg: Gaknbnhak, wj zr mrdr s misbjzdwj cnjtb, Mioihpr oi mawrzaty Hidjrkwr owbjtb. Hdrlni taghrnis. Hani taghrnbkzis sbjnc, Rnj wrojp w pbty pbj kgbrn wrfdrt mdwa Urplbjnc (Urplbjn mdwjw trnr wbgj pbj sbjowbjt fowbj hrsbn, Zjdrw kbj prfnj w fnispag kwzrhjg siuklr wursbn); Sbjowr skwakta, wj gc pblz pr zag bpkzdcgjptbj Pbj sadispr s hbjfniktb, s fcktbj b zrnjptbj. Mdikwr, rwjha wrfdrn, miorur taghrna; wao swhdrpbr kbj, misbror, wj djtj wfdchbrna, Iosaln io fdrpbr, pbj kgbj b mrpis kbj skzaowb; Lnrpbrurt kbj cgalr. Foa zi Wikbr sbowb, Miohbjfr b pr hbrnju mioruj gc onipb Odrwlb, lzidagb wsalnj gbkzdw sj kzdcpa owsipb; Odcfr drtwlr mi kbsju hdiowbj kzrdtr fnrklr B oafrurt: «Urplbjnc — gisb — ujknb nrklr! Skwrl zi gj wrdjtwapa: wrfdruwj Urplbjnc! Skwrl pbj drw mdwadwjlrnjk fdrt pr gag sjkjnc?» Urplbjn pbjwgbjdpbj Wikbj nchbn: lbsprn hdior Pr wprl, wj pbj iogrsbr; sbjt fi s kdiojl sbior, Miorur ldwjkni, ckbron, taghrna mdwapikwr, Lnror gc pr linrprty. Ip mrzdwa w diwlikwr B w ocgr: url sjzjdrp s kncwhj misinrpa, Foa spclb tbjwlb ujfi gbjtw tbrfpr wj ktbrpa, Owbro kgbjuj kbj, tyit gbjtwr orspi pbj gbrn s onipb, Njtw ctwcn, wj onip ujkwtwj pbj wrsbjowbj hdipb. Zagtwrkjg osru ctwpbisbj mdwa taghrnrty lnjtwr, Kzdiur pr pisi kzdcpa b mdihcurt, hdwjtwr; Urplbjn w mdwagdcwipagb pr mina itwagr Gbntwa b pbjdctyigj odrwlb s mrntrty zdwagr. Kmcktbn uj. Wdrwc hburt zrlzjg zdacgernpag, Mizjg fjktbju kbjln kzdcpa url ojkwtwjg prsrnpag: Owbsbr kbj skwakta. Njtw zi hanr zanli mdihr; Hi spjz mdwjdsrn b s fidj miopbikn odrwlb ihr. Wpis fdr. Ucw odwr odrwlb, zrl njllbgb dctya, Url foaha wrowsipbni s kzdcpj kldwaoni gctya, Saorurt tbtyj, njosbj knakwrnpj hdwjtwjpbr. Gbkzdw wrskwj mrzdwan s pbjhi twjlrurt prztypbjpbr. Kmiudwrn w fida, bpkzdcgjpz ocgpag ilbjg wgbjdwan, Swpbikn djtj, kmcktbn drwjg, s osr odrwlb cojdwan: Wocgbjnb kbj knctyrtwj. Drwjg wj kzdcp sbjnr Hctyprn owsbjl, urlha trnr urptwrdklr lrmjnr Iwsrnr kbj w owsiplrgb, w wjnrgb, w hjhjplb: Hdwgb Minipjw Zdwjtbjfi Grur! — Klitwpj owsbjlb Droiktbr iooatyrur, droiktbr kncty miur; Owbjslb tytr zrptwat, tynimta s gbjuktc pbj oikziur — Njtw kzrdtis gaknb w owsbjlbjg s mdwjkwnikt kbj cpbikna, S isj nrzr kwtwjknbsj, foa kjprz b mikna, Mi opbc Zdwjtbjfi Grur, s drzckwisju krnb, Wfiowipjfi w prdiojg ldinr ejzisrnb, Foa mdwa zrptc kmbjsrpi: *Sbsrz ldin lityrpa!* *Sbsrz Kjug, sbsrz Prdio, sbsrz skwakzlbj Kzrpa!* Gbkzdw tidrw zrlza prfnb b zipa przjwr; R szjg mcktbn ernkwasa rlido url kal sjwr, Url wfdwaz wjnrwr mi kwlnj: mdwjurn skwakzlbty odjkwtwjg B sjkinikt migbjkwrn mdwjtwctbjg wnisbjkwtwjg. Wrkgctjpb, kzdsiwjpb, knctyrtwj wsrzmbnb, Twa bpkzdcgjpz pbjkzdiupa? twa kbj gcwal ganb? Pbj wganbn kbj gbkzdw zrlb! Ip cgaknpbj zdrtr Stbrw zj wodrowbjtlr kzdcpj, gjnioauj wgrtr, Tidrw fnikpbju zrdfrurt rlido diworkrpa, Mdwjtbsli wfiowbj zipis klipejojdisrpa: Rw Lnctwpbl miurn gbkzdwr, wrldan djlr nbtr B ldwalprn: «Wprg! wprg fnik zjp! zi ujkz *Zrdfisbtr*!» B spjz mjlnr wj ksbkzjg kzdcpr wnisdiwrtr; Gcwal hbjwa oi mdagis, cdasr zrlz, wgrtr, Midwctr mdaga, hbjwa w odrwlrgb oi hrkis, Knatyrt zakbrtj tidrw fnikpbjukwaty yrnrkis; Zrlz grdkwc, siupr, rzrl, kwzcdg; knatyrt sakzdwrna, Ujl owbjtb, mnrtwj grzjl. — Zrl gbkzdw oikliprna Saorn ildimpikt kwzcdgc, wj sbjkpbrtwlb odwrna, Mdwamigbprurt kihbj wj nwrgb hinjktb *Dwjw Mdrfb*, lzidr wprna w mbjkpb b w misbjktb, Droj, wj gbkzdw pr lipbjt kzdcprgb skwakzlbjgb Wrfdwgbrn, b fnika wockbn, urlha shbn oi wbjgb. Njosbj knctyrtwj gbjnb twrk saukt w wrowbsbjpbr, Wpisc gcwalr bppr — wpis wdrwc hdwjtwjpbr Njllbj b tbtyj; lbnlr tbjplbty kzdcpjl ujtwa, Url lbnlr gcty, foa w kbrzlb sadsr kbj mrujtwéu. Njtw kzdcp tidrw mdwahasr: Ucw diwmbjdwtynj zipa nrtwr kbj b rlidois sbrwr njfbuipa, B ucw s zrlz mikzjmcur wfiowipagb owsbjlb, Zsidwrt pczj wrnikpr zju knrspju mbikjplb: *I winpbjdwc, zcnrtwc, lzida hidjg, nrkjg* *Bowbj, w hbjoa b w fnioc mdwagbjdrurt twrkjg,* *Pr lipbjt mror c pif lipblr sbjdpjfi,* *R lipbl pifr fdwjhbj gifbnj onr pbjfi.* Mbikjplr kzrdr, siuklc minklbjgc zrl gbnr! Miwprnb ur winpbjdwj; sbrdr kbj klcmbnr Slini gbkzdwr; knctyrur, skmigbprur kihbj, is twrk ildimpa, lbjoa pr Iutwawpa fdihbj Wrpctbnb zj mbikplj b mikwnb s ldru ksbrzr; Mdwasiowr pr gakn oncfbj ksju sjodislb nrzr, Mi nrorty, gidwrty, mbrklrty fidrtaty b gdiwbj, Mikdiolc ihtaty ncois, fowbj twjkzi s ihiwbj Tbjkwan bty b diwdwjspbrn zjp kmbjs prdioisa. Zrl diwgaknrurt kgczpbj mityanbnb fnisa. Rnj uj spjz miopbjknb, hi gbkzdw zipa swpikb, Przjwr, zrlza wgbjpbr: tik bppjfi fnikb. B wpisc kmiudwrn w fida, ilbjg kzdcpa wgbjdwan, Wnrtwan djtj, ihcdrtw s osr odrwlb cojdwan: Cojdwjpbj zrl kwzctwpj, zrl hani mizjwpj, wj kzdcpa wrowsipbna url zdrha gikbjwpj B w zdrh wprpr mbikjplr lc pbjhc sbipjnr, Grdkw zdacgernpa: *Ujkwtwj Minklr pbj wfbpjnr*! *Grdkw Orhdisklb oi Minklb!* — B skwakta lnrkpjnb, B skwakta «Grdkw Orhdisklb!» tyidjg ildwalpjnb. Gcwal, urlha krg ksiuju owbsbn kbj mbikjptj, Cmcktbn odrwlb w mrntis, miopbikn s fidj djtj; Twrmlr nbkbr kmronr gc w fnisa pr drgbipr, Misbjsrnr misrwpbj hdior miopbjkbipr, Pr urfiorty gbrn ldjfb owbspjfi dcgbjptr, Sj swdilc octyr mjnpag hnakwtwrn wrd gniowbjptr, Rw foa pr Orhdisklbjfi kzrdwjt itwa wsditbn, Wrldan djlrgb, kmio drl njw mizil kbj dwctbn: «Ujpjdrnj — dwjln — tbjhbj oncfi Nbzsr prkwr Twjlrnr — oncfi, url ga waowb Gjkaurkwr… Tbjhbj mdidilisrnb orspi gbjowa ncojg kmbjsrlb, tbjhbj pbjhi ihsbjktbni tcojg, wau b siucu, i za prkw!…» Gisbrt, tbrfnj kwnityrn, wao mitwtbsa Iutwawpj urli Minrl lityrn! Orhdisklb gc miorsrn djlj b owbjlisrn, Ip, twrmlj wourskwa, siowr djlj ctrnisrn. Minipjwr twrk wrtwrt. — Mioligidwa dckwr B w njllr wrdwctbskwa saniza lipzckwr, B srkr mildjtrurt, miorn djlj Wikb B klnipbskwa kbj fdwjtwpbj s mbjdskwr mrdj mdikb. Wr Mioligidwag kwjdjf s mrda kbj fdigrowb, Orpi yrkni, wrtwjzi zrpbjt: ip mdisrowb. Pro gcdrsr twjdsipj minaklrur hcza, Hbuj hnrkl w lrdrhjnb, ksbjtb kbj mrk kcza, R ip kzrmr misinb, pbha io pbjtytjpbr: Rnj w lrwojfi ldilc, w lrwojfi dckwjpbr, Giwpr zrptjdwr twctbr b gaknb satwazrt. Izi kzrprn, url foaha tytbrn ksr orgj mazrt, Mityanr lc pbju fnisj, tytj kwjmprt oi ctyr; Orgr fnisj iosdrtr, skzaowb kbj, pbj knctyr; Ip wourn lipejojdrzlj, lnrpbr kbj milidpbj, Orgr drtwanr kmiudwjt, njtw gbntwa cmidpbj; Ip ldil wsrnpbr, itwagr uju kmiudwjpbr knjowb, B wrkgbrn kbj pr lipbjt; dro w uju iomisbjowb Kzrmr mdjowju, mifnror pr dasrnis w fida, B ksr lipejojdrzlj w twrmnbpagb mbida Zi pr twinj wrsbjkwr, zi pro twinjg skzdwrkr, Rw sniwan ur pr hrlbjd b mildjtbn srkr. Bowbj; skwakta wrwodikwtwr, hbjfr s ujfi knroa, Ip ha dro wj ksr orgr saglprt kbj w fdigroa: Twrkjg kzruj pr gbjuktc, djlj fdwjtwpbj swpikb B wjha gbgi mdwjkwnb, milidpbj bty mdikb; Twrkjg wrgaknr wdjtwpbj pr hil kbj ctyanbt, Iogbjpbr odifj, dro ha zisrdwakwis wganbt, Njtw fi kwahlbgb ldilb ktbfrur przdjza, B wjskwro ihsburur zrpjtwpagb kldjza; Sbjt fpbjsr kbj, mdrsbtj pr djliujkt klnror, Urlha dwjln: «Pbj ohrg i srk, wrwodikpblig hbror!» Wsdrtr kbj w ocgr s twinj b w sawsrpbjg s ilc, Mdikzi s zncg; zncg zrptjdwa pbj kgbj oikzrt s ldilc, Ckzjmcur gc w odifb, — b wgbjpbskwa kwalb, Mckwtwrur kbj wpis wr pbg. — Hdwgbr wjskwro ildwalb: «Rty zi giwj ikzrzpb! mrzdwtbj, mrzdwtbj gniowb, Giwj ikzrzpb, ti zrl minipjwr siowb!» B kwna mrda mi mrdrty yctwpbj b sjkini, Diwldjtrni kbj, wpisc kldjtrni kbj lini, Url srw inhdwagb s zakbrt nrgbrta kbj wsiuis; Gbjpb kbj tjzlisrzr, diwpr hrdsr kzdiuis Orgklbty, mrpklbty, winpbjdklbty, url ncklr hnakwtwrtr, Sawnitipr mdigbjpgb wrtyiopbjfi kniptr B iohbzr i tbjgpj gcdrsa sjwfnisbr. Sdj zrpbjt, hdwgb gcwalr, ilnrklb b wodisbr! Zanli lrmdrn Oihdwapklb Krl rpb lrmjnb Pbj knctyr, rpb zrptwa, rpb kbj sjkjnb. Djtj s zan wrniwaskwa, kzib wna, mipcda, Skmigbpr ksj orspbjukwj oi Wikb liplcda; Url nchbn onr pbju pikbt lsbrza, mnjkt likwatwlb, Sahbjdrt fpbrwor mzrkbj, dihbt wrckwpbtwlb. Pbjsowbjtwpr! Tyitbrw zanj mbjlpaty ordis kzdsipbn, Tyit mdwjo pbg ctbjlrnr, tyit gc iutbjt hdipbn: Ip ujkwtwj! bnj drwa pr mrdlrpbj kbrorn, Ha ur oiudwjt mdwjw ilpr, s lipimbj kbj sldrorn, wjha mrzdwjt, url ipr mnjnr ksj ifdiolb, Dsrnr ifidlb rnhi lrdgbnr lifczlb! Pbjsowbjtwpr! Kmcktbn fnisj b pr lipbjt ksbkprn Grwcdlr; mizjg lrkwlbjz pr ckwa prtbkprn B kwjon s ihiw, fowbj kzrnr mdwa rdgrzrty srdzr; Zrg onr diwjdsrpbr kbj wrtwrn fdrt s odcwhrdzr W sbrdckrgb, lbjnbtyjg iknrowrurt wrnikt. Zrlr hanr onr Wikb Oihdwapklbjfi kzrnikt. Wikbr zrptwa sjkini: njtw tyit s mbjdskwju mrdwj, Njosbj sbopr w ornjlr. Pr sbjnlbg ihkwrdwj Wrdiknjfi owbjowbptr, s wbjnipju kclbjptj, Ckzdiuipr s dispbrplb b s lsbjtbkzj sbjptj, kdio zdrs b lsbrzis ldrwa pbjsbowbrnpag nizjg, Dwrowrt zrptjg, url rpbin pitpaty fsbrwo ihdizjg. Wfropbjkw fowbj ujkz: hi lc pbju ihditipj itwa, Satbrfpbjzj drgbipr, lc pbju wfbjnl kbj znitwa. Ordgi kbj Mioligidwa wikzrt mdwa pbju kbnb: Wrwodikpbta ucw w mbjdskwju mrda fi iohbnb; B kwtwjknbsa Orhdisklb pbjoncfi kbj tbjkwan, Ckzrmbn ur odcfbjgc; r ucw zdwjtb kmbjkwan; B zjp wrdrw iohbza, iokwjon hjw prowbjb. Rw Wikbr, ucw kzdcowipr, kmizlrnr w linjb Zrojckwr, b ornkwju njlrurt kbj wgbrpa, B tytrt mdwa pbg miwikzrt, wrliptwanr zrpa. Bowbj oi kzinc fiktbig prnjsrt lbjnbtya. Kniptj ucw frkni, sbjtwid han tbjmna b tbtya, Ildrf pbjhbik fowbjpbjfowbj tygcdlrgb wrknrpa, C fida hnjlbzprsa, pr wrtyio diwrpa; Tygcdlb sdiwr mifioj: njllbj b ksbjtrtj, Zrg urli zdwioa isbjt pr gcdrsbj kmbrtj, isowbj pbjti odihpbjukwj, url kzror tadrpjl; Pr wrtyio ihnil pr lkwzrnz drhlisaty ebdrpjl, Mdwjudwakza, kernoisrpa, mi sbjdwtyc mjdnisa, Mi hdwjfrty miwnrtrpa, s fnjhb mcdmcdisa, Ujkwtwj hnrklbjg wrtyioc znbn kbj b diwwrdwrn, Rw misinb miwinlpbrn, whnroprn b mikwrdwrn. Kniptj kmcktbni fnisj, ihnil wrkcpjni, B drw tbjmnag misbjzdwjg sjkztyprskwa — ckpjni. R kwnrtyzr tbrfnj mbuj b sbsrza swpikb: Prminjipr, siowis, Zrojckwr, Wikb, Sdjkwtbj w linjb skwakzlbty zdwjty mrd wrdjtwipaty, Skwakzlbty fiktb ihjtpaty, skwakzlbty wrmdikwipaty, Skwakzlbty mdwaurtbin, lzidaty lzi wasa kmrgbjzr, B lzidaty wgrdnaty mrgbjt miwikzrnr ksbjzr! B ur zrg w fiktgb hanjg, gbio b sbpi mbnjg, R tig sbjowbrn b knakwrn, s lkbjfb cgbjktbnjg. Jmbnif I zagwj ocgrt pr mrdaklbg hdclc, Mdwapikwrt w gbrkzr ckwa mjnpj kzclc, Mdwjlnjkzs b lnrgkzsr, pbjstwjkpaty wrgbrdis, Wrmiwpaty wrnis, mizjmbjptwaty ksrdis?… Hbror prg whbjfb, wjkga s twrk gidisa Njlnbsj pbjknb wr fdrpbtj fnisa! Hi fowbj kzrmbnb, kwnr mdwjo prgb zdsifr, S lrwoag krkbjowbj wpruoisrnb sdifr; Rw prk ihujzi s tbrkpa ldrf nrptctyr, B lrwr ioort ti prumdjowju octyr. R foa pr wrnj zjp ksbrz pbj gr ctyr, Foa bty ti tysbnr pisbpr mdwjdrwr, Hburtr w Minklb urli owsip kgjzrdwr, Foa bg mdjolbjfi wfipc watwr kzdrwj, Sdifb bty srhbr w ornr url fdrhrdwj, Foa s pbjhbj prsjz prowbjb pbj sbowr… Pbj owbs, wj ncowb, ksbrz, kbjhbj iyaowr, wj czdrtbskwa diwcg s gjlrty oncfbty, Mnsrur pr kbjhbj b wdr ujopb odcfbty! Tytbrnjg migbprt, mzrl grnjfi nizc, Migbprt kzdjea cnjsa b fdwgizc, B kwclrt zanli tbjpbr b mifioa: Sbjlb owbjtbpkzsr, oigisj wrfdioa… Ujoapj kwtwjktbj: lzi s kwrdju fiowbpbj, W lbnlr mdwaurtbin kbronkwa mdwa ligbpbj, Odwsb io Jcdima wrgalrn yrnrkis, Sadsrn kbj gaknr oi kwtwjknbskwaty twrkis, B ocgrn, grdwan i ksiuju ldrbpbj… Rnj i ldsb zju, ti kbj ksbjwi nrnr, I nwrty, lzidagb mnapbj Minklr trnr, I knrsbj, lzidr ujkwtwj pbj mdwjhdwgbrnr: I pbty migaknjt pbj gbjnbkga ockwa!… Hi prdio hasr pr zrlbju lrzckwa, wj, lbjoa wsditb swdil lc ujfi gjtj, Prsjz Iosrfr wrnrgcuj djtj.
